Job Description:
I. Registrar’s Office:
The Registrar's Office supports the academic activities of the University by providing essential enrollment, curricular, scheduling, examination and student record services with the highest degree of accuracy and integrity. It is a custodian of all student records, including personal information, enrollment, grading, transcripts, and course information and scheduling, and manages them in accordance with university policies and the requirements of governmental ministries. The Registrar's Office is also responsible for supporting academic faculties in preparing for and administering examinations and in the production of grades, transcripts, degree awards and certification.

II. Position Summary:
The Academic Officer will work closely with the Registrar and will be responsible for contributing in the
operations of the Registrar's Office and in particular, ensuring its integrity and efficiency. The ideal candidate
would be the one who can manage data efficiently; has integrity; who is able to work with different
departments, lecturers and government ministries and who is student-centric and has desire to serve students.

III. Duties and Responsibilities:
The overall job description below outlines the main areas of responsibilities of the Employee:
- Prepare student attendance, score list, monitor, and exam announcement, etc.
- Issue certification letters in Khmer and English such as academic certification, letter of attestation,
scholarship certification, etc. for FHS and Non FHS students
- Provide services for students and lecturers to ensure class run smoothly
- Manage and enter class schedule, student information, student applications, lecturer CVs into database
- Compile students’ statistics and their academic results to scholarship providers
- Prepare student evaluation survey at the end of each semester
- Learning new things with high responsibility in issuing academic documents
- Other tasks as assigned by supervisor.
Job Requirement:
1. Education:
-  Bachelor/ Master’s degree in any discipline

2. Experience
- A minimum of 2 years of data management / admin role
- Experience designing filing systems and liaising with different departments

3. Skills:
- The ability to foster internal communication with faculty, staff, students, and others, and deep appreciation of the importance of building strong relationship with the office;
 Excellent oral and written communication skills in Khmer and English; and
- Strong interpersonal skills.
- Strong computer skills: Ms Office, Internet and Email

4. Abilities:
- Ability to interact successfully with academic as well as business and regulatory/ministry personnel;
- Work effectively as a team member to ensure that departmental goals are met by providing support to
staff and always keeping students and graduates best interest as a priority;
- Highly organized, capable of managing high volumes of documents and information and file them
properly;

- Able to coordinate with the IT department to digitize records; and
-  Understands an education environment.

5. Personal Qualities
- Honesty
- Integrity
- Enthusiasm

- Ability to work under pressure.

Job Description: I. Position Summary:The University is seeking a full-time candidate as Program coordinator and Part-Time Lecturer for the ICT Department. This role oversees the ICT Department administrative functions, and collaborates with the head of the ICT Department and other departments to support continuing ICT programs, manage and maintain day-to-day administrative support operations of the department. The role also includes lectures for subjects related to Critical Thinking.II. Duties and Responsibilities:The overall job description below outlines the main areas of responsibilities of the Employee:• Coordinate ICT Programs (Bachelor and Master) to scaffold student success for their furtherstudies.• Support to faculty’s management and ensure that the ICT Department makes a full contribution toUP objectives• Work with other faculties and departments to ensure student academic and pastoral success• Assist an infrastructure for organizing teaching across the ICT Department that supports the qualityof the learning environment• Develop effective links with other faculties and departments across UP• Advance and promote the ICT Department teaching agenda• Ensure appropriate management structures within ICT Department maintains high standards ofteaching delivery and support on the ICT curriculum review and development• Act as an effective ambassador for UP in the external environment• Assist the ICT Department in line with UP’s policies, procedures and best practices, includingrecruitment, performance management, appraisal and development• Contribute, where appropriate, to the delivery of lectures, practical classes and field coursesbelonging to the ICT Department• Assist students during their studies• Follow up with the academic teaching staff to ensure the good implementation of UP policies• Perform other duties and assume additional responsibilities as assigned by the Vice-Dean of ICT• Developing and implementing procedures to ensure the smooth continuity of the courses• Support in the admission process of the students• Support in the curriculum review• Support in the production of the annual reports to Ministries (ACC, HED)• Support in the organization of events of the ICT Department• Support on the Development of extracurricular courses (ex: short courses)• Support on the development of marketing content• Support on the preparation of events in coordination with the Marketing department• Prepare courses outlines, course material and give lectures related to Critical Thinking subject• Support on the coordination of the students’ internship program (end of year 2)
Job Requirement: 1. Experience:• At least 2 years managing teaching staff experience• Significant experience of coordinating a team of teaching staff• Experience in Technology environment in Cambodia• Experience in teaching Critical Thinking subjecte2. Education:• Bachelor’s degree or other relevant degrees3. Skills/Competencies:• Strong oral and written skills• Be proficient in Microsoft Office applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)• Ability to work independently and as a team• Demonstrated ability to make independent judgment and work under pressure• Strong interpersonal skills• Ability to interact successfully with student body, faculties and administrations4. Personal Quality• Honesty, Integrity, Enthusiasm, Creativity, and passion for education and enabling learning.• Strong sense of initiative, dedication, and responsibility• Organized and detail-oriented

Job Description: As part of its transformative Dynamic 2.0 agenda, Dynamic Pharma Group seeks qualified talents with outstanding sales and marketing skills to promote healthcare innovation in Cambodia. At Dynamic, we wouldn’t be the industry leader without our successful sales team. We’re seeking a qualified sales specialist to help us sell the products and services that help improve the lives of people around the world. Our ideal salesperson has a strong understanding of the sales process and excels at generating leads, building relationships, and closing deals. We’re seeking a quick learner with strong listening and negotiating skills and someone with a presence who can showcase our offerings in a compelling way. Often tasked with giving presentations, attending networking events, and participating in trade shows, our salesperson must be approachable and professional. His or her efforts will help us extend our country reach and impact.The Ideal candidate should possess good communication skills, conflict management skills, selling skills, negotiation skills, language, and presentation skills.Primary Objective of the Position: •The Business Unit Director plays an essential role by leading and managing Dynamic Distribution team, providing strategic & operational input, being knowledgeable of all work completed and executed by the team and driving client relationships to maintain the trust in the team and grow new business.•The Business Unit Director is responsible for the overall sales and operations and the optimum utilisation of the company’s resources to meet customer requirements. He/ She is accountable for the continual improvement of the division, and career development of the company personnel.Job Description: •Drive the development and evaluation of short and long term strategic and financial objectives to ensure ongoing success for the DDC team•Utilizes available management or financial tools to monitor, control and/or improve all operating costs including direct payroll costs, staff productivity and administration costs•Analyses current market data reporting and reacts appropriately to relevant market trends and developments•Pro-actively manages the profitability & expansion of department’s product portfolio•Provides monthly updates of operational performance including current and projected financial performance by portfolio segment•Supervises and participates, where required, including costing review, sales negotiation….•Supervises and ensures a proper flow of processes between departments•Ensures all contracts or orders meet are profitable and meet customer specific requirements and contractual scope•Attract, manage, retain, and grow the Sales and Marketing Manager(s) and relevant staff to ensure their competency and ability to meet future division’s business requirements•Support knowledge transfer, knowledge sharing and skills accrual through relevant & appropriate learning / teaching channels•Collaborate with other departments where possible•Ensure efficient use of internal and external resource allocations•Keep up-to-date job descriptions or job responsibility for all DDC staff
Job Requirement: Qualification Required: •	Degree in business, science, engineering, or related field•	Minimum 5 years working experience in sales, trading and distribution industry or similar industry (healthcare industry a plus)SKILLS ESSENTIAL TO THE POSITION:•	A good command of the English (both verbal and written). Chinese will be considered as a plus •	Excellent people management (leadership) skills•	Strong problem solving and decision-making skills•	Strong business acumen and ability to negotiate with key clients•	Understands how to deliver through and with others in a way that motivates and drives high performance•	Networking skills to generate new business leads •	Ability and willingness to work in a matrix organization•	High influencing skills and high client effectiveness.•	Change agent both internally and externally.•	Skills development – acquisition and retention of the best industry talent•	Strong strategic capability and coupled with problem solving skills finding new and creative solutions to our client’s needs.•	People management, self-motivation and a positive outlook on things will help get you through the tough times when pressure is high, and client demands unwavering.ESSENTIAL PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES:•	Team player •	Ability to remain calm in a highly pressurized environment•	Willingness to continue learning •	Confident•	Assertive•	Resilient•	Proactive•	Meticulous with attention to detail•	Flexible to work beyond normal office hours (overtime when required)
Company Profile:
The Dynamic Group has been supporting Cambodia's healthcare, agriculture, quality control industries for the last 20s years. Our vision is improving Quality of Life, Shaping Better Tomorrows. With over 400 highly-qualified staffs, the Dynamic Group leads in applying global technologies and delivering value to the various communities that we are serving.

With no fewer than seven companies in its stable, the Dynamic Group brings the world’s latest technological advancements to one of the world’s fastest growing economies.

All of our companies in Dynamic Group are:
-Dynamic Pharma

-Dynamic Scientific
-Dynamic Distribution
-Dynamic Chemicals
-Dynamic Argon
-Dynamic Technologies

Job Description:
** General Responsibilities:
Payable and Tax Executive is mainly in charge of handling payable and taxes. He /She ensure that monthly taxes are submitted on time within 25 th of next following month. He /She ensure that the company rules, regulations, and policies are strictly applied throughout the liaising and working closely with the suppliers, General Department of Taxation, other departments, and relevant ministries. He /She is responsible for keeping all private and confidential files both soft and hard of payable and taxes.

** Specific Responsibilities:
- Receive, check, follow up invoices and employee claim
- Record invoices to Sage by cost center
- Match Invoices with Purchase Order (if applicable)
- Paying suppliers by scheduling pay checks or transfer and ensuring payment is received by supplier.
- Check, verify employees claim with document support and prepare payment by and checks or i-Banking
- Verifies vendor accounts by reconciling monthly statements and aging
- Reconciliation and handle own suspend account (accrued sundry)
- Follow up all advances and prepayment.
- Support and facilitate the month & year end closing
- Filling payment voucher both soft and hard
- Keep both soft and hard copy of tax invoices, customs receipt, tax return and other compliance document.
- Join fixed asset counting
- Prepare tax returns, payments, necessary paperwork, E-Filling, and submit to authorities in time.
- Assess, research, and inform difficult tax issues, and propose solutions
- Manage and maintain the company’s tax database
- Ensure you comply with regulations, other ministry, and local authorities
- Offer support document and liaise with auditor (desk audit, limited audit, comprehensive audit, external audit, ISO audit, and MEF audit)
- Other tasks assign by supervisor

** Other Responsibilities:
- Perform other job-related duties as assigned by the superiors
Job Requirement:
- Cambodian legal working age
- Bachelor’s degree majoring in accounting and finance or other related filed
- Minimum 2 years of experiences in the related field
- Certificate or experience in accounting and taxes field
- Tax certificate or any equivalent is a plus
- Computer proficiency: Microsoft Office, Advance excel, Adobe sign, Access and familiar with airport accounting system or other accounting system is a plus
- Access and familiar with i-banking system or other e-payment is a plus
- A good command of spoken and written English and Khmer, and other languages a plus
- Ability to work under pressure to meet specific deadlines
- Good interpersonal and communication skills
- Loyal, Confident, and highly motivated person
- Can-do attitude
Company Profile:
Cambodia Airports develops and manages Cambodia’s network of international airports located in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap, and Sihanoukville. Its teams plan and design the development of airport infrastructure, build and maintain the facilities, handle commercial activities and provides services to stakeholders, including The Royal Government of Cambodia, passengers, airlines, and tenants.

Since its inception in 1995, Cambodia Airports has generated immense economic and social benefits for Cambodia by connecting the country to the world. Its leadership in airport development and operations translates in advanced working environment, staff benefit, and Corporate Social Responsibility policies.

Job Description:
** General Responsibilities:
Under the direction of the Secretary General/CHRO, the LR specialist is the main contact for :
- Legal background for all labor relation and industrial relation matters
- The liaison with MoLVT representatives
- The liaison with Union Rep and Staff representatives (shop steward)
- Provide legal advisory role on labor law and impacts on employment contracts.
- ensures compliance of as it relates to administration of the collective bargaining agreements with union represented employees.

** Specific Responsibilities:
1. Legal Advisory role for labor law
a) Individual labor relations
- interpret and administer labor contracts
- Advise management on matters related to the administration of contracts or employee discipline or grievance procedures.
- Review and approve employee disciplinary actions
- Review employer practices or employee data to ensure compliance with contracts on matters such as wages, hours, or conditions of employment.

b) Collective negotiation
- Recommend collective bargaining strategies, goals, or objectives.
- Prepare Collective bargaining agreements, contract proposals or counter-proposals for collective bargaining or other labor negotiations.  
- Draft rules or regulations to govern collective bargaining activities in collaboration with company, government, or employee representatives.
- Present the position of the company or of labor during arbitration or other labor negotiations.
- Identify alternatives to proposals of unions, employees, companies, or government agencies.
- Mediate discussions between employer and employee representatives in attempt to reconcile differences.
- Assess the impact of union proposals on company or government operations.
- Monitor company or workforce adherence to labor agreements.
- Propose resolutions for collective bargaining or other labor or contract negotiations.
- Assess risk levels associated with collective bargaining strategies.

** Litigation
- Investigate and evaluate union complaints or arguments to determine viability.
- Schedule or coordinate the details of grievance hearings or other meetings
- Prepare evidence for disciplinary hearings, including preparing witnesses to testify.

** Legal monitoring
a) Play an advisory role in updating the HR team with law evolutions
b) Train managers or supervisors on topics related to labor relations, such as working conditions, safety, or equal opportunity practices.

2. Liaison with MoLVT
- Be the contacted person of HR Division with the ministry of labor and Vocational training
- Ensure all requirements are fulfilled and documented accordingly
- Extend good cooperation with the Labor Inspector of the ministry of labor during their mission into the company

3. Liaison with Union and staff representatives
a) Ensure social dialogue in maintaining a proper communication channel with unions and employees representatives /shop stewards.
b) Organize meetings when necessary or consultations
Job Requirement:
- Minimum Bachelor’s Degree in HR or legal background in labor law
- At least 3 years of working experience handling labor relations topics
- Proficiency in English and Khmer both in spoken and written
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Able to handle confidential information in a mature and professional manner
- Highly analytical thinker and problem solver
- Proven attention to detail; extremely organized
- High-quality judgment and sound decision-making
- Advanced in Microsoft Office and other applications

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: - Knowledge of Cambodia and the South-East Asia market- Minimum of 3 -5 years of purchasing experience in the automotive industry- Outstanding communication skills- Business level English skills
Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh HQ: , #93B, St590, Vllage13, Sangkat Boeng kok, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh HQ: , #93B, St590, Vllage13, Sangkat Boeng kok, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

Job Description:

•Check cash expenditure and daily revenue report to ensure revenue & cash received or paid are correct

•Check on payment to supplier to ensure the payment is correctly paid out. 
•Prepare others reports for management purpose.
•Monthly check cash and bank balance from reconciled balance.
•Prepared daily collected cash from sales with cash collector to deposit into the ban
•Control Account Playable.
•Solving all issues that related with accounting department.
•Perform other duties as assigned from management of the Company.
•Report to Owner

•Bachelor in Finance & Accounting, or related field
•Knowledge of Quick books accounting system (Quick books Online preferred)
•Knowledge Key in system (Base) is priority. 
•At least 1-2 years of work experience in Accountant. 
•Ability to work well in a team
•Good communication skills & ability to deal with clients & suppliers
•Ability to work effectively under pressure.

Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
The digital marketing Specialist involves overseeing the overall digital marketing strategy, developing, implementing, tracking, and optimizing digital marketing campaigns to ensure digital growth. If you can initiate digital campaigns and run with them from conception up to
the execution, you’re probably the ideal candidate for our digital marketing Specialist job. 

The digital marketing manager will work with marketing team and our digital marketing agency.

** Daily and Monthly Responsibilities
- Develop and scrutinize all the campaign budgets
- Design and manage the entire digital marketing such display advertising, marketing tools, & the company website;
- Plan and control the company’s social media channels and company website
- Grow the website traffic and enable digital growth
- Content creation and distribution on all social channel;
- Monitor the primary marketing metrics to establish the effectiveness of online advertising
- Report on the performance of digital marketing activities and compare the results against key performance indicators and ROI
- Review the brand message regularly to ascertain its consistency
- Analysis of end-to-end consumer experience in different digital channels.
- Identify the latest digital technologies and current digital trends affecting the industry
- Prepare and execute conversion tests
Job Requirement:
- At least three years working experience in digital marketing roles
- Experience in executing successful social media campaigns
- Practical experience in keyword research, SEO management, email, and marketing,
- Updated on new technologies and the latest trends in digital marketing
- In-depth insights on all social media platforms
- Knowledge in graphic design software (Illustrator, Photoshop,…)
- Highly creative with excellent analytical abilities

- Note: Apply immediately will have a chance for hiring.
- Working Day: Mon-Fri, Day off: Sun
- Working Hour: 08 hours per day.
- Gross Salary: Negotiate

** Other Benefit:
- A/L: 18 Days, SL: 6 Days, Special Leave: 7 days
- 1 Week Vacation
- Training & Development
- Insurance
- Seniority Pay
- Yearly Bonus
- Yearly increment
- Staff party

Company Profile:
The Essilor Group has put its expertise at the service of good vision in designing, manufacturing and distributing quality products and services through innovative business models. Today we provide solutions to correct and protect the visual health of the 7.4 billion people in the world.

To achieve this ambition, we place our mission of improving lives by improving sight at the heart of everything we do, respecting the values and principles that have shaped the Group for near 170 years. Our mission unites our 67,000 employees across the world, drives our strategy, stimulates innovation and guides

our commitments to each of our stakeholders. Essilor group has a wide variety of job areas and functions: sales, marketing, R&D, engineering, operations, production or instruments and equipment as well as finance, HR, information systems… With a fast-growing global presence in its historical lenses activity, but also in new markets with their own specific business roles – sunwear, reading glasses, photochromic lenses and online sales – the company offers a multitude of career paths, often international, that will develop your skills and grow you permanently.

To support our growth, we’re recruiting new team members with a variety of skills and complementary talents… Why not you?

Job Description:
1. MAIN TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES
Be A Marketing Manager you need to promote the business effectively online and develop a targeted online marketing strategy that engages potential customers throughout the digital landscape. Find the today's digital marketing techniques in simple terms, demonstrating how to build a successful online marketing campaign for all digital channels: search, video, social media, email.
1. MKT Strategy
2. Manage Digital MKT
3. Trade Promotion (B2B & B2C)
4. Brand Awareness

** Social Media:
- Initiated digital activities to endorse products and service by creating content marketing strategies, and social media presences.
- Plan and oversee all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, email, social media and display advertising campaigns, Video;
- Develop and implement SEO, and engaging online content including static, videos, GIF, and animation.
- Respond for offline such creating the booklets, OOH, press release, and leaflet.
- Conduct CSR project to contribute social development
- Build a social media marketing plan for brand awareness and lead generation;
- Create the content planning to attract and increase the consumer engagement ;
- Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs);
- Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners;
- Execution of all ATL/BTL marketing activities and monitor results for continuous improvement;
- Checking the quality translation Khmer language to be developed on website.
- Check the Khmer font to be displayed on website in order to provide accessibility to product information
- Coordinating with global team regarding the global content related to Cambodia market, learn more,
technics, etc. 

** B2B/B2C:
- Work closely with Sale Manager to develop strategies and plans for all trade and consumer marketing activities in order to achieve growth target;
- Support General Manager & Sale Manager to assess market landscape and trends, analyze competitors and customers strategies to identify growth opportunities

** Brand Awareness:
- Process of design, local adaptation and production of B2B2C marketing materials with an aim to improve purchase rate at stores;
- Lead store environment/ POS guidelines compliance and analyze/audit executions for improvement;
- Develop plans to strengthen brand visibility and improve sell-out productivity at stores
- Lead research projects on shopper understanding to gain in-depth knowledge and develop better communication materials.
- Co-ordinate with sale teams for country initiatives deployment and to develop in-store brand communication tools for better engagement with customers/shoppers and improved sale.

2. REPORTING/COLLABORATIONS
- Direct Report to : Sale Manager
- Indirect Report to: Senior MKT Manager (ASIAN)
- Collaborate closely with other team members of Branding Principle

3. KEY OBJECTIVE RESULT (OKR)
Alignment with Essilor Cambodia ambition and milestones:
- Achievement in terms of Brand Awareness
- Push and Support the Sale Growth
Job Requirement:
4. EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE
- BA in Sale or Marketing or related field
- At least 5 years’ experience in Digital MKT, Trade Promotion, & Social Media
- Demonstrable experience leading, social media and/or display advertising campaigns
- Knowledge in graphic design software (Illustrator, Photoshop,…) 
- Highly creative with excellent analytical abilities

5. LOCATION: Phnom Penh, travel to provinces is required

6. SALARY: negotiable, depending upon Qualification & experience

Job Description:
• Record day to day financial transactions and complete the posting process;
• Verify that transactions are recorded in the correct day book, supplier’s ledger, customer ledger and general ledger;
• Responsible for the full compliance with Company’s accounts regulations and the application of international accounting standards
• Develop, implement, and monitor effective systems for financial recording and reporting
• Supervise the preparation of all company’s financial reports and ensure they are up to date and comply with the latest relevant laws and legislations
• Conduct QC on all posting of all accounting transaction entered to the general ledger and the sub ledgers
• Review the company fixed asset reports and update to the management on a regular basis
• Review and consolidate the A/R and A/P reports and provide management the recommendations based on the analysis
• Approve the A/R collections and A/P payment and follow up with accountant the remaining collections and payments of A/R and A/P
• Analyze monthly department budgeting and accounting reports to maintain effective  expenditure controls

Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

job title: Senior Card Operation Officer – Dispute and Chargeback
position: Senior Card Operation Officer – Dispute and Chargeback
Job Description:
- Initiation of Chargeback, Re-presentment and report to line manager for any discrepancies.
- Perform the chargeback from all Issuing and Acquiring networks on daily basis to avoid any timeframe delays.
- Work with Card Schemes related to Dispute, Chargeback, Re-presentment, Arbitration, Pre-arbitration, Compliances to deliver based on the Payment network’s transaction life cycle.
- Solving all level escalated by the call center for all disputes transaction related to all Card Schemes.
- Perform day to day work related to customer dispute incoming and outgoing chargebacks related to all Card Schemes.
- Ensure all errors in the handling all the dispute and chargeback transactions.
- Ensure to control and analysis the loss of the bank and customer from chargeback/disputes.
- Track and ensure timely processing of all the chargebacks life cycle.
- Prepare and submission of all the exhibits, reports and ensure compliance with bank policy for all transaction processing.
- Report immediately on any urgent cases which needs to be fixed to comply with bank operation or fulfill customer needs.
- Learn and Adapt to Operating Regulations set by each International Card Scheme.
- Other Tasks are assigned by Manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Finance and Banking or equivalent.
- 3 to 5 years experiences with commercial banks.
- Good understanding about dispute, fraud transaction and chargeback process for CSS and International Card Scheme such as Visa, Master, UPI...
- Have knowledge and experience in VROL (Visa Resolve Online) process and other Card Schemes to raise or response to dispute transactions
- Good understanding of operational risk and regulation in banking sector, CSS and International Card scheme such as Visa, Master, UPI...etc.
- Knowledge and experience with reconciliation and dispute resolution with Card Schemes.
- Good at English and computer literation.
- High degree of self-motivation, high responsibility, hard-working and integrity.
- Flexible, willing to learn, able to work under pressure, good team work and interpersonal skill.

** Remunerations: Competitive salary with benefit packages, including two months bonus of basic salary, lunch allowance, insurance, uniform, etc.

** How to apply: CV with self-introduction letter to the following address: No 689B, Kampucheakrom Blvd, Sangkat Teuk Laak I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
- Tel : 023 999 990, Email : hr@dgbcambodia.com
- Only short-listed candidates will be invited for interview.

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer) ព្រៃវែង
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer) ព្រៃវែង
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (២០ នាក់): សាខាក្រុងភ្នំពេញ សាខាជ្រោយចង្វា សាខាស្រុកស្អាង សាខាក្រុងតាខ្មៅ សាខាស្រុកពាមរក៍ សាខាស្រុកគងពិសី និង​សាខាក្រុងកំពត

** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឱ្យបានទូលំទូលាយនូវផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញដៃគូសក្តានុពលទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅ
- វាយតម្លៃដៃគូ និងទ្រព្យធានាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព
- សម្របសម្រួលដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរក្សាគុណភាពឥណទានក្រោយពេលផ្តល់កម្ចីដល់ដៃគូ 
- ការងារដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:
- ចម្រើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍សមរម្យ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ ឱកាសដំឡើងតួនាទី ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភជួលម៉ូតូ ថ្លៃសាំង កាតទូរស័ព្ទ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ចំពោះសុខភាព ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់​២៤ម៉ោង និងប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​ 
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអំពីជំនាញ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
Job Requirement:
** គុណវុឌ្ឍិរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ត្រូវបានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ និងមានអទិភាពសម្រាប់និស្សិតថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគ្រប់ជំនាញ
- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ
- មានប្រវត្តិ​​ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការ​ធ្វើការ​ងារ​ជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រនៅតាមសហគមន៍
- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម​ ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ

** របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ:

Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer)ពោធិ៍សាត់
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (Loan Officer)ពោធិ៍សាត់
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីឥណទាន (២០ នាក់): សាខាក្រុងភ្នំពេញ សាខាជ្រោយចង្វា សាខាស្រុកស្អាង សាខាក្រុងតាខ្មៅ សាខាស្រុកពាមរក៍ សាខាស្រុកគងពិសី និង​សាខាក្រុងកំពត

** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយឱ្យបានទូលំទូលាយនូវផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញដៃគូសក្តានុពលទៅតាមតំបន់គោលដៅ
- វាយតម្លៃដៃគូ និងទ្រព្យធានាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព
- សម្របសម្រួលដំណើរការនៃការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរក្សាគុណភាពឥណទានក្រោយពេលផ្តល់កម្ចីដល់ដៃគូ 
- ការងារដទៃទៀតតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌគ្រឹះស្ថានចម្រើន

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:
- ចម្រើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍សមរម្យ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ ឱកាសដំឡើងតួនាទី ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភជួលម៉ូតូ ថ្លៃសាំង កាតទូរស័ព្ទ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ចំពោះសុខភាព ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់​២៤ម៉ោង និងប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​ 
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអំពីជំនាញ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
Job Requirement:
** គុណវុឌ្ឍិរបស់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន:
- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅយ៉ាងហោចណាស់ត្រូវបានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ និងមានអទិភាពសម្រាប់និស្សិតថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រគ្រប់ជំនាញ
- មានចំណេះដឹងដូចជា៖ លេខនព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាឱ្យមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអានស្តាប់ និងសរសេរបានខ្លះៗ
- មានប្រវត្តិ​​ និងអត្តចរិតល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានសុជីវធម៌ល្អ និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការ​ធ្វើការ​ងារ​ជាមួយប្រជាជនក្រីក្រនៅតាមសហគមន៍
- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ចូលចិត្តធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម​ ជាមនុស្សឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ចំពោះការងារ

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement:
- Experienced in retail business and in supervisory role with minimum 2 years.
- Good written and verbal English communication.
- Excellence in retail customer service.
- Ability to work flexible in schedule including days and nights.
Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.

Job Description:
A Business Development Executive is responsible for developing growth in the company through increased sales and customer acquisition. The job duties are to generate sales leads, contact potential clients, and nurture existing customer relationships.

I. Job Description:
- Identifying, qualifying, and securing business opportunities. Coordinating business generation activities and developing customized targeted sales strategies.
- Building business relationships with existing and potential clients.
- Understanding client needs and offering solutions and support. Answering potential client questions and follow-up call questions, responding to client requests for proposals (RFPs).
- Creating informative presentations, presenting, and delivering information to potential clients at client meetings.
- Creating and maintaining a list/database of prospect clients (Salesforce, CRM, Excel, etc.) of prospective client information.
- Collaborating with management on sales goals, planning, and forecasting. Maintaining short & long-term business development plans.
- Other task as assign by Business Development Manager.
Job Requirement:
- Excellent communication and presentation skills.
- Self-confident, problem solving, and high commitment.
- At least 1 year experience in sales or marketing.
- Related experience in retail business or FMCG is a plus. 
- Proficiency in English or able to communicate in Chinese is a plus.

Job Description:
• To write Lesson Plan and implement it accurately.
• Assists students in vision screening and growth assessments.
• Assists students with personal needs in their learning.
• Experience working with children will be an added
advantage.
• Creative, energetic and fun-loving with a positive
attitude.
• Strong interpersonal skills and is able to communicate
well with children, parents and colleagues.
• Follow school curriculum and particular set of course
timeline,
• Prepare lesson to suit with student learning abilities,
• Arouse the interest of students towards the lesson,
• Maintain students’ participation,
• Clearly focus on school’s subject matter,
• Design and implement supplementary activities,
• Motivate inactive or slow learning student to be more
active,
• Use English and/or Chinese language while teaching and
working in the school,
• Be proficient in all aspects of the subject,
• Address individual differences of the students,
• Diagnose learner's needs and remedy where necessary,
• Evaluate student learning outcomes through written, oral,
and practical methods,
• Adhere to the class schedule and school policy,
• Maintain a clean and orderly classroom,
• Inculcate a respect for school property and facilities in students,
• Conduct Parent-Teacher conferences,
• Help in any school program daily or occasionally,
• Always look after the students’ security,
• Attend technical meetings, administrative meetings,
planned school events and other school activities,

• Adopt new methodologies,
• Create standard exams for students,
• Help school events and/or activities.

• Native speaker of English
• Be flexible, patient and honest with strong commitment and
completing tasks.
• Experience at least two years in teaching performance in
their own skills area with supporting proof.
• Be punctual time and good inter-personal skills
• Be honest
• Feel free to get new innovation
• Skillful in teaching and improving students to specialize
in any skills they prefer.
• Support materials to students
• Experience working with young children,
• Good health with 2 year teaching experience at least,
• Good inter-personality and strong commitment,
• Knowing English well and computer literacy,
• Creative, energetic and fun-loving with a positive
attitude,
• Friendly and loves working with children,
• Punctual, responsible, and hard-working,
• Honest, punctual, responsible, hard-working and creative,
• Able to problem solve and work under pressure,

Job Description:
I. Admin Primary responsibilities

-	Plan develop and implement strategies and goals for the admin department, focused on continuous improvement and encouraging creativity and openness in the company
-	Manage the inventory of office stationary as well as borrowing list
-	Manage the transportation of trucks available to the company
-	Manage the repairs and maintenance of equipment
-Manage the schedule company/ employee expenses such as visa extension, company care inspection, etc
-	Ensure all staffs have a clean, safe and proper working environment
-	Manage and negotiate prices of the office related purchases
-	Support other department's needs
-	Train and monitor subordinates to follow process and procedure
-	Create new forms and update process if needed
-	Create and manage admistative department budget
-	Create and submit monthly reports of all the above duties to the directors.

II. HR Primary responsibilities

* Recruitment primary responsibilities
-	Explore the market best practices in the recruitment and staffing and implement appropriate best practices
-	Oversee shortlisting and reports to hiring managers about the recruitment matters
-	Act as a single point of contact and guide managers regarding recruitment matters
-	Design and implement a background check process
-	Assist and guide managers before/ during and after interviews

* Orientation primary responsibilities
-	Conduct orientation training and mandatory set of training for new employees
-	Lead and guide managers to design orientation training for each department

* Performance evaluation primary responsibilities
-	Lead and cooperate with other managers to upgrade current performance evaluation process
-	Guide other manager in setting goals and KPI for each department
-	Being responsible for performance management of employees in organization

* Employee relations
-	Design and implement surveys to access and analyses employee's current information
-	Facilitating employee relations and solving human resource issues on behalf of the company
-	Verify all announcements made to staffs
-	Manage all responsibilities regarding staffing administration
-	Implement and communicate disciplinary measure to employees

* Payroll primary responsibility
-	Verify all document for payroll preparation.

* Training and development
-	Identify areas of improvements within the organization and oversee the preparation and delivery the training
Job Requirement:
Other Requirements
-	Analytical mind that can identify problems
-	Creativity to provide solutions to complex problems
-	Organizational skill to handle and prioritize tasks
-	In-Dept understanding of office management procedures and departmental policies
-	Good in teamwork
-	Proficient in MS office
-	Detailed oriented
-	Have a strong sense of discretion to keep confidential information to a minimum few
-	Excellent English and communication skills
-	Self-motivated/goal oriented, leads by example
-	Leadership to lead and manage projects
-	Excellent communication skills
-	Excellent interpersonal skills
-	At least 5 years of experience in Admin/ HR/ Supervisor or manager role in an established company

job title: Business Director-Dynamic Distribution Co., Ltd (a division of Dynamic Pharma Group)
position: Business Director-Dynamic Distribution Co., Ltd (a division of Dynamic Pharma Group)
Job Description: As part of its transformative Dynamic 2.0 agenda, Dynamic Pharma Group seeks qualified talents with outstanding leading and managing skills to promote healthcare innovation in Cambodia. We wouldn’t be the industry leader at Dynamic without our successful leadership. We’re seeking an experienced Business  Director to help us drive existing and grow new business. Ideally, you have a strong understanding of the trading and distribution business, excellent people management skills and the ability to negotiate with key customers. Additionally, we seek an inspirational leader with solid strategic capability, problem-solving skills and extraordinary people management skills to build the competency of our team in place to deliver and meet future division‘s business requirements.Primary Objectives of the Position•The Business Director plays an essential role by leading and managing Dynamic Distribution team, providing strategic & operational input, being knowledgeable of all work completed and executed by the team and driving client relationships to maintain the trust in the team and grow new business.•The Business Director is responsible for the overall sales and operations and the optimum utilisation of the company’s resources to meet customer requirements. He/ She is accountable for the continual improvement of the division, and career development of the company personnel.Job Description•Drive the development and evaluation of short and long term strategic and financial objectives to ensure ongoing success for the DDC team•Utilizes available management or financial tools to monitor, control and/or improve all operating costs including direct payroll costs, staff productivity and administration costs•Analyses current market data reporting and reacts appropriately to relevant market trends and developments•Pro-actively manages the profitability & expansion of department’s product portfolio•Provides monthly updates of operational performance including current and projected financial performance by portfolio segment•Supervises and participates, where required, including costing review, sales negotiation….•Supervises and ensures a proper flow of processes between departments•Ensures all contracts or orders meet are profitable and meet customer specific requirements and contractual scope•Attract, manage, retain, and grow the Sales and Marketing Manager(s) and relevant staff to ensure their competency and ability to meet future division’s business requirements•Support knowledge transfer, knowledge sharing and skills accrual through relevant & appropriate learning / teaching channels•Collaborate with other departments where possible•Ensure efficient use of internal and external resource allocations•Keep up-to-date job descriptions or job responsibility for all DDC staff
Job Requirement: Job RequirementsQualification Required•Degree in business, science, engineering, or related field•Minimum 5 years working experience in sales, trading and distribution industry or similar industry (healthcare industry a plus)Skills Essential to the Position•A good command of the English (both verbal and written). Chinese will be considered as a plus •Excellent people management (leadership) skills•Strong problem solving and decision-making skills•Strong business acumen and ability to negotiate with key clients•Understands how to deliver through and with others in a way that motivates and drives high performance•Networking skills to generate new business leads •Ability and willingness to work in a matrix organization•High influencing skills and high client effectiveness.•Change agent both internally and externally.•Skills development – acquisition and retention of the best industry talent•Strong strategic capability and coupled with problem solving skills finding new and creative solutions to our client’s needs.•People management, self-motivation and a positive outlook on things will help get you through the tough times when pressure is high, and client demands unwavering.Essential Personal Attributes•Team player •Ability to remain calm in a highly pressurized environment•Willingness to continue learning •Confident•Assertive•Resilient•Proactive•Meticulous with attention to detail•Flexible to work beyond normal office hours (overtime when required)
Company Profile:
The Dynamic Group has been supporting Cambodia's healthcare, agriculture, quality control industries for the last 20s years. Our vision is improving Quality of Life, Shaping Better Tomorrows. With over 400 highly-qualified staffs, the Dynamic Group leads in applying global technologies and delivering value to the various communities that we are serving.

With no fewer than seven companies in its stable, the Dynamic Group brings the world’s latest technological advancements to one of the world’s fastest growing economies.

All of our companies in Dynamic Group are:
-Dynamic Pharma
-Agrotech Vita
-Dynamic Scientific
-Dynamic Distribution
-Dynamic Chemicals
-Dynamic Argon
-Dynamic Technologies

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Job Description: • To ensure effective utilization of warehouse loading, unloading, stocking, and safekeeping of items to maintain the quality of finished goods in order to prevent product damage and avoid the occurrence of pilferage, accidents, and occupational hazards.• Effectively monitor flow of goods and implements first- In First- Out (FIFO) methods in the use of raw materials and dispatching of finished goods.• To coordinates with the procurement department with regards to incoming deliveries of raw materials and supplies.• To coordinates with production, packaging, and distribution with regards to transfer and dispatch of finished goods.• To effectively prepare and monitor the forklift team supporting to the production side.• To effectively prepare and monitor the Warehouse team to issue finished goods to transport agents, make sure 100% OTIF and Zero complaints.• Be initiative of hazardous point protection proposal to management inside the warehouse and distribution operation.• To ensure accuracy of product inventories against system records by conducting cycle counts on a periodic basis following appropriate guidelines by accounting and audit departments• To conducts regular cycle count as per established schedules and guidelines. Evaluates and analyze inventory variance. Implements preventive countermeasures based on the result of inventory variance analysis. • To resolve inventory discrepancies in coordination with the accounting department. • To ensure the integrity and completeness of logistics records and manuals• To provide clear directions and general guidance to the department in the formulation of standard operating procedures. • To plan and optimize warehouse and distribution products to meet Key Performance Indicators and cost-efficiency.• To initiate, execute or participate in suitable action where necessary to improve logistics operations.• To develop and train warehouse personnel from time to time on safety, warehouse, and distribution competencies to enhance the knowledge.• Be possible to operate a forklift to support operations base on the real situation.• To do other related tasks required by superior Management.• To work effectively and efficiently to comply with the quality management system ISO 9001 and food safety management system ISO 22000 requirement.

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)

•	បំពាក់សម្ភារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យឯកសារ (បិទលេខកូដ សលាកប័ត្រខ្ចីសង Barcode ពាក្យកម្មសិទ្ធ និងស្លាកផ្សេងៗ)
•	ស្នើសុំសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•	រាប់ស្តុកសៀវភៅ

•	ចងក្រងប្រវត្តិសកម្មភាពដែលមានក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ
•	ប្រគល់កាសែតទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបណ្ណសារដ្ឋាន (ចំពោះតាមសាខាប្រគល់ទៅផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល)

•	ចែកបណ្ណសរសើរដល់សមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ

•	រៀបចំតុបតែងសោភ័ណភាពបណ្ណាល័យទៅតាមព្រឹត្តិការណ៍សកម្មភាពបណ្ណាល័យ និងបុណ្យប្រពៃណីជាតិ និងអន្តរជាតិ
•	ធ្វើបញ្ជីចំណងជើងសៀវភៅដែលត្រូវស្នើសុំទិញបន្ថែម
•	ចុះបញ្ជីសារពើភ័ណ្ឌសម្ភារ និងចុះបញ្ជីសៀវភៅចូល
•	ជួយការងារផ្នែកផ្សេងៗតាមការស្នើសុំជាក់ស្តែង
•	ទទួលការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង-មន្ទីរអប់រំ សម្រាប់ថ្នាក់បឋមសិក្សា មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ (សម្រាប់តែបណ្ណាល័យ សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង)
Job Requirement:
•	ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬវិញ្ញាបនបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
•	ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញបណ្ណារក្ស និងបញ្ចប់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ
•	ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស
•	ទទួលបានវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs,
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Information Officer at Chroy Changva Campus
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Information Officer at Chroy Changva Campus
Job Description:
•	Answering to in person and multi-line phone system.
•	Know about customer’s need.
•	Input the information from student test and take code number.
•	Help candidates to register Aii, AIS, CSL, TSL, and TOEFL Preparation course.
•	Receive in-document form other entities and submit it to Administrative Department.
•	Receive CV and process it to Administrative Department/HR.
•	Help Candidates to register for TOEFL iBT and send the candidate’s name to TOEFL Administrative officer and Finance team.
•	Collect money from Registration form (Students who wish to take placement test and/or entrance exam.) and give it to Finance daily.
•	Compile statistics of test taker, visitors asking and generate reports daily, weekly and monthly and send via email.
•	Input CV in to file share for HR department.
•	Check and update Office’s stationary and inventory to make sure that they are able to use or replace or lose or buy new.
•	Input visitors asking information in to information report.
•	Compile student writing test by monthly.
•	Write monthly and Term report and send via email.
•	Check and update Office’s Fixed Asset to make sure that they have stayed at the same place or moved out.
•	Keep the front desk area & lobby clean and well-organized.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree or a closely related field.
•	Sound knowledge of Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook.
•	1+ years of experience.
•	Able to communicate in English and other language are welcomed.
•	Strong communicate skills, problem solving.
•	Can-do attitude, self-confidence, firm stance.

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
•	Process the new student placement test, invigilate, mark the test and contact the interviewer to conduct the interview.
•	Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.
•	Input students’ results into database system and commit to human-error-free work.
•	Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. 
•	Move Aii students who have paid school fee for semester or year to the next term.
•	Ensure the staff and student ID cards are issued on time and record and report of ID card issuance including broken ID card for Administration Supervisor (AS). Frequently check with warehouse about ID card and ensure it must not run out of stock.
•	Be in charge of organizing events either inside or outside the organization/school. Make sure proper checklist of items used in each event are recorded and return back to stock when the event’s finished.
•	Conduct the student’s opinion survey of American Intercon School.
•	Conduct the student’s opinion survey of Aii Language Center. 
•	Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.
•	Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts.
•	Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts. Drinking water, coffee, tea and other materials must be checked and report to Administration Supervisor.
•	Design for internal use.
•	And other assigned tasks.

** Sub-Responsibilities:
1.	Maintain and record In-and-Out documents, and process In & Out documents to the relevant departments.
2.	Give reception and make of the Student Certification Letter such as; reference, transcripts, recommendation letter and other official letters.
3.	Create and update Aii class schedule by term.
4.	Check and update Office’s stationary and inventory to make sure that they are able to use or replace or lose or buy new.
5.	Check and update Office’s Fixed Asset to make sure that they have stayed at the same place or moved out.
6.	Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. 
7.	Ensuring the memo, poster, and announcement are posted on the bulletin board regularly.
8.	Stamping on documents, letter to parents, certificates and other official documents.
9.	Printing monthly attendance sheet for Aii at the end of the month.
10.	Design for internal use.
11.	And other assigned tasks.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree in Management, Education or other related fields.
•	Administrative and Organizational Skills
•	Experienced in dealing with administrative affairs in school or education field
•	Be able to use office applications including Word, Excel, Power Point, and E-mail.
•	Be able to communicate with team and can complete work with tight timelines and multiple deadlines.

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Gynecologist (គ្រូពេទ្យជំនាញខាងផ្នែករោគស្ត្រី)
Job Description:
• Perform regular annual exams on patient
• Analyze records, reports, test results, or examination information to diagnose medical condition of the patient
• Explain procedures and discuss test result or prescribed treatment with patients
• Collect, record, and maintain patient information such as medical histories, reports, and examination results
• Monitor patient over the course of pregnancies
• Treat infection of the cervix, ovaries and Fallopian tubes
• Identify cancerous growths within the reproductive system
• Refer patient to medical specialist or another practitioner when necessary
• Provide postnatal care to new mother
• Educated patients on practices that promote wellness and health and instructed on a measure to Detect any abnormality or aberration in the female body such as breast self-examination

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
•Perform routine examinations of patients
• Understand patients’ health conditions based on symptoms and tests
• Suggest treatments based on findings
• Give appropriate health service
• Set diagnosis based on medical expertise and knowledge.
• Access patient’s medical history
• Examine, analyze and interpret lab test results
• Provide different medical treatments, medications and drugs.
• Collaborate with team members
• Keep records of patients’ progress and history
• Adhere to laws, rules and regulations
• Refer patients to specialists if necessary.
Job Requirement:
• Doctor of medicine degree (MD)
• Previous working experience as a Doctor for 5 years
• Proficient at patient charting and knowledgeable in relevant charting computer programs
• Ability to multi-task efficiently and effectively
• Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with patients, medical staff, management and peers.

•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
