Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
- Knows all the features and benefits of the payroll’s products and services in order to efficiently train and cross sell
- Assist the branch manager/Business banking to manage the relationship with business clients
- Anticipate clients' needs and provide client solutions for both liability and asset business proactively
- Ensure close asset monitoring in compliance with bank's policies and systems
- Build and maintain strong relationship with new and existing customer
- Anticipate and resolve internal hurdles with a sense of urgency and consistency
- Promote the use of technology in line with the bank's digital-centric first strategy
- Ensure compliance to regulations and bank's policies and system
- Maximize the products and services bundling
- Maximize customer profitability through the CRM platform
- Ensure to deliver the service to the client with a respectful timeline
- Able to monitor daily customer activities and produce report to line manager
- Ensure smooth service to customer in term of Internet Banking
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s degree in Banking and other related fields
- At least 2 years experiences in banking service of payroll and trade finance
- Strong problem solving, analytical and decision-making ability
- Have experiences and/or understanding of customer centricity, agile delivery, etc
- Be innovative and think out of the box
- Have an internal drive to achieve goals/excellence/efficiencies
- Intrapreneurship with good networking
- Provide effective strategies and action plans
- Develop subordinates and share best practices with peer
- Have team leadership skills
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
- Well plan work schedule and timetables
- Implement action plans (e.g. make regular calls/visits, take orders, etc.) to achieve sales targets for assigned businesses/territories
- Execute sales activities for assigned businesses/territories, including product portfolios, marketing display set-ups, point of sales material display and in-store merchandising
- Increase number of new outlets in assigned businesses/territories
- Prepare and/or review quotations, proposals and contracts to facilitate sales agreements, outlets sponsorship, signboard and build board placement
- Build effective relationship with the agents’ owner and staff to ensure timely delivery of products to all wholesale and retail outlets within the assigned businesses/territories sales
- Ensure agents are well implement the sales promotion well based on the guidelines from Trade Marketing
- Maintain a customer complaints/issues log and follow up on customer issues
- Respond to customer orders and queries. Inform current and prospective customers of promotions and new/upgraded products
- Report on the activities and products of the competitors via inputs to the competition reports
- Document daily sales activities, prepare accurate reports and communicate to sales supervisor
Job Requirement:
-Diploma in Sales/Marketing/Business or equivalent
-Preferably sales experience with other FMCG (Fast Moving Consumer Goods) companies

Leadership Expectations:
-Ability to connect and build trust through authentically empathy and logic
-Ability to shape the future by thinking big and setting a clear strategy
-Ability to develop, grow and motivate our people
-Ability to set and deliver against ambitious targets by raising the bar and taking ownership for results
-Ability to lead by example, promoting and role modelling the Heineken Behaviors in everything we do

* Technical Skills:

-Management knowledge
-Problem-solving skills
-Negotiation and persuasive skills
-Possess valid driving license.

-Language Requirement:
-English: Intermediate level in written and spoken

Job Description:
•            Ensure the tax related are calculated accurately, pay, and submit in the proper timeline.

•            Facilitate the accounting GL to make sure it is reconciling and properly declaration.

•            Communicate with internal team and tax auditor in tax audit event.

•            Advise internal improvement to minimize tax audit exposure.

•            Ensure the tax administrative are proper manage and compliance base on GDT such as the tax ruling, tax update on new business/branch registration, DTA…

•            Report monthly on tax payment and tax audit to management.

•            Facilitate the process document flow with the related team. 

•            Prepare Tax Budget and report management for any concerns with appropriate solution proposed.

•            Maintain and coordinate with accounting team to extract data for tax declaration efficiency.

•            Training both new and existing subordinate about new tax update and other soft skills required by businesses.

•            Advise management on the impact of new laws on tax issues. 

•            Other tasks assigned by Management.
Job Requirement:
•            Bachelor’s degree in accounting or a related field.

•            At least 2 years of experience in accounting and/or Tax

•            Certificate of tax agent is a must.

•            Certificate of accounting technician is preferred. 

•            Knowledge of accounting transaction in the multi kinds of business such as trading, retail, manufacturing, hotel & hospitality… are preferred.

•            Knowledge of Cambodia Tax Law

•            Advance MS Office skills

•            Understanding Accounting standard which recognized by MoEF.

•            SAP system and other system are preferred

•            Strong presentation and report-writing skills in English and Khmer

•            Strong in Leadership skill

•            Ability to work under pressure

•            Presentation skill

•            Time management skill
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. Job Description:
** Reporting Line: Transport Supervisor

** Key Responsibilities:
1. Risk Prevention
- Monitor fleet movement using CCTV footage
- Detect risky behavior, aggressive driving, and fraudulent practices, and take immediate action to stop the event and report to supervisor/transporters.
- Analyzed triggered events on system and take immediate actions with Transporters/ Drivers.
- Coordinate with Transporters in maintaining updated Driver list.
- Register new zones, and drivers into System.
- Coordinate with Transporters, Dispatcher to have faulty equipment repaired/replaced/upgraded.
- Assist with accidents, fraud, and complaints investigation, by collecting all relevant supporting data and footages.
- Conduct random checks on driver teams by calls and/or toolbox meetings.
- Verify driver working/rest time before each trip.
- Promote safety culture and safe practices to Transporters and drivers.

2. Performance Control
- Submit daily reports on Fleet Movement using data retrieved from system.
- Host monthly toolbox meeting / Drivers/Transporters to discuss monthly driver performance and issues and submit the minute of meeting to all relevant stakeholders.
- Assist with driver appraisal preparation, by verifying Transporters’ submitted nominations.
- Summarize monthly driver/transporters violations to supervisor, for review and penalties.
Job Requirement:
- Educational background: IT or Business Administration preferably from Logistics related field
- Experience: Basic understanding of logistic & supply chain in logistic operation, working with OBC (On-Board Computer) system, CCTV, or fleet telematics
- Skills: MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word), E-mail (Outlook), Group Chat Application (Telegram/WhatsApp), Google Map.
- Language: Good proficiency in English both Speaking and Writing
Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Our 105,000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable, clean, reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries, TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people. 

TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been officially operating in Cambodia since 1993. Throughout the country, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been involved in marketing various energy and lubricants products and services to its customers in both the private and public sectors. We offer a wide range of products through more than 100 service stations with over 52 Bonjour Shops, Industrial fuels, Aviation fuels and lubricants. Through the TotalEnergies Card, customers are offered a convenient way to make and manage fuel purchases. Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

In view of supporting its growth in Cambodia, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.  is looking for a talented and motivated candidate for the position as follow:


Applications should be submitted via email: sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com *Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms Lypy LY   sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St 271, Beoung Tumpun, Meanchey, Phnom Penh – CAMBODIA

Job Description:
** Reporting Line: Manager, Treasury & Reporting

** Key Responsibilities:
- Ensure an accuracy of treasury cycle of the entity (incoming and outgoing payment)
- Reconcile and ensure proper accounting records of entity transactions
- Proactively performs preventive quality controls and takes correctives actions when necessary
- Ensure full compliance to the company’s HSEQ procedures and guidelines
- Assist in reviewing customer accounts and propose for the clearing
- Assist in reconciliation of the daily collection, i.e. by Cash, Cheque and Bank transfer, ensure complete and timely posting into SAP
- Assist in reviewing vendor accounts and propose for clearing (Part of balance sheet clen up project).
- Assist in reviewing unknown incoming payment
- Other task assigned by direct supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Education: Fresh Graduate student in Accounting Finance or Banking
- Skills: Understanding of mathematics and the accounting flows
- Language: Good command of Khmer/English writing and speaking.
- Period of intern: 6 months up to 1 year

Applications should be submitted via sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com or to our Head Office, ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St. 271, B.P600, 12351 Phnom Penh, Cambodia Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.

Job Description:
** Reporting Line: Vice President of Corporate Affairs

** Key Responsibilities:
I. Primary functions: Responsible for all legal-related matters within TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (“TEMC”) and its affiliates, which can be in the forms of, but not limited to:
- Key coordinator for contract management within TEMC with accurate contract master list (i.e. orderly safe keeping of all original contracts, amendments, licenses, permits and other legal documents)
- Reviewing, amending or drafting of contracts and/or MOUs following the Company or Regional templates and rules, independently engaging and seeking advice from VPCA, regional legal team and local law firm(s), if necessary
- Ensuring that Company and Regional policies are incorporated and adapted into local contracts/agreements and/or any other legal documents
- Key coordinator to organize relevant documents required for the processing of application and/or renewal of licenses and permits (e.g. construction permits and licenses, VAT/Patent certificate renewal) for the smooth operations of TEMC
- Preparing, coordinating with commercial and finance team, sending and following up debt recoveries from defaulting customers
- Responsible for the timely execution of the relevant board and shareholder’s resolutions and minutes of meetings and if necessary to work with any Company Secretary engaged by TEMC
- Coordinating with local and regional legal team/lawyers on all legal-related matters, queries, cases, issues and concerns
- Key responsibility to monitor and keep abreast of any new and/or changes to laws and regulations (especially within Cambodia) which have on TEMC and its affiliates through regular memo updates (e.g. email) to VP CA and relevant management within TEMC

II. Primary functions: Responsible for assisting the Corporate Compliance Officer (the “CCO”) in its compliance-related tasks within TEMC and its affiliates, which can be in the forms of, but not limited to:
- Ensuring adoption of the Group’s Compliance Program, monitoring and reporting the effectiveness, violation and non-conformities
- Assisting the CCO in communicating, promoting the programs, creating awareness, preparing reports, handling activities and training the employees on compliance-related subjects including review of Due Diligence reporting
- Ensuring, reviewing, safekeeping of all compliance-related documentation using the tools, database, Group regulations, internet search, archiving, including but not limited to, reviewing due diligence documentation and discussion, resolution on potential mitigation measures,
- Assisting the CCO on documentation and investigation of potential or reported cases of fraud, whistleblowing, conflict of interest and other non-compliance with the Group policies.
- Develop, maintain and review of policies on Compliance Program’s general operation to prevent or deal with improper, unethical and illegal conduct of an employee or group of employees or third parties (ie. customers, dealers, suppliers, representatives, business partners)
- Keeping abreast of regulatory environment and Group policies as well as evolving best practices in compliance control.

** Accountabilities:
- Matters related to legal guidelines and internal compliance policies to monitor enforcement and implementation of such guidelines and policies
- Responsible for alerting, updating and escalating any legal and compliance issues to the CCO/VPCA including any incident of corruption, fraud, non-compliance, antitrust violation, among others, which comes to his/her attention in the course of executing his/her tasks.
- Be abreast on any introduction or amendment of existing regulations, locally and internationally, and with the Group policies and standards affecting TC and its affiliates.
Job Requirement:
- Education: Bachelor of Law with minimum three years’ experience in corporate environment
- Having an analytical mind able to see the complexities of procedures and Cambodian regulations
- Having thorough knowledge on relevant Cambodian laws with excellent communication skills in English and Khmer languages, both written and verbal.

Applications should be submitted via sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com or to our Head Office,
- ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St. 271, B.P600, 12351 Phnom Penh, Cambodia 
- Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Our 105,000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable, clean, reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries, TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people. 

TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been officially operating in Cambodia since 1993. Throughout the country, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been involved in marketing various energy and lubricants products and services to its customers in both the private and public sectors. We offer a wide range of products through more than 100 service stations with over 52 Bonjour Shops, Industrial fuels, Aviation fuels and lubricants. Through the TotalEnergies Card, customers are offered a convenient way to make and manage fuel purchases. Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

In view of supporting its growth in Cambodia, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.  is looking for a talented and motivated candidate for the position as follow:

job title: Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) & Public Relations Coordinator
position: Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) & Public Relations Coordinator
Job Description:
** Reporting Line: VP HR & CSR

** Key Responsibilities:
- Develop an effective CSR programs/plans as per Group and Company policy. Our main CSR pillars are road safety, forest and climate, cultural dialogue and heritage and education and young inclusion.
- Establish a mechanism and strategy to engage employees in CSR activities.
- Establish a CSR Steering Committee within the Company and ensure a working relationship.
- Monitor budget and spending relevant to CSR initiatives and identify improvement areas.
- Coordinate and direct public relations activities to increase the image of the Company.
- Being the representative of the Company for official events with relevant ministries, local authorities, community, etc.
- Keep up to date with all beneficiaries and establish solid networking and rapport with institutions, NGOs and local authorities.
- Implement SRM+ tool for CSR program, evaluate and report CSR initiatives & activities and ensure annual report to Singapore & Paris.
- Responsible for raising brand awareness of company’s commitment to CSR and generating publicity for the Company.
- Manage all aspects of events by booking, preparing estimates, contracts, coordinate event functions, supervise event services and manager on duty for events. Coordinates and oversee all phases of events giving great attention to detail, while maintaining high standards of customer service. Our internal events include but not limited to staff party, annual trip, innovation days, diversity day, etc.
- Other tasks may be assigned by the Supervisor.
Job Requirement:
- Education: Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Business/
Development Management
- Experience: At least 3 years experiences in managing CSRs and/or PR for a multinational company
- Skills: Strong Presentation and Communications skills, Excellent organizational and project skills, Ability to work independently and collaboratively with business heads and department leaders.
- Languages: Good command of English and French both oral & writing

Job Description:
Reporting Line: Fleet and Training Supervisor

** Key Responsibilities:
- Ensure the Compliance of Road Transport with Group & HSEQ Standards/Procedures and local requirements
- Organizing the preventive and curative maintenance with Transporter to increase availability of trucks
- Coordinate with Transporter for Tanks/ flow meter Calibration, NMC (National Metrology Center) are performed before prior expiration.
- Guarantee that licenses / regulations of transporters are performed prior expiration
- Conduct Analysis of Deviations/ Near miss /accident (Client Complaints/Incident, Losses) and propose Action Plans to Supervisor
- Coordinate with dispatching regarding availability of truck and drivers
- Coordinate in case customer complaints and corrective actions
- Conduct Road risk assessment for all route plan/ Authorize stop to ensure all the risks are covered and mitigated.
- Refer to fuel delivery procedure and coordinate with Transport Supervisor to set up the blind spot in the OBC system (On board Computer system).
- Organize the truck vetting / conduct spot checks of the trucks / coordinate with Depots regarding prior to load checklist
- Investigate product spillages and losses and customer complaints
- Implementation of Action Plans from for all the Transport area base on the finding, audit, safety inspection and others.
- Implement PATROM latest version and Truck Invariant for the trucks. Ensure proper preparation for ICT and SMT audit (Inspection Conformity of Transporter and Transport Management System). The gap analysis to be discussed with Supervisor to ensure the gap is fulfilled according
to the guideline and standard. Other works assign by Supervisor or Transport Manager
Job Requirement:
- Education: At least diploma in mechanical or technical degree
- Experience: A minimum of 3-year of mechanical / vehicle technical experience
- Good knowledge about mechanics and technical equipment and in the management of drivers.
- Appropriate valid driving license, Truck driving license category minimum (C) optimal (E) is a plus
- Skills: Very good communication in English and Knowledge of procedures / safety and management

job title: Senior Unit Manager, Bancassurance for Partnership and Development - 01Post.
position: Senior Unit Manager, Bancassurance for Partnership and Development - 01Post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “ Senior Unit Manager, Bancassurance for Partnership and Development "position is responsible for managing all insurance partners including life insurance, non-life insurance, and micro insurance with hattha bank. Moreover, the successful candidate requires to perform partnership evaluation, conduct market study, competitor analysis, develop marketing strategy, promotion campaign to ensure the performance growth align with bank’s strategy and operational plan.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Corporate with strategic insurance partners including life insurance, general insurance and micro-insurance who operating in Cambodia..Evaluate the Bancassurance Partnership with regular basis.Lead of facilitate the registration with regulators..Assess Customer need, market study and competition analysis for the insurance product improvement..Prepare and facilitate the Medium-Term Business Plan and yearly operational plan for the company..Lead and facilitate the development of the new products for the company..Manage and improve Bancassurance Business to ensure its performance well align with the company strategy..Facilitate the preparation of the marketing strategy, promotional campaign, marketing activities, message communication to market to ensure the mislead communication..Ensure the distribution agreement and the license with regulators are up to date..Support, facilitate between branch, insurer on claim request, customer complaint, provide suitable solution for customers..Manage product budget and performance vs plan.Perform other task as assigned by management.
Job Requirement: .Master degree or Bachelor degree in finance and banking or business management, or related fields..At least 05 years experiences in insurance business industry and 02 years in leadership and management..Prior other financial product management experience is preferred..Extensive knowledge in insurance products, analytical, quantitative, problem solving, communication (written and .verbal), presentation, relationship management skills..Be proficient in English both speaking and writing..Be innovative, dynamic, and confident.
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description:
Internal Auditor (Senior)
- Perform the full audit cycle including risk management and control management over operations’ effectiveness, financial reliability and compliance with all applicable standard report, company policy and Cambodia tax regulation. 
- Determine internal audit scope and develop the manual to improve internal process.
- Obtain, analyses and evaluate documentation, previous reports, data, flowcharts etc.,
- Prepare and present reports that reflect audit’s results and document process
- Identify loopholes and recommend risk aversion measures and cost savings
- Document process and prepare audit findings memorandum
- Conduct follow up audits to monitor management’s interventions
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s Degree in accounting• At least 2 years experience in Audit • Proficient in MS Office, accounting software• Ability to manipulate large amounts of data and to compile detailed reports• Proven knowledge of auditing standards and procedures, laws, rules and regulations • Good in Khmer and English both verbal and written.Benefit- Life insurance/ធានារ៉ាប់រងជិវិត- Health Care/ សេវាសុខភាពរដ្ឋ (National)- NSSF / គ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ- Annual Leave/ ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ- Public Holiday/ ការឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិ- Day Off / ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំខែ ៦-៧ថ្ងៃ/ខែ- Sick Leave, Maternity leave, Special Leave /ឈប់សម្រាកឈឺ មាតុភាព សម្រាកពិសេស- Annual Party and Monthly staff birthday/ កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និង ខួបកំណើតបុគ្គប្រចាំខែ- Bonus 2 times a year/ ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ពីរដង/ឆ្នាំ- Time Attendence/ ប្រាក់មកទៀតទាត់- Gasoline /ប្រាក់បន្ថែមថ្លៃសាំង- Annual Salary Increaseតំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ- 01 Meal អាហារមួយពេល- Uniform /ឯកសណ្ឋាន- Overtime if any/ ប្រាក់ថែមម៉ោង បើមាន- Internal training local and international/ ការហ្វឹកហាត់ការងារក្នុង និងក្រៅប្រទេស- Employee Annual Trip/ ដំណើរកំសាន្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំ សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកLocation Basis: AEON (Cambodia) Co., Ltd - Sen Sok BranchIf you are interested in this vacancy, you can send your resume and cover attach with photo to either our email address or AEON Cambodia with AEON MALL PHNOM PENH - along Sothearos BLVD.Potential candidate will be invited for interview at the earliest conveniences.

Job Description:
•Lead and develop members of your team utilizing the tools and processes developed by HR
•Ensure that the leadership and development of the people in your team is given sufficient time and focus 
•Proactively act as a coach and mentor to your team to enable them to improve their skills and knowledge 
•Identify and resolve employee/team problems and conflict 
•Support in the recruitment of suitable people for your team and the company as a whole 
•Act as a ‘subject matter expert’ in your area of expertise, sharing that knowledge on Sales Operations to your team & colleagues
•Ensure you continue to develop your knowledge and expertise through your own ‘personal career development’ and utilizing training and development offered by company
•Act as an advocate of the company, promoting it internally and externally. This includes creating and managing any social media to share, like and comment on the company’s published content.
•Direct, motivate, & support professional sales team to accomplish their objectives 
•Manage sales activities and daily sales deal status in Odoo-CRM, expenses reporting, and cross-functional reporting (Such as Stock, Service, BPO, etc.) with own area of responsibility. Grow network with own area of responsibility
•Accountable for ensuring all RMA’s policies and procedure are follow within the showrooms and/or responsible area.
•Advise sales team through the sales process, including but not limited to prospecting -> closing area
•Coach and mentor sales team on the following topics; including but not limited to needs, features & benefits, closing deals, time and territory management, negotiating, product knowledge, and productivity improvement
•Create and monitor annual sales department benchmarks and budget, in alignment with the organization’s financial and operational objectives
•Ensure customer satisfaction. Work with the sales team to know the customer’s current and future expectations (Customer Talk) and work with all departments to resolve customer concern/issue.
•Lead the sales team to effectively understand and use manufacturer’s products and programs to attain acceptable market share levels.
•Foster an engaged work environment within the locations, encouraging accountability, open communication, teamwork, and a commitment to serving the customer.
•Ensure that the company/location reputation and image in the community is consistent with RMA/AED Integrated Core Values, and that business relationships with all stakeholders are not compromised
•Responsible for ensuring that sound and safe business practices and processes are implemented and continuously improved to effectively and efficiently achieve ethical business objectives
•Perform all other duties as assigned by management in a professional and efficient manner.
•Full responsible for P & L of own department/area of responsibility
•Manage costs at reasonable levels and in line with Budget
•Actively advise any concerns related to profitability of Sales Department
•Report to DGM/GM 
•Meet with Aftersales, Marketing, and other Sales Dept, regularly to evaluate inter-departmental concerns on skills and performance required for each individual for improvement 
•Closely liaise with RMA Group on policy matters
•Maintain active relationships with key OEMs as required
•Develop and maintain good relationships with customers, business partners, networking people, government and private sectors
•This position is based in Phnom Penh Office, or any of AED branches, and required to travel (>60%) to visit and support sales team in provinces of responsibility, require regular routine calendar and respond to urgent needs as per business operation’s requirement 
•Hold valid Driving License
Job Requirement:
•Bachelor degree level in Business Management  or related fields, especially Agriculture business
•Minimum of 4 years of experiences in Sales or related field
•Record in successfully running Sales Dept. or related field
•Have good knowledge in Agriculture and/or Heavy equipment
•Ability to lead, training, and coach subordinate well 
•Listening, Understanding and Responding
•Mentoring, Coaching & Performance Management 
•Knowledge of business Environment
•Achievement
•Excellent written and verbal communication skills
•Excellent presentation and facilitation skills
•A person of good character – someone in whom the owner/manager can place full trust and confidence
•Ability to use MS office applications – Power Point, Word, Excel & Outlook
•Ability to build relationships with internal and external partners
•Excellent organization skills – able to prioritize 

How to apply?
Interested candidates are invited to submit your updated curriculum vita  recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net or may also contact us on Tel: 092 888 714/ 071 444 1004/ 070 77 83 83  for inquiring or application.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

job title: មន្ត្រីប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា - ០១ នាក់
position: មន្ត្រីប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា - ០១ នាក់
Job Description: ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់, រៀបចំបញ្ជីប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ, រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ប័ណ្ណដាក់/ដកប្រាក់ ផ្ញើទៅកាន់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការ, បិទគណនីសន្សំសំចៃ, បោះពុម្ពរបាយការណ៍ឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងបំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា ឬនាយកសាខា។Location: សាខាស្រុកបរសេដ្ឋ - ឃុំភារីមានជ័យDuties and Responsibilities.គ្រប់គ្រងសាច់ប្រាក់ទៅក្នុងប្រអប់BOO និងក្នុង Till របស់ខ្លួនអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។.រៀបចំប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់នីមួយៗក្នុងថ្ងៃ អោយបានទាន់ពេlវេលា និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។.រៀបaចំបញ្ជីប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាក់ស្តែង ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា។.រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ប័ណ្ណដាក់/ដកប្រាក់ និងផ្ញើទៅកាន់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការ។.បិទគណនីសន្សំសំចៃ។.បោះពុម្ពរបាយការណ៍ឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។.បំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការសាខា ឬនាយកសាខា ឬថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងដែលមានសមត្ថកិច្ច។
Job Requirement: .បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិស្សិតឆ្នាំទី៤ ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។.មានអត្តចរិកល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ និងមានឆន្ទ:ក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ។.មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងកុំព្យូទ័រ Ms. Office (Ms. Word & Excel) Internet & Email។
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

job title: ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្ដិការសាខា - ០១ នាក់
position: ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្ដិការសាខា - ០១ នាក់
Job Description: គោលបំណងសំខាន់ៗនៃតួនាទីជា “ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្ដិការសាខា” គឺមានការទទួលខុសត្រូវបំពេញមុខតំណែងតាមផែនការកំណត់ មានសមត្ថភាពគ្រប់គ្រាន់ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងចាត់ចែងកិច្ចការផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការកម្រិតសាខា បំពេញតាមតម្រូវការចាំបាច់របស់ការិយាល័យសាខា។Location: សាខាស្រុកភ្នំក្រវ៉ាញ-ឃុំលាចDuties and Responsibilities.គ្រប់គ្រង និងរាយការណ៍អំពីចលនាសាច់ប្រាក់ទាំងអស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃក្នុងកម្រិតសាខា។.រៀបចំផែនការលំហូរសាច់ប្រាក់ និងការផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់/រាយការណ៍ចំនួនសាច់ប្រាក់លើស ឬខ្វះ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃប្រសិនបើមាន។.គ្រប់គ្រង/ត្រូតពិនិត្យឯកសារនៃប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់ និង មិនមែនសាច់ប្រាក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ/អនុម័តលើប្រតិបត្តិការសាច់ប្រាក់ និងមិនមែនសាច់ប្រាក់ លើឯកសារដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ។.រៀបចំ ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរក្សាទុកដាក់ឯកសារចំណាយ/ចំណូលប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងរៀបចំបិទបញ្ជីសាច់ប្រាក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ទាំងក្នុង និងក្រៅប្រព័ន្ធ (ក្នុងបញ្ជី)។.បង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយធនាគារជាដៃគូ គ្រប់គ្រង និងធានាការផ្តល់ព័ត៌មាន និងសេវាកម្មជូនអតិថិជនបានល្អប្រសើរ។.គ្រប់គ្រង ឬត្រួតពិនិត្យ/អនុម័តក្នុងការបង្កើត CIF គណនីឥណទាន គណនីសន្សំសំចៃ គណនីបញ្ញើមានកាលកំណត់ និងបិទគណនី។.ត្រួតពិនិត្យឯកសារបុគ្គលិក ឥណទាន គណនីសន្សំសំចៃ ឯកសារទ្រព្យធានា និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗ។.ត្រួតពិនិត្យចលនាបុគ្គលិក សៀវភៅការងារ ជ្រើសរើសប្រតិភូបុគ្គលិក និងការវាយតម្លៃបុគ្គលិកសាខា។.រៀបចំ ឬផ្តល់វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល បង្ហាត់បង្ហាញ សិក្ខាសាលា ព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ និងជំនួយផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស។.ត្រួតពិនិត្យការបញ្ជារទិញ ទូទាត់នៅសាខា និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ ឬថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិ ឲ្យបានទៀតទាត់ ព្រមទាំងគ្រប់គ្រងការដឹកជញ្ជូន ឬលទ្ធកម្ម។
Job Requirement: .កំពុងសិក្សា ឬបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រជំនាញ គ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម គណនេយ្យ ធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ។.មានការយល់ដឹងលើការងារផ្នែក គណនេយ្យ បេឡាធិកា រដ្ឋបាល និងការបម្រើសេវាកម្មអតិថិជន។.មានជំនាញក្នុងការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ ទាំងជាមួយបុគ្គលិក និងអតិថិជន។.មានភាពអំណត់ អត់ធ្មត់ ម៉ត់ចត់ និងមានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការសម្រេចការងារ។.អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន និងចំណេះដឹងកុំព្យូទ័រលើកម្មវិធី Ms. Office (Ms. Word & Excel) Internet & Email។

Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

job title: Senior Unit Manager, Business Development for Public Corporation - 01 post.
position: Senior Unit Manager, Business Development for Public Corporation - 01 post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “Senior Unit Manager, Business Development for Public Corporation” is responsible for building good relationship with governments to bring new business corporation opportunity for bank to support long term growth and comprehensive ecosystem.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Build good networking with government and high net worth people to explore the business opportunity..Conduct market needs assessment for business development opportunity cover across areas of loan, liability products, fee-based income product, and enhance banking facilities..Prepare the business proposal to ensure both Hattha Bank and strategic partners get a fair benefit..Lead and manage with business partner for business agreement, business requirement development, process mapping, reconciliation process, end-to-end process to ensure the smoothness after business implementation..Lead and facilitate the preparation of Medium-Term Business Plan (MTBP) and yearly Operational Plan (OP) to support long term strategic direction..Deliver the strategic initiatives (SI) set by company..Facilitate the preparation of the marketing strategy, promotional campaign, marketing activities, message communication to market to ensure the mislead communication..Design and monitor the business performance and regular update to align with business partners..Building, improve staff capability by equip sale techniques, skills, understanding to deal with all types of customers..Perform other task as assigned by supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: .Master degree in banking/finance or business management, or related fields..At least 03 years’ experience in corporate banking, other financial or financial services industry..Have good connection with government officerPrior other financial product management experience is preferred..Extensive knowledge in other financial products, analytical, quantitative, problem solving, communication (written and verbal), presentation, relationship management skills..Be proficient in English both speaking and writing..Be innovative, dynamic, and confident.
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description: •	Overall to control all MaxValu stores, but a specific store assigned by the MV senior GM•	Establish organizational goals, performance objectives, guidelines and best practices that are based on Board Policy and strive towards achieving them.•	Oversee, assist, and supervise all department managers in planning and performance to achieve all goals and objectives.•	Driving sales, standards and growth within your department and the store•	Achieving all KPI’s and targets as directed by head office•	Oversee all store operations based on the goals, objectives, and standards of the organization.•	Leading, developing, and motivating a large team of colleagues•	Make countermeasures to prevent the issues happens: Meeting, Training, Questioning, Problem Solving, Requesting. •	Driving sales, standards and growth within your department and the store•	Show about the company Profit and Loss to below level how to improve with current situation•	Provide a model of supportive and participatory leadership promoting the concepts of team building and empowerment.•	Ensuring that all health and safety and standard operating procedures are always adhered
Job Requirement: ✓ Bachelor’s Degree in Management or relevant fields✓ At least 3 years of experience in a comparable position in another industry✓ Good in Khmer and English both verbal and written✓ Knowledge of Merchandising and Operation is desirable✓ Good in computer Microsoft application and other accounting software✓ Ability to perform under pressure and positive attitude✓ Good Health condition & teamwork✓ Willing to learn new things✓ Creative perception and honestly✓ Able to work rotate weekend or holiday
Company Profile:
AEON Cambodia Co., Ltd. is the 1st large general merchandise store in Cambodia that introduce the most modern life style merchandise to our customers. We welcome dynamic, purpose driven individuals who desire to make an impact and leave an impression in the best environment of success to join our team.

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Financial benefits:
- ធានារ៉ាប់រងជីវិត / Life insurance
- សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រង បសស / NSSF (Work related injury and health care)
- ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តពីរដងក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ / Bonus Twice per year
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភការមកទៀងទាត់ / Attendance Allowance
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសាំង / Gasoline Allowance
- ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ / Annual Salary Increment 
- ប្រាក់ថែមម៉ោង / Overtime
- ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ / Seniority Payment

Job Description:
- Work with the design team to fully understand the shop drawings and production drawings
- Ensure that all the MEP confirmed drawings are accompanied with detailed list of MEP material specifications, for instance, functional design, sizes and shapes
- Ensure that the MEP engineers responsible for building know the MEP drawing that assigned to them with absolute clarity with all the details and particularity and peculiarity accounted for
- Assist site MEP engineers and MEP foremen with technical advice and administrative support
- Ensure strict and correct translation of MEP drawings into construction on site
- Work in close collaboration with MEP foremen to ensure the correct installation of re-bars and form work in strict compliance with the MEP Material installation methods
Organize and conduct project meetings for critical MEP activities
- Assist the MEP engineers in their coordination and relation with the subcontractors and vendors
- Collaborate with the procurement team for periodical review and update of the material order plan to ensure effective purchase order of MEP material
- Intervene when there are conflicts between MEP engineers and subcontractors or vendors
- Coordinate vendors’ work to ensure smooth site work progress and ensure that no one team’s work is held up by other teams
- Supervise the sub-contractors’ and venders’ work to ensure order and safety at the construction site
- Maintain staff’s performance by counseling and disciplining via planning, monitoring, and appraising job results
- Advise/steer the company toward new construction technology
- Advise the company on key construction personnel selection
- Advise the procurement team of potential MEP material suppliers
Job Requirement:
- BA in Electrical Engineering or a related field
- At least 5 years of working experience managing big construction projects and/or high-rise buildings
- Good understanding of MEP Building construction
- Good knowledge of Cambodian building code
- Knowledge of MEP Design and drawing
- Strong analytical skills
- Strong sense of urgency and accuracy
- Attention to details
- Strong communication and people skills
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description: Major Duties: •	Verifying transactions for data entry based on type of transactions•	Checking and preparing documents for payment to suppliers (Local and Oversea)•	Prepare payment estimation before payment date •	Manage on AP aging to ensure no longer open items•	Manage on advance shipping cost and clearance import duty•	Controlling overall accounts payable process•	Controlling and reconciliation of daily report (petty cash, advance and payment voucher)•	Reconciliation related balance sheet account •	Prepare monthly bank reconciliation •	Month end closing reportOther Duties •	Participate in company events such stock take, tree planting and other Corporate Social Responsibility as assigned.•	To maintain a high standard of personal appearance and hygiene and adhere to the Company standards.•	To provide friendly, courteous and professional service at all times.•	To maintain good working relationships with colleagues and all other departments.•	To read the Employee Handbook and understand of and adhere to the company’s rules and regulations and in particular, the policies and procedures relating to Fire, Hygiene, Health and Safety.•	To attend training sessions and meetings as and when required.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s Degree in accounting or relevant fields•	At least 2 years of experience in a comparable position in another industry•	Good in Khmer and English both verbal and written•	Knowledge of Accounting standard and Cambodia Taxation is desirable•	Good in computer Microsoft application and accounting software (SAP preferable)•	Ability to perform under pressure and positive attitude•	Good health condition & teamwork•	Willing to learn new things•	Creative perception and honestly•	Able to work rotate weekend or holiday

job title: អ្នកបើកបរឡាន​( ភ្នំពេញ 5 នាក់ និង ខេត្ត 5 នាក់)
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្គត់ផ្គង់គ្រឿងអគ្គីសនី
position: អ្នកបើកបរឡាន​( ភ្នំពេញ 5 នាក់ និង ខេត្ត 5 នាក់)
Job Description:
1.	អ្នកបើកបរឡាន
-​ ទីតាំង: ភ្នំពេញ 5 នាក់ និង ខេត្ត 5 នាក់
- បៀវត្សចាប់ពី 200 ដុល្លាឡើងទៅ
- ភេទ: ប្រុស
- ម៉ោងការងារ: ពេញម៉ោង 7:30 AM To 5:00 PM

តួនាទី
- ចេះបើកឡានដឹកទំនិញ 1,5 តោន 3,5 តោន ឬ 5 តោន (លេខដៃ)
- ថែរក្សាយានយន្ត ដូចជាលាងរថយន្ត 
- គ្រប់គ្រងទំនិញនៅលើឡាន
- លើកដាក់ទំនិញជូនអតិថិជន
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យយានយន្តមុន ចេញដំណើរ
Job Requirement:
តម្រូវការ
- មានបណ្ណបើករបរ ប្រភេទ ខ គ និង ឃ (លេខដៃ)

Job Description:
OPERATIONS TEAM RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Manage Operations team activities, control workflow in all locations.
- Evaluate and train Operations team members.
- Organise and control regular team meetings.
- Provide full and regular reporting to senior management.
- Oversee company stationery management.
- Build partnerships with suppliers, including negotiating contracts.
- Meet partners and clients whenever necessary, arrange inspection visits.
- On stand-by to resolve emergencies, 24/7.

TOUR GUIDE RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Responsibility for Full-Time and Freelance Tour Guides including interview, negotiation, planning, quality, training, feedback and database.
- Maintain working relationship with Tour Guide Association.

TRANSPORT TEAM RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Manage transport team and coordinate their activities.
- Ensure smooth reporting and coordination in all locations. 
- Oversee and evaluate all external suppliers. 
- Evaluate quality control of vehicle fleet.
Job Requirement:
- Language: Excellent skills in reading, writing and speaking ENGLISH and KHMER. Additional language skills (French, Italian, German) would be an advantage. 
- At least 3 years’ work experience in Operations management or similar, especially within tourism industry.
- Strong knowledge of Microsoft Office (Ms. Word & Excel, Advance Excel, Ms.Outlook) and good knowledge in using computer, email. 
- Proven ability to multi-task, with an attention to detail.
- Effective communicator.
- Self-motivated, flexible, customer-oriented, team player.
- Deep appreciation of Cambodia as a tourism destination and a working understanding of the country’s tourism industry.
- Experience in budget-planning would be a plus.

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

job title: Sales & Marketing Manager (HOTEL in Siem Reap)
position: Sales & Marketing Manager (HOTEL in Siem Reap)
Job Description:
• To be proactive with locating and developing new business in line with the revenue and sales through the appropriate media
• To ensure all opportunities are taken to promote products to our customers and to increase the client base
• To manage special projects under the Sales Manager
• To host any promotion events or external site as required by the Sales Manager
• Ensure key agents with over ride agreements with the hotel are account managed and that all bookers are aware of the facilities
• Establish new business over and above the base business in the hotel through direct corporate and agency business.
• Be aware of the key trends in the market and take appropriate action
• Have extensive knowledge of competitor hotels and what business is booking into the area
• Organize corporate sales promotional initiatives
• Encourage full usage of all facilities to maximize sales
• Carry out telephone sales calls to sell the facilities
• Establish key relationships with corporate clients and agencies to ensure maximum exposure and increase revenue
• To ensure personal presentation is of the highest standards at all times to project a professional image to clients
• Ensure that all communications with customers are handled within the required time frame and to the hotel/company standards
• Be present to meet and greet customers as appropriate
• Entertain prospective clients where appropriate
• Liaise with the rest of the team on a day to day basis to obtain all new sales leads
• Be aware of company policies, which affect the sales department
• Ensure that the Finance department is given accurate information for billing if required
• Have full product knowledge of the facilities offered
• Be pro-active in putting forward suggested actions to achieve the department’s targets
• Ensure that statistical data is produced and analyzed
• Demonstrate a “can do” attitude at all times
• To provide support and coaching to new team members within Sales Team
• Assist in other departments during emergencies or as deemed necessary by the Sale Manager 
• Carry out other duties/tasks outside normal routines but within the overall scope of the job
Job Requirement:

Company Profile: Hanuman has been at the forefront of tourism development in Cambodia and the Mekong region since the company began life as a travel consultancy in 1990. We are now approaching 30 years and counting. Today it is one of the most trusted tour operators and remains, true to its origins, locally-owned and locally-operated.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  012912891  / (Telegram 015 22 64 11) pheara@hanuman-group.com #165+167 EE0, St. 110, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh , Phnom Penh. 012912891  / (Telegram 015 22 64 11)

Job Description:
1. Provide leadership to the Accounting Team in the Finance Dept in Siem Reap & Phnom PE.  
2. Direct and oversee all aspects of the Finance & Accounting functions of the organization. 
3. Provides leadership in the development for the continuous evaluation of short and long-term strategic financial objectives. 
4. Ensure credibility of Finance group by providing timely and accurate analysis of budgets, financial trends and forecasts, and all financial reports; monthly income statements, Ageing Accounts and tracking of current and potentially bad debts,  Balance Sheets, Inventory Audit and Reports.
5. Take the lead in monitoring all expenses and introducing capping cost to stay competitive.
6. Take the lead to initiate due performance before granting credits to new customers,  assessing credit risks and implementing credit limits to each customers, both  new and existing.    
7. Take hands-on lead position of developing, implementing, and maintaining a comprehensive job cost system. 
8. Establish and maintain strong relationships with senior executives so as to identify their needs and seek full range of business solutions. 
9. Provide Executive Management with advice on the financial implications of current business activities, including any investments. 
10. Manage the budgets and consolidation and reporting to the Company. 
11. Provide recommendations to strategically enhance financial performance and business opportunities. 
12. Ensure that effective internal controls are in place to prevent frauds, and ensure compliance with Cambodian laws and rules for financial and tax reporting.
13. Monitor staff performance for appraisal and work skill development and capacity building.
14. And any other duties as and when assigned.
15. Develop the standard Operation Procedure (SOP) manuals for each task/each accounting officer and each company (work process, workflow and work charts).
16. Institute work measurable productivities Key Index Report (KPI), e.g. Reporting Deadline for each project/task; cash flow report, ageing accounts report, Dept monitoring & tracking, monthly and expenses income report, monitor and track monthly expenses statement against agreed budget report.
17. Make invoices and develop good relation to agents’ hanuman partners at Abroad countries. 
18. Make declaration of taxation as monthly and yearly basic. 


In Purchase Related Works:

1. Control the net cost of tour itinerary for Hanuman Travel.
2. Cooperate with the Sales Manager in updating the net cost sheet.
3. Assist ED & SM in analysis of selling price of competitors, local agents and overseas agents.
4. Respond to the Sales’ teams’ net cost enquiries, vehicle rental costs, Safari tent package and the price of unique product experiences.
5. Cooperate with the Operation Department in sourcing new suppliers and good pricing.
6. Negotiate with suppliers for the best price upon the real booking.
7. Perform a price comparison of IT equipments such as computer, networking and IT accessories.
8. Cooperate with fleet Supervisor for purchasing vehicle spare parts and accessories at the real net cost.
9. Cooperate with RM for analysis the hotel operating cost and budget planning.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement
- Bachelor or Master degree in Accounting & Finance
- At least 5-6 years work experienced in related field, especially, with tourism industry.
- Knowledge in Microsoft Office (Ms. Word & Excel, Advance Excel, Ms.Outlook) and  good knowledge in using QuickBooks Program. 
- Good knowledge in Taxation is a plus
- Good Organizational Skill
- Good critical thinking and communication skill
- Experienced in making budget is a plus. 
- Love to work as a team.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Job Description:
COMPANY INTRODUCTION
Woori Accounting is a KICPAA registered well-established accounting company with over 15 years' experience in Cambodia,
around 300 clients (Khmer, Korean, Chinese and European) and a Korean CPA.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES
• Review monthly/annual tax declaration
• Preparing financial statements & review financial statement
• Auditing and due diligence
• Manage, maintain, and administer all financial records and bookkeeping (QuickBooks) for the company
• Manage financial control, prepare, forecast and analyze budgets, perform month-end closing procedures and prepare monthly
and annual financial reports/statements for the company
• Oversee the financial operation of the organization and ensure timely and accurate financial information, reports and practices, including cash management, payroll, staff benefits, financial disbursements, ledgers, etc., meeting compliances, rules, regulations, terms, conditions
• Assist Supervisor in collating data from clients
• Coordinate the completion of financial statements, working papers and review financial statement and working papers
prepared by the Accountant Assistant
• Work closely with Supervisor to .... that financial report could be done accurately and in a timely manager
• Keep Manager informed of any progress on engagement, identify issues and recommend solutions.
• Supervise, train and develop staff assigned to engagements.
• Propose options for work, improvement Perform other tasks as required by the management
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT
• Bachelor degree or accounting, finance, banking or other related filed
• Basic understanding of accounting and taxation concepts
• Communication in spoken and written English is preferred
• 3 or 5+ years of tax declaration or accounting experience is preferred
• Having tax agent certificate is priority need

BENEFITS FROM COMPANY
• To support to train
 1. CamEd Business School
 2. National Tax School
 3. Accounting and Auditing Regulator’s Program
• Medical Fee : $100/Y
• Lunch Fee

How to Apply:
Please send your CV on the below email. The short-listed candidates will be called for the interview.
Email: admin_01@wooriacc.com
H/P: +855 96 32 36 081
T/P: +855 23 223 878
W: wooriaccounting.com
Company Profile:
Thank you for visiting our homepage. Woori Accounting is an elite accounting firm headquartered in Cambodia with offices conveniently located in Thailand and Myanmar. Woori Accounting provides high quality tax, assurance, and advisory services to clients ranging from individuals and emerging entities, to mature organizations.

At Woori Accounting, we provide custom services that address the local, domestic, and international needs of our clients. We are a member firm of KICPAA (Kampuchea Institute of Certified Public Accountants & Auditor) under Ministry of Economy & Finance (MoEF) since January 2007; and we currently serve clients in over twelve countries.

Our dedicated team of professionals performs above and beyond traditional accounting services in several specialty niches, which include mergers & acquisitions, non-for-profit, independent private schools, and privately held businesses, among others.

Our corporate culture is client-focused. Our people are exceptionally talented. Our passion is unmatched.

As your trusted advisor, we will dedicate ourselves to providing you with proactive, compliant, and profit-based solutions that empower you with the information you need to make strategic financial and business decisions
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   096 323 6081/ 012 900 319 admin_01@wooriacc.com 6nd Floor, 254 Minivong Boulevard,Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia  096 323 6081/ 012 900 319

job title: Specialist, Business Intelligence and Data Analytics
position: Specialist, Business Intelligence and Data Analytics
Job Description:
•            Design, develop and modify data integration, Datamart, BI dashboard and report based on functional and system requirements according to code standards and user interface design guidelines.

•            Perform support and maintenance, modifications, and enhancements to existing data integration, Datamart and BI through development, testing, documenting, and training users.

•            Follow and contribute to ensure a consistently high-quality standard of data integration, Datamart and BI.

•            Propose and assess solutions to resolve problems, including identifying and evaluating new technologies and third-party components.

•            Be able to bridge the gap between IT and business using data analytics to assess processes, requirement and deliver data-driven reports to executives and stakeholders.

•            Give accurate rough estimations and point out dependencies between tasks.
Job Requirement:
•            Bachelor or master’s degree in IT or related field.

•            2 years of experience in data analysis, dashboard and report development.

•            Strong skills in requirement analysis, data preparation, and data virtualization.

•            Familiarity with SQL and database, data integration and Power BI skills are required for this role.

•            Experience with SQL, Microsoft SSIS, Talend, Oracle Database, SQL Server, Azure Databases, Python, R, Tableau and Advanced Microsoft Excel would be a plus.

•            Knowledge of data virtualization and analysis.

•            Knowledge of project management

•            End to end understanding of IT life cycle (pipeline, resource, demand, project delivery, financial).

•            Fluent in English both writing and speaking

•            Strong analytic and problem-solving skills

•            Strong communication and presentation skills

•            Strong interpersonal capabilities and ability to work cross-functionally

•            Strong leadership skills and business acumen - performance driven.

•            Creativity thinking

•            Ability to work under pressure

•            Ability to work with multiple tasks

•            Flexible to travel

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
1. Scope of working:

Digital Marketing Officer will be responsible in developing strong and innovative digital marketing strategies and other technique to drive traffic on company page. Creates engaging written, graphic, and video content while staying up-to-date on latest marketing technologies and social media.

2. Duties & responsibilities:

- Planning and coordinating schedule of activity across Facebook, Twitter and Youtube and other social platforms to expand our social media audience base.
- Analyze digital data to draw key recommendations around all social media channel 
- Conduct social media audits to ensure best practices are being used compared with other 
- Able to check and select the best Digital Material to fit with content such as Picture or Video 
- Well understanding on Content Marketing 
- Coordinate with sales team to create marketing campaigns
- Able to set up the monthly and yearly plan of Digital Marketing 
- Monitor key online marketing strategies to track success
- Ensure that the brand message is consistent
Job Requirement:
3. Qualification & requirement:

- Bachelor degree in marketing, business administration or a similar skill;
- 2+ Years of Experience in Digital Marketing
- Experience executing paid social media campaigns
- Bachelor's degree in marketing or business
- Knowledge of video and picture editing software such as Adobe/ Photoshop 
- Must be able to deal multiple projects at the same time
- Incredible attention to detail
- Full understanding of all social media platforms
- Problem solving skills
- Knowledge of content management systems

Borey Peng Huoth was founded in 2005 and becomes one of the most prominent Property Development companies in Cambodia today. Job Description:
- Preparation of monthly and yearly financial report in accordance with the latest accounting standards.
- Create and maintain process flow.
- Control all monthly and yearly report.
- Maintain general ledger by transferring subsidiary accounts; reconciling entries.
- Summarizes financial status by collecting information, preparing balance sheet, profit and loss, cash flow statement, statement of charges in equity.
- Performing variance analyses and preparing account reconciliations.
- Accruals, Fix-assets, revenue recognition & variance analysis.
- Budgeting and forecasting and monthly management report.
- Well manage accounting documents in file
- Issue all accounting documents (Invoice, debit note..)
- Review and verify on payment suppliers
- Review and price of material and spear part
- Clear tax document (VAT)
- Tax declaration, prepare tax document, tax filling.
- Monitor monthly financial reports including profit and loss, balance sheet, and cash flow
- Ensure sufficient supporting document of all financial transaction
- Preform other duties as assigned by manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Accounting is preferable
- Pursuing ACCA qualification is advantage
- At least 2 years experience in accounting or finance
- Knowledge of bookkeeping, double entry, Cambodia standard accounting
- Knowledge of Tax (monthly tax, & profit tax), and incorporation process
- knowledge of International Accounting Standard(IASs)  or Cambodia Accounting Standard (CAS),
- knowledge of auditing practices and principles is a plus,
- Sound of English Language & Computer literacy
- Excellent computer skills-MS Word, Excel, Quick Book.

Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities•	Responsible for the enrolment sales and promotion of designated academic programs/ courses to prospective applicants•	Developing the annual enrolment plan and implementing its activities accordingly.•	Setting enrolment sale and profitability targets for individual staff and your team as a whole•	Achieving quarterly quota by programs and by course levels.•	Monitoring individual staff’s sale and service performance and market conditions.•	Generating leads and conducting promotional activities such as school talks, education fairs and course previews•	Working with High schools, Ministries, NGOs and business organisations to develop new markets for conversion•	Facilitating student applications and enrolment process•	Following up with enrolled students on their academic progress to establish their learning experience•	Preparing monthly enrolment report and analysis.•	Training the new staff on sales techniques and customer services
Job Requirement: Job Requirements•	Bachelor degree or relevant professional qualifications.•	Previous working experience in the Higher education sector is advantageous.•	Must be proficient in Khmer and English.•	Strong work ethics, responsible and a positive attitude in a people-oriented environment.•	Effective leadership skill and experience in leading a sales team•	Able to work under pressure to produce •	A ‘Can-do’ attitude with a pleasant personality
Company Profile: East Asia Management University (EAMU) is a private international university established in 2019 with a city campus in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. It is one of East Asia Education Group (EAEG) educational institutions which operates across the ASEAN, India and China region, anchored by its ¬flagship, the highly acclaimed East Asia Institute of Management (EAIM) in Singapore.EAMU offer degree courses at both under- and post-graduate levels to meet the growing needs of Cambodia's fast-growing economy as well as cater to individual’s career aspirations. Moving forward, EAMU aims to be a university of choice, recognised for her global approach to Higher education; and delivering degree programs and professional courses for producing employment ready graduates.
