Job Description: •	Making first final decision before passing to store manager for last final decision of complicate problems regarding to shoplifter case or customer complaint.•	Work with account and cashier teams to receive and drop cash bags into cash receiving machine of daily sale of all Maxvalue Stores and Phnom Penh Store.•	Work closely with cashier team to have well control of customer long queue and support overall operation of checkout team.•	Check all floors to make sure that all doors/shutters/windows are properly locked/closed, and all appliances are properly turned off after store closed.•	Check all food courts to ensure that all water and gas supply faucets are firmly closed and well cleaned.•	Looking for expired, spoiled, breakage and shortage merchandises to report to respective departments/lines for acting.•	Work closely and constantly with food line team to promptly refill the sold items be to avoid missing of sale opportunity.•	Supporting QC and food line teams to check all task involved in hygiene issues in food courts and storerooms to assure all food ingredient/ material are well storing and having date control attached.•	Overseeing staff performance at sale area on his/her working attitude, the presence of standby person and the implementation of company rules/regulations.•	Support facility and delight teams to control the attendance and daily duties of security guard, cleaner and cart collector teams as well as facility tasks/issues.•	Other tasks assigned by Management.
Job Requirement: •	Strong patience ability and talent judgement on happening incident.  •	Able to confront with curious and aggressive complaining customer.•	Able to work late night with long hour in standing and walking position.•	Working knowledge of multiple tasks involved in facility, safety, security, and hygiene•	Able to adopt with bad atmosphere of hygiene issue such as rotten, fishy, greasy, and dirty states.•	Good in Khmer and English both verbal and written•	Good in computer Microsoft application •	Ability to perform under pressure and positive attitude•	Good Health condition & teamwork•	Willing to learn new things•	Creative perception, dynamic and honestly•	Able to work rotate weekend or holiday
Company Profile:
AEON Cambodia Co., Ltd. is the 1st large general merchandise store in Cambodia that introduce the most modern life style merchandise to our customers. We welcome dynamic, purpose driven individuals who desire to make an impact and leave an impression in the best environment of success to join our team.

Job Description:

• Manage and control workers' camp area.

Job Description:
• Source and negotiate beneficial prices, terms and conditions for the organization.
• Determine required delivery dates to ensure that sufficient time can obtain the best specification and pricing
• Create Purchase Order & Purchase Order Voucher
• Daily release Document to Account Payable for process payment
• Monitoring Contract to ensure terms and conditions are met with the company requirements.
• Create Vendor Data & Maintain and update a list of suppliers with their qualifications and potential future development.
• Maintain relationships with existing suppliers whilst identifying and sourcing for new suppliers.
• Proven good connection with internal stakeholders and keep well communication flow.
• Follow the company’s policies/procedures, always.
• Perform other tasks assigned by Procurement Supervisor.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in Business/Accounting or a related field.
• At least 2-3 years experience in procurement in familiar.
• Good in English, Writing & Speaking.
• Knowledge of computer programs (MS. Office and Outlook, SAP system).
• Demonstrable good written and verbal communication ability
• Strong Negotiation Skills.
• Contractual management (be able to read the contract and develop upon standard template).

Job Description:
Warehouse Management
• Effectively manage warehouse inspection, delivery functions and management plan by developing schedule, procedures, and policy in compliance with company’s policies and objectives.
• Work closely with relevant department to cope materials/resources and to ensure that they are avail timely supplied to construction site when needed.
• Conduct monthly inventory and report warehouse activities and stock movement line manager to avoid stock lose or variance.
• Entry data into SAP system and review other expenditure documents from related departments.
• Supervise, train, coach, and discipline staffs to strengthen warehouse management and ensure high productivity and staff morale.
• Categorize type of materials/resources.
Admin Management
• Supervise team members to enforce the office policies and procedures established by company.
• Monitor and support daily operational needs.
• Control staff attendance, stationery and office supply and machinery.
• Supervise, monitor, and maintain company’s properties.
• Manage, control, and safeguard the physical fixed asset items of Company as per company policies and procedures.
• Manage record and oversee all transactions tracked related to the company's fixed assets, materials and resources including movement, tagging, or labeling of the items.
• Maintain accuracy of all counts and ensure authenticity of all information.
• Perform other tasks as per assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in Business Admin or related field.
• Proven at least 4-5 years’ working experience in warehouse and admin from real estate or construction company. 
• Knowledge of logistics and warehouse management system.
• Good communication (Khmer and English), diplomatic and organizational skills.
• Ability to work under pressure and with personnel from all levels.
• Tact and the ability to deal with difficult situations.
• Good knowledge of different business functions.
• Meticulous attention to detail.
• Good morale and integrity.

Job Description:
• Manage parts of construction.
• Checking technical designs and drawings to ensure that they are followed correctly.
• Provide technical advice and solving problem at site.
• Ensuring that health and safety and sustainability policies and legislation are adhered to.
• Liaising with QS Inspector about the ordering and the pricing of materials and other relevant parties.
• Day-to-day management of the site, including supervising and monitoring the site labor force and the work of any subcontractors.
• Maintain and interpret site drawings, topographical drawings, and construction drawings, rebar drawing and rebar schedules.
Job Requirement:
• BA in Civil Engineer/related fields.
• At least 4 year experiences as Site Engineer and 1 to 2 year as Senior Site/Team Leader.
• Understanding of technical, materials, and site management.
• Teamwork and honesty.
• Respecting to company's rules and regulation.
• Experience working with Borey or higher standard of construction is preferred.
• Experience using SAP system is an advantage.
Computer literate(MS Office, MS Project, AutoCAD and 2D & 3D).
• Good communication and critical thinking skill.

Job Description:
• Direct and study the layout of the Mechanical, electrical, and plumbing system.
• Make a table to estimate the cost of construction of water and electricity systems and schedule work.
• Supervise and inspect the technical work of water and electricity in the construction.
• Liaise and resolve various issues with relevant parties.
• Check the amount of existing water and electricity and make additional proposal.

Supervise at site and sanitation inspection.

• Understanding of technical, materials, and site management.
• Teamwork and honesty.
• Respecting to company rule and regulation.
• Experience working with Borey or higher standard of construction is preferred.
• Experience using SAP system is an advantage.

• Good communication and critical thinking skill.

3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

job title: Project Sales Consultant អ្នកប្រឹក្សាលក់ជាគំរោង
company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
position: Project Sales Consultant អ្នកប្រឹក្សាលក់ជាគំរោង
Job Description:
KEY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Please note that this is not an exhaustive list of everything that needs to be done.  Sinh Hak Hout Team Member always find new ways to look after the business, their guests, and their team members.   Within this, the key responsibilities for this position are:
o	Uses strong project management skills to lead the delivery of medium to large sized projects within planned timelines, budget, margins and quality specifications.
o	Manage multiple and complex projects or sub-projects, including project financials. 
o	Organize and provide promotional plan and all supporting material to the sales team for proper implementation.
o	Directs the development and integration of project deliverables.
o	Understand the market trends by collecting all market information and suggestion to improve sales
o	Complete credit proposal form with relevant documents and recommendations to ensure that debts are monitors and collected following credit terms
o	Communicate & promote safe teamwork at all times so as to achieve all targets
o	Work with supervisor to ensure understanding the same direction
o	Prepare weekly sales activities and follow up report
o	Prepare monthly and quarterly sales forecast
o	Effectively identify and understand key competitors
o	Other tasks as requested by supervisor


HOW YOU CAN SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE
Within Sinh Hak Hout, the top-performing people who do this job always demonstrate the following attitude: 
•	Working with Others:
o	A genuine interest in the welfare of all company team member is the first and most critical requirement for this role.
o	They maintain the trust of the team member, and are regarded as fair, reasonable, approachable, and honest.  
o	They are passionate about improving staff welfare and guest satisfaction.  They are focused on achieving results and continual improvement.
o	They always try to anticipate and exceed the needs of customers and team member.
o	They use their own initiative and good judgement to solve problems in a calm and efficient way

o	They enjoy working with others to achieve common goals.  They volunteer as required to ensure the success of the team.
o	They act with personal professionalism and integrity at all times
•	Taking Responsibility:
o	Uses strong project management skills to lead the delivery of medium to large sized projects within planned timelines, budget, margins and quality specifications.
o	Manage multiple and complex projects or sub-projects, including project financials. 
o	Organize and provide promotional plan and all supporting material to the sales team for proper implementation.
o	Directs the development and integration of project deliverables.
o	Understand the market trends by collecting all market information and suggestion to improve sales. 
o	Complete credit proposal form with relevant documents and recommendations to ensure that debts are monitors and collected following credit terms
o	Communicate & promote safe teamwork at all times so as to achieve all targets
o	Work with supervisor to ensure understanding the same direction
o	Prepare weekly sales activities and follow up report
o	Prepare monthly and quarterly sales forecast
o	Effectively identify and understand key competitors
o	Other tasks as requested by supervisor
•	Delivering Results:
o	They are committed to meeting and exceeding all performance standards.
o	They constantly look to develop their own professional skills and abilities.
o	They perform job tasks in line with established policies and procedures.
o	They always try to provide a top-quality experience to all our team members and guests.
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

job title: Showroom Sales Consultant អ្នកប្រឹក្សាលក់ក្នុងហាង ($200 - $ 500)
company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
position: Showroom Sales Consultant អ្នកប្រឹក្សាលក់ក្នុងហាង ($200 - $ 500)
Job Description:
o Handle small and basic account customer
o Work toward achieving sales target
o Perform sales cycle from start to closing of sales process, from the moment customer walk into the store to delivery and processing payment
o Enter lead into Lead Report by collecting customer visit information regarding their name, address, project site, interest of materials and forecast amount
o Create customer profile to accurately and professionally input Customer Name, address, phone number, project site address, site contact information and so on
o Coordinate delivery with dispatch team to make sure the orders are delivered on time
o Create quotation for customers when needed
o Coordinate samples and catalogs when needed
o Prepare and provide product specifications to customers when needed
o Provide customer service at all-time regardless whether the customer is your own customers or other peers’ customers as long as they walk into the showroom
o Manage showroom merchandise zone assigned by Store Supervisor
o Make sure the products in the managed zone are well displayed, clean, tidy and price tag are properly placed
o Create price tag for newly displayed items in the managed zone
o Checking displayed racks in the managed zone to make sure the items are fully filled up and nothing is missing
o Responsible for the assigned tasks and get it done on a timely manner
o Solving customers’ issues and complains 
o Create and submit daily customer walk in/visit report to the Team Lead 
o Create and submit weekly Activities and Cleanliness Report to the Team Lead
o Other tasks by Management
Job Requirement:
 Requirements
  • BA in Sales and Marketing or related field
  • At least 1 year experienced in sales
  • Strong in communication skill both written and speaking
  • Flexible and friendly
  • Good in problem solving skill
  • Patient
 Work time and Benefits
  • Basic Salary 
  • Work time: (Mon-Sat) 7:30am-5:30pm (Break 1hours) request to work Sunday if necessary
  • Uniform
  • Annual leave 
  • Annual trip
  • National Holiday
  • Sale Commission
  • Bonus incentive

Job Description: •	Defining the vision•	Work in cross-functional teams to find solution to any         problem as required•	Solution Design and Architecture Design•	Managing the product backlog•	Prioritizing needs•	Task Management•	Release Management and Planning•	Overseeing development stages•	Acting as primary liaison•	Anticipating client needs and Evaluating product          progress at each iteration

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
Direct Report : Report and Planning Manager


Functional Responsibilities:

- Ensure to calculate the monthly marketing & call center allocation correctly
- Help reporting and planning manager to delivery month-end financial reports of each brand
- Produce franchisors report
- Assist reporting manager with quarterly Console pack
Produce Cost analysis report (Material & Price)
- Assist reporting and planning manager for preparing - - - - variances analysis reports comparing actuals against budget and revised budget forecasts with commentaries highlighting achievements and variances
- Input RPT into TM1 by 9th -EFG Group; 15th with other related parties
- Assist reporting and planning manager to produce Excom presentation for GM/CFO by day 20 of the following month.
- Review dimension accuracy
- Comment PL with Last year and Last month for GM requested
- Assist Finance Manager to prepare, consolidate, update annual budget and revise budgets in accordance with the group target, set objective and timeline
- Liaise with all heads of brand to ensure budget are drafted, discussed, reviewed and finalized in timely manner
- Review the approved budget/ revised budgets into report templates and upload into TM1 & LSNAV
- Support Head of Brands’ sale report template
- Assist Bangkok team for PBI sale update
Request Bangkok team to create store location in LSNAV twhen there are new stores.
- Support costing team on month end closing (Run COG & analysis cost for store)
- Produce other report as requested by CFO, FM, GM...
Support and provide document to internal & external auditor if request.
- Support tax accountant provide document if request.
Involve with annually employee survey
Adhoc tasks from manager
Team management, training & development
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement

- University degree, preferable with an Accounting major and professional qualification. MBA or ACCA is an advantage.

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:

- Minimum 3-year experience in accounting.
Advance knowledge of Microsoft office, MS Excel and reporting tools (Power BI)
- Good communication
- Experience in the Food / FMCG business is an advantage.
- Knowledge of integrated ERP Systems.
- Good command in both spoken and written English
Strong commitment
- Pro-active, initiative, responsible and a team player activity to prioritize works to reach deadline

Due to a large number of applicants, we will only be able to follow up with candidates who are shortlisted for an interview, and this will happen within 10 working days from the date of your application.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #320, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Sangkat Tek Laak 1, Khan Toul Kok 017 888 349

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. Job Description:
•	Responsible for the functionality and connectivity of the MIS office with the campus
•	Providing IT support – hardware, software and systems to all different user groups in the campus
•	Managing the daily operational IT needs, including managing, monitoring, maintaining and upgrading existing IT systems e.g. servers, operating systems, hardware, software, printers and scanners

•	Managing the camera and sound system for security and class room delivery
•	Managing the IT inventory and assets at optimal level
•	Network Management to achieve efficiency of workflow and security
•	Other duties relevant to IT support in a changing environment
Job Requirement:
•	At least a Bachelor degree in BIS, computer science or other relevant fields
•	At least 3-5 years of experience in IT Support
•	A strong team player 
•	Able to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines
•	In-depth knowledge on technology and service management
•	Knowledge of current software and hardware and their deployment
•	Knowledge of Windows Servers, Domain Server, File Server; Email Server, technical networks, Firewall etc
•	Knowledge of website development and maintenance preferably Word Press will be an advantage
•	Good at English communication, both in writing /speaking

* Benefits to employee:

•	Working hours: Monday to Friday and Saturday (alternate OFF)

•	Private Insurance - Hospital
•	Annual Leave
•	Medical and Dental cover
•	EAMU is an equal opportunity organisation.

Job Description:
** JOB SUMMARY
•	វិស្វករសវនករ(គ្រឿងបង្គុំ) មានតួនាទី ត្រួតពិនិត្យបច្ចេកទេសសំណង់ ការងារដេគ័រ ទៅតាមប្លង់ Designer, ត្រួតពិនិត្យឡើងវិញជាមួយវិស្វករពីការកែប្រែកំហុស និងចំនុចខ្វះខាតពីគ្រប់សំណើ, Spot check បច្ចេកទេស គុណភាព សុវត្ថិភាពសម្ភារៈការដ្ឋាន,ត្រួតពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍ចំណាយប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ដែលស្នើដោយវិស្វករ, រាយការណ៍ពីបញ្ហាកើតឡើងនៅការដ្ឋានជូនប្រធានក្រុម 

** JOB RESPONSIBILITY
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យបច្ចេកទេសសំណង់គ្រឿងបង្គុំ និង ការងារដេគ័រតាមរយៈសំណើវិស្វក័ការដ្ឋាន គោរពតាមប្លង់ Designer។
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យឡើងវិញជាមួយវិស្វករកាដ្ឋានដើម្បីធានាថាបានកែប្រែរាល់កំហុស និង ចំនុចខ្វះខាតគ្រប់សំណើឆែកទាំងអស់។
•	Spot-Check បច្ចេកទេស គុណភាព សុវត្ថិភាព និង សម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់នៅការដ្ឋាន។
•	ថតរូបភាពរាល់បញ្ហាកើតមាននៅការដ្ឋាន និង រាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានក្រុមដើម្បីដោះស្រាយឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យលើរបាយការណ៍ប្រាក់ចំណាយប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ដែលស្នើដោយវិស្វករការដ្ឋាន ដើម្បីធានាថារាល់ការចំណាយទាំងអស់ ពិតជាត្រឹមត្រូវប្រៀបធៀបនឹងការងារដែលសម្រេចបាននៅការដ្ឋាន រួចបញ្ជូនបន្តទៅប្រធានផ្នែកសវនកម្ម។
•	ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលបានដាក់ចេញដោយប្រធានផ្នែកសវនកម្ម។
Job Requirement:
•	បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកសំណង់ស៊ីវិល និងជំនាញដែលពាក់ពន្ធ័។
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងតិចបីឆ្នាំ លើតួនាទីជាសវនករ។
•	មានជំនាញបន្ថែមលើការងារដែលពាក់ពន្ធ័ MS. Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook, Internet, AutoCAD។
•	មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការងារជាក្រុម និង ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
•	ស្មោះត្រង់
•	ទំនួលខុសត្រូវ
•	ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្រុមហ៊ុនទាំងថ្នាក់លើ និង ថ្នាក់ក្រោម។

Job Description:
Maintains production systems, machine, and equipment by completing preventive maintenance schedules; restoring, repairing, rebuilding, or replacing faulty or inoperative components and parts; supervising staff.

Duties and Responsibilities:
•	Implement of safety procedure during daily activities.
•	Reporting Near miss and unsafe condition
•	Recommend and advice in safety device & protection related with his expertise.
•	Planning, controlling, monitoring, and reporting all Operation & Maintenance of Mechanical work
•	Ensure production equipment are in the good condition to run smooth process & production.
•	Controlling the quality of work done by subordinates and contractors
•	Continues improvement on technical availability through TPM and analyze the breakdown in daily base
•	Ensure prompt repairs by responding to emergency breakdowns.
•	Install, Maintains, repairs, overhauls, calibrates, and tests tile production equipment & Instrumentation
•	Read and interprets drawings, and specifications in making installations or performing major repair work.
•	Monitoring machine or equipment performance and reporting 
•	Ensure housekeeping, productivity, and quality of work standards are maintained, most especially within the mechanical maintenance department.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or a related field 
•	Proven experience as mechanical engineering or similar role
•	Two years’ experience in Mechanical work
•	Possess high level of safety awareness
•	Possession of relevant technical knowledge.
•	Proficient in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
•	Knowledge of Welding skill, and use drawing program like AutoCAD/Solidworks
•	Good Command in English both speaking and writing
•	Knowledge of technical and related equipment
•	TPM knowledge & Implementation
•	knowledge of products and processes used in the manufacture of technical equipment
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

company_name: VUE ASTON (The Peninsula Capital Co., Ltd)
Job Description:
Job roles and responsibilities:
* Be knowledgeable about the product
* Market the product to get potential customers with both the company support as well as personal resource
* Identify prospective customers, lead generation and conversion
* Contact new and existing customers to discuss needs and create sale opportunities
* Emphasize the features of products to highlight how they fit customer needs
* Answer questions about the products
* Negotiate prices and terms and close deals
* Collaborate with support team and finance team in preparing sales agreements, execution of the agreements and payment collection
* Collaborate with colleagues in many different sectors like marketing, planning, etc.
* Develop sales agencies, facilitate in agency agreements execution in collaboration with the support team.
* Support agencies to achieve their success in marketing the products by providing training, information support as well as closing deals together with them
* Maintain contact lists and follow up with customers to continue relationships and build customer loyalty
* Make timely, clear and informative work report (including not limited to tables, presentation etc.) to the management
* Other reasonable tasks arranged by the management
Job Requirement:
Job qualifications:
- Korean mother tongue is a must
- Fluent verbal and oral English communication capability is a must
- Experience in real estate is a plus
- Education/career experience in sales and marketing sector is a plus

Job skills:
* Strong confidence and strong self-assuredness to succeed in cold-calling customers and making a sale
* Communication skills, especially persuasion, to clearly convey the benefits of a product to potential customers
* Physical and mental endurance, as Sales Representatives may need to be serving a customer for long hours, bearing heavy pressure but having to show decent manner.
* Achievement-driven mindset. A Sales Representative must be eager for extraordinary success, and is willing to bear pressure, anxiety resulted from the commitment of sale performance.
* Customer service skills to listen to the concerns of a customer and be able to address their needs
* Interpersonal skills to work with a wide variety of people each day, build relationships and network

Benefits
- The commission on sales
- Sales Award
- Our Public Holiday will be: International New Year, Chinese New Year, Khmer New Year, Pchum Ben Day, and Water Festival.
- We are working 5.5days per week (shift work, day off is not fall on Saturday or Sunday)
- Working hour start 08:40am - 17:40pm (break 1h for lunch)
- Annual leave complied by law
Internal sales in showroom and some time need to bring the customer to visit site by our company transportation

Location:
Our address: No. 88 National Assembly Street, Sangkat Tonle Bassac, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
Our condo located in Koh Norea
Website: https://www.vueaston.com/

Interested candidate please submit your cv to the below email address:
TO: sambath.leng@vueaston.com
CC: leanne.hu@vueaston.com
Company Profile:
The Peninsula Capital Co., Ltd. is Cambodia's leading real estate developer and wealth management service provider.

The company has been profoundly engaged with the Cambodian real estate market for 15 years. The team members have got years of experience in large-scale land development and real estate projects in both China and Southeast Asia.

With continuous accumulation, the company has obtained a business model that consists of asset management, hotel operation, education, trading, media and cultural transmission all together inside the form of real estate development.

The Peninsula Capital Co., Ltd. currently has six branches in Cambodia and over 20 offices in China (including associates and strategic partners).

Job Description:
•	Managing the HR dept. to ensure all HR functions are effectively carried out.
•	Managing the NSSF computations, payments and reporting to ensure compliance with relevant Ministries and agencies.
•	Managing the monthly and yearly HR plan and budget for hiring, training and development, monthly celebrations and annual retreat. 
•	Conducting hiring process, including job advertisement, compiling applicant CVs for reviews and screening, arranging interviews and scheduling, keeping applicants’ evaluation forms and outcomes, and maintaining personal records.
•	Conducting employee orientation and facilitating newcomers to assimilate quickly into the company culture and work approach.
•	Updating regularly the master HR database (personal file, personal database...etc.) of each employee e.g. list of probation staff, new hire report, resignation, and termination reports.
•	Manage payroll with Finance by providing relevant employee information (e.g. leaves of absence, sick days and work schedules, overtimes, resignations, salary increments…etc.).
•	Supporting the dept. Heads in staff evaluations during probation period, and performance appraisal twice annually.
•	Engaging with staff on regular basis to gather feedback, understand their morale and motivation levels and adopting proactive measures to enhance 
•	Acting as the first point of contact for HR-related issues e.g. staff grievances to reduce sick leave, absenteeism and increase productivity
•	Conducting quarterly session to brief staff on the company culture and HR policies, practices and emphasis 
•	Conducting exit interviews for employees and recording them accordingly.
•	Keeping good documentations under a HR database system
•	Performing other tasks as assigned by the Pro VC office.
Job Requirement:
•	Degree in HRM or HRD related field.
•	Proficiency in English in both written and oral is a MUST. 
•	Minimum 3-5 years’ direct experience in HR role.
•	In-depth knowledge of local employment law.
•	Knowledge of best practice HR policies and systems.
•	Excellent communication skills with strong persuasion ability.
•	People oriented and results driven.
•	Trustworthy and Can-do attitude.
•	Experience with Human Resources metrics is an advantage

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    LEASING EXECUTIVEREPORTS TO:   Operation ManagerLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Prepare Leasing Document. 2.  Assist indirectly for factory visit. 3.  Follow up enquiry. 4.  Appoint for negotiation with potential client 5.  Ensure that information required are completed for leasing     contract. 6.  Work with Legal team to prepare lease agreement contract after     final negotiation. 7.  Informing Finance Department about expected tenant’s payment     transfer; confirming payment clearance of tenants upon handover     of properties. 8.  Responsible for handover move-in process and move out process of     non-renewal and early termination leases. 9.  Maintaining all lease file systems, both in paper format and     electronically that may be easily accessed by the team. 10. Prepare and distribute correspondence such as memos and letters. 11. Discuss for advice regarding to new building quotation, and     increased rental capped for renewal notice. 14. Assist with Utility Bills. 15. Forward monthly bills to tenants. 16. Communicate with tenant and management team in case of payment     delayed.

job title: Senior Quantity Surveyor And Cost Controller
position: Senior Quantity Surveyor And Cost Controller
Job Description: JOB TITLE:    SENIOR QUANTITY SURVEYOR AND COST CONTROLLERREPORTS TO:   PROJECT CONSTRUCTION MANAGER LOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1. Procurement: - Daily direct control and make purchase request from projects    site. - Extract bill of quantity from drawing and check specification for    material code in order to make purchase request. - Tracking record all purchases request from projects to PO Team - Check and report materials delivery on stock and site - Follow up contractor materials submission for approval2. Cost Management - Extract bill of quantity and pricing from supplier and contractor - Manage daily progress site report before process claim and submit    report to manager - Control and make tracking record for claim management with    accountant and legal team. - Selecting and evaluation contractor quotation and comparison. - Check and review project progress claim and interim payment    certificate from contractor.3. Quality control - Develop and control QA/QC form and implement to project site - Review and involved site inspection to check the quality of work    with punching list or defect list, - Check and review the submission material approval from contractor - Develop a standard formula for quantity take off with coding and    its correct methodology.
Job Requirement: 1. Degree in Construction Management, Building Science, Real Estate   Management, Civil Engineering or Architecture2. Diploma in Quantity Surveying would be an advantage3. Master degree would be an advantage4. Worked at least 3 years in the construction industrial in the field    of Quantity Surveying in various developments.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    HEAD OF PROCUREMENTREPORTS TO:   CFOLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Maintaining relationships with suppliers while continually     scouting for additional vendors.2.  Communicating with management regularly regarding the efficient     flow of goods and services affecting production.3.  Conducting cost analyses and setting benchmarks for improvement.4.  Developing risk management procedures to mitigate losses in the     event of product shortages.5.  Supervising a purchasing team and delegating tasks across     departments when necessary.6.  Directing, optimizing and coordinating full order cycle.7.  Liaising and negotiating with suppliers, manufacturers,     retailers and consumers.8.  Keep track of quality, quantity, stock levels, delivery times,     transport costs efficiency 9. Strategizing, planning and     enforcing the import activities as per request.10. Overall responsibility for Purchasing and Cost Estimating     activities across the business.11. Create and implement best practice purchasing vision, strategy,     policies, processes, and procedures to aid and improve business     performance.12. Ensure that purchasing strategies and processes are in place to     meet business objectives and operational needs in terms of     price, quality, and delivery targets.13. Contribute to overall business strategy and annual budget     process.14. Provide leadership to departments under control. Coach, mentor     and develop direct reports and manage a high performing team     that delivers continuous improvement, added value and cost     reductions.15. Set department objectives and monitor ongoing progress and     performance.16. Other duties set direct by executives.
Job Requirement: 1.  Bachelor's degree in finance, business administration, economics     or a similar field. 2.  Proven working experience as a Logistics /Import Manager at least     5 years. 3.  Proficiency in Microsoft office. 4.  Proficiency in English language both speaking and writing. 5.  Good interaction and organization skills.6.  Record of successful distribution and logistics management.7.  Demonstrable ability to lead and manage staffs.8.  Proficient in standard logistics software.9.  Excellent analytical, problem solving and organizational skills. 10. Ability to work independently and handle multiple projects.

Job Description:
To support and manage the Integration Projects from a technical perspective. Key responsibilities include the transformation of PCLA applications and integration, solution and analysis. Additional responsibilities include the adoption of CI-CD framework, managing SFTP server for partners and strategizing the automation of workflows.

* Payment Solution and Integration
- Create payment solution, workflow, wireframes.
- Work with payment partners, prepare project plan, onboard partner.
- Technical integration and analysis.
- End to end test of the journey.
- Application integration solution, derivation and implementation.

* Adoption of new technology and improvements
- Investigate and implement new technology in-house.
- Automated solution for manual processes.
- Design workflows.

* Build and share knowledge to implement and embed good practice 
- Ensure accessibility of information to all relevant stakeholders.
- Work closely with Head of IT to design and plan for professional development initiatives like Security Training, Risk Management Training, etc.

- General IT overview.
- Project co-ordination and management (JIRA, Confluence, Mural).
- Understanding of cloud native architecture.
- Basic knowledge of SQL and unstructured database.
- Azure Pipeline.
- API Architecture, standards, open API.
- Wireframes.
- Adaptive, good communication skills.
Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. Company Profile:
ZISPP uses a UK-standards based curriculum with a values-based approach to academic, physical, emotional, and social development for its students. Our teachers are all highly qualified professional native speakers of English with a heart for children, a strong understanding of their needs, and a desire to be a guiding light to the future for each student. They understand well and are deeply committed to their roles as facilitators in bringing the International Primary Curriculum (IPC) to life in the classroom. 

Zion International School of Phnom Penh is an agency of the not-for-profit, NGO Cambodia Jobs Foundation located in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 

We believe that children learn by doing. They should be actively engaged in discovering, exploring, and doing in order to maximize opportunities for learning and growth

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Job Description: JOB TITLE: 	Sale EngineerREPORTS TO: 	Business Development SupervisorLOCATION:	Phnom PenhSALARY RANGE: 	Negotiable1.  Identifies current and future customer service requirements by     establishing personal rapport with potential and actual     customers and other persons in a position to understand service     requirements. 2.  Provides product, service, or equipment technical and     engineering information by answering questions.3.  Establishes new accounts and services accounts by identifying     potential customers; planning and organizing sales call     schedule.4.  Determines improvements by analyzing cost-benefit ratios of     equipment, supplies, or service applications in customer     environment; engineering or proposing changes in equipment,     processes, or use of materials or services.5.  Develops customer's staff by providing technical information and     training.6.  Complies with federal, state, and local legal requirements by     studying existing and new legislation; anticipating future     legislation; advising customer on product, service, or equipment     adherence to requirements; advising customer on needed actions.7.  Prepares sales engineering reports by collecting, analyzing, and     summarizing sales information and engineering and application     trends.8.  Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending     educational workshops; reviewing professional publications;     establishing personal networks; participating in professional     societies.10. Contributes to sales engineering effectiveness by identifying     short-term and long-range issues that must be addressed;     providing information and commentary pertinent to deliberations;     recommending options and courses of action; implementing     directives.11. Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as     needed.
Job Requirement: 1.  Bachelor of Technical Engineer, Civil Engineer or related field.2.  At least 2 years of experiences3.  Ability to manage complex projects and multi-task4.  Excellent organizational skills, honest, motivated and hard     working.5.  Fluent in English, Chinese is preferable.6.  Proficient in Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint.7.  Good understanding of market research techniques, statistical     and data analysis methods.8.  Thorough understanding of social media and web analysis.DOCUMENTS REQUIRE1-National identification ( Copy )2-Photo 4*6 ( Last 3 months )3-Birth certificate (May or may not have)4-Family / Residence Book ( Copy )5-Criminal Record / Certificate of Behavior ( Original )6-Certificates of Educational ( Copy )

Job Description:
* Operational:
- Help in managing all technical equipment and other related solutions to specified international standards
- Support in ensuring 99.9% Disaster Recovery readiness and high availability
- Ensure that the daily operational checklist is effectively monitored / completed.
- Help maintaining system security for all related systems.
- Assist in ISO 27001:2013 compliance requirements and related audits
- Formulate or update IT procedures as and when required 
- Support for hardware/ software problems and report the issue for local or group support if required.
- Self-improve knowledge by researching advancements in IT System technologies.
- Run daily/ periodical processing (morning, evening, month-end, year-end, etc…).
- Follow up any SW/HW licenses related to infrastructure/tools.
- Help the IT team on correcting security related audit findings and coordinate with auditors.
- Assist in responding to IT Audit Reports.
- Any other duties within your competence or skill entrusted by the management   

Technical:

- Ensuring all Network infrastructure, Hardware/Servers and software is ready for daily operations
- Manage / monitored web certificates (SSL) related to system for upgrade, renewal and etc. 
- Responsibility on VM infrastructure (Implementation, installation, troubleshooting, etc.) 
- Responsibility on Windows Active Directory infrastructure (Implementation, installation, troubleshooting, etc.) 
- Assist in administration/setup and monitoring of IT asset inventory.
- Manage system users as per IT policy and procedure
- Carryout Vulnerability Assessments and providing recommendations under the guidance of group IT Security / CIO
- Monitoring physical security of IT premises, compliance with IT security policy, procedure with other third parties and server room.
- Monitor and assist in management of all security, wireless, DHCP, BYOD devices to ensure required security controls are implemented.
- Check and control to log file and data information to make it is safe and usable.
- Check and monitor all system configurations comply with IT security standards.

* What You Will Get from Us:

-The chosen candidate will have adequate exposure for latest technologies adopted by LOLC Cambodia or Group IT. 
-The chosen candidate will undergo a comprehensive guidance on IT Infrastructure, international security standard and will work with LOLC Group IT team.
-Will be working with experts in Software Development, Core banking, System Security and other related departments to share the experience.
-Flexible working hours (Conditions Apply).
-Local and foreign training opportunities conducted by Certified Trainers/LOLC Group.
-An attractive package with other benefits such as medical facilities, Staff loan facilities, etc.
Job Requirement:
* What We Seek from You:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related fields.
- Preferably with a minimum of 2-3 years of experience in MFIs/banking or related fields.
- 2-3 years of experience in Systems Administration in Microsoft Windows and Linux Base infrastructure.
- Understanding networking protocol and network process flow.
- Experiences in virtualization and cloud computing (preference will be given for candidate certified in VCP-DCV 6.7).
- Analyzing and resolving End-User workstation issue including network printers, access points, branch level network switch, router, etc.
- Experience in system monitoring and troubleshooting.
- Documentation / writing skills and an excellent command of English language. 
- Strong communication skill.
- Experience with general IT projects.
- Ability to work under pressure and extended hours when required.
- Willingness to travel to provinces when required.

* How to Apply for:
Please submit your Cover Letter, CV and relevant documents to any branches nearby your locations or head office of LOCL (Cambodia) Plc. or via email: recruitment@lolc.com.kh	         
LOLC (Cambodia) Plc. 
* Tel: 081 800 169/081 600 955/081 800 663
* Location: Head Office

Job Description:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងអនុម័តប្រតិបត្តិការ (Loan, Saving, Adjustment, Collateral, Till, Payment…) ក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធT24។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យទិន្នន័យក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធT24 ដែលមិនទាន់អនុម័តប្រចាំថ្ងៃ (Control Unauthorized List)។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើឯកសារ (តារាងសងប្រាក់, Collateral Receipt, DV, PV, JV, TV, Petty Cash Voucher, Daily Cash Movement, Weekly Cash Projection, Bank Reconciliation, Deposit Forms & Transaction Slip…)។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងបោះពុម្ពរបាយការណ៍គណនីអតិថិជន ដើម្បីភ្ជាប់ឯកសារប្រាក់កម្ចី (Statement of Account, Summary Account)។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ គ្រប់គ្រង និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ទ្រព្យដាក់ធានាឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវទាំងក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ ពេលដកដាក់ទ្រព្យធានានិងរក្សាសុវត្ថិភាពទូប្លង់។
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការរាប់សាច់ប្រាក់ស្របទៅតាមគោលនយោបាយរតនាភិបាល។
- គ្រប់គ្រងគម្រូហត្ថលេខា ប្រតិបត្តិការជាមួយធនាគារដៃគូឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា។

Job Description:
- Perform regular branches and head office audit.
- Prepare audit report indicating the findings and recommendations for supervisor’s review.
- Evaluate the effectiveness and efficiency of internal control system, risk impact and recommend improvement.
- Conduct compliance check to ensure internal policies and law and regulation are fully complied.
- Ensure accurate and sufficient documentation exists for supervisor review.
- Perform preliminary data analysis and provide ideas on the result of the data analysis.
- Conduct audit follow up.
- Ensure assigned tasks are completed within budgeted time for every audit.
- Perform other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and related field is required.
- At least 1 year of audit experience or 2 years work MFIs/bank experience is priority.
- Knowledgeable in MS Word, MS excel and power point.
- Understanding of accounting and MFIs/Bank operation.
- High level of written and oral communication skill.
- Honesty, accountability hard working and commitment.
- Ability to work independently, safeguard confidential information and great attention to detail to meet the deadline.
- Creative skill, strong problem solving and sound judgment and good decision making.
- Willing to learn new things and adapt to new working environment.

Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh HQ: , #93B, St590, Vllage13, Sangkat Boeng kok, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។

Company Profile: RIWAY, "Showing You The Right Way", aims to transform people’s lives, regardless of race, religion, social class or nationality.RIWAY strives to improve the community’s well-being by the attainment of market superiority and trust through a relentless pursuit of knowledge and technological excellence. Within five years, RIWAY has expanded globally; This rapid growth serves as a strong testament of customers' trust and faith in the quality of RIWAY products.The Founders started off as seasoned successful direct sellers before they decided to start RIWAY with an initial goal of enriching people's lives with constant offerings of innovative product and services.RIWAY, which means "Right Way", was derived from our core mission of "Showing You The Right Way", which delineates our determination and passion to transform people’s lives, regardless of race, religion, social class or nationality

job title: មន្ត្រីជំនាញ ចំនួន០១រូប
position: មន្ត្រីជំនាញ ចំនួន០១រូប
Job Description:
ដោយមានតម្រូវការជាចាំបាច់សម្រាប់អនុវត្តការងារជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃឲ្យមានភាពរលូន និងរហ័ស ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និង   ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងវាយតម្លៃ នៃអ.គ.ហ. មានតម្រូវការជ្រើសរើស បុគ្កលិកជាប់កិច្ចសន្យាសម្រាប់មុខតំណែងមន្ត្រីជំនាញផ្នែកការងារកែទម្រង់បីបូកមួយ គ្រប់គ្រងទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរដ្ឋ និងចំណូលមិនមែនសារពើពន្ធ ចំនួន០១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍន៍ការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖
- មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ នីតិសាស្រ្ត ឬវិស័យប្រហាក់ប្រហែលផ្សេងទៀត
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារទាក់ទិនទៅនឹងផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ និងបទពិសោធន៍លើផ្នែក ឬវិស័យប្រហាក់ប្រហែលយ៉ាងតិច០២ឆ្នាំ
- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសច្បាស់លាស់
- មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង និងអាចបំពេញការងារជាក្រុម
- ស្រ្តីត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាព ក្នុងការជ្រើសរើសសម្រាប់ទទួលបាននូវតំណែងនេះ
- មន្ត្រីរាជការដែលមានក្របខ័ណ្ឌនៅក្នុងក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងស្ម័គ្រចិត្តព្យួរការងារនៅអង្គភាពដើម
Job Requirement:
ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅអគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋាន អ.គ.ហ ត្រូវបានផ្តល់អាទិភាពខ្ពស់បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងដាក់ឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន ប៉ុន្តែផ្តល់ជូនអទិភាពជូនដល់មន្រ្តីរាជការដែលស្ម័គ្រចិត្តព្យួរការងារនៅអង្គភាពដើម ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅអគ្គលេខាដ្ឋាន។

សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។

បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃចន្ទ ២រោច ខែភទ្របទ ឆ្នាំខាល ចត្វាស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី១២ ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២២ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអាស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “គ” ជាន់ទី៧
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : 087 247 476
អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh/ huy.sovannara@pfm.gov.kh/ insovankongkea@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។

job title: មន្ត្រីជំនួយការ (Assistant)
position: មន្ត្រីជំនួយការ (Assistant)
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ (អ.គ.ហ) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ ត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវធនធានមនុស្សដែលមាន សមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍ស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
ក្នុងន័យនេះ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានសូមប្រកាសជ្រើសរើស មន្ត្រីជំនួយការ ចំនួន០១រួប សម្រាប់បំពេញការងារពេញម៉ោងជូន ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និង ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងវាយតម្លៃ ដែលមានលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិ និងបំពេញលក្ខខណ្ឌដូចមានរៀបរាប់លម្អិតនៅផ្នែកខាងក្រោម៖
• មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គ្រប់គ្រង ឬប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ទាក់ទងការងារជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក យ៉ាងតិច០៣ឆ្នាំ
• មានជំនាញក្នុងការចរចាកិច្ចសន្យា និងការសម្របសម្រួល
• មានជំនាញក្នុងការរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ជាខេមរភាសា និងភាសាអង់គ្លេស
• មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសស្ទាត់ជំនាញ ទាំងភាសានិយាយ និងសរសេរ 
• មានកម្រិត IELT 5.5 ឬសញ្ញាបត្រភាសាអង់គ្លេស 
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង និងអាចបំពេញការងារជាក្រុម
Job Requirement:
ការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកជាប់កិច្ចសន្យានេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីកគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន ប៉ុន្តែ ផ្តល់ជូនអទិភាពជូនដល់មន្រ្តីរាជការដែលស្ម័គ្រចិត្តព្យួរការងារនៅអង្គភាពដើម ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅអគ្គលេខាដ្ឋាន។ ស្ត្រីត្រូវបានផ្តល់សិទ្ធអាទិភាពសម្រាប់មុខដំណែង។

បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃចន្ទ ២រោច ខែភទ្របទ ឆ្នាំខាល ចត្វាស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី១២ ខែកញ្ញា ឆ្នាំ២០២២ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ 

សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ

position: Senior Digital Marketing Exc. (400-600 or above)
Job Description: •Plan, develop and implement strategic digital marketing plan to reach new market segments and enlarge market shares (if applicable).•Develop the budget plans to carry out the digital marketing campaigns (if applicable).•Providing innovative online marketing concepts to glorify company brands, products, and services.•Planning digital marketing campaigns, including web, email, social media, Facebook and display advertising.•Lead on social media pages (Tik Tuk, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, YouTube and etc.)•Demonstrated Facebook and Tik Tuk experience, such as Page management, LIVE streaming, and Messenger.•Create a solid social media plan to increase followers, brand awareness, and engagement.•Implement online marketing promotions and strategies to increase monthly sales targets.•Research on customer and product trends, and identify new opportunities to drive digital growth.•Establish and maintain relationships with influencers, outside media partners and key strategic partners to expand the network.•Measuring and reporting on the performance of all digital marketing campaigns•Other tasks as assigned by superior.

Job Description: 1.	ទទួលការបញ្ជាទិញពីអតិថិជន ប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ2.	ត្រូវចេញប៉ុង ឬការបញ្ជាទិញពីអតិថិជន (PO) អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលាជូនអតិថិជន3.	ពិនិត្យ និងទូទាត់លុយពីអតិថិជនអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវនិងច្បាស់លាស់ មុនបញ្ជូនទៅផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ4.	ត្រូវពិនិត្យទំនិញជាមួយផ្នែកឃ្លាំង មុនពេលលក់ទំនិញជូនអតិថិជន5.	ទំនាក់ទំនងនឹងដោះស្រាយជាមួយអតិថិជនអោយមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព6.	រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាព ដើម្បីលក់អោយដល់គោលដៅ7.	ទទួលការរិះគន់ ឬមតិយោបល់ ពីអតិថិជន ដើម្បីកែលម្អ8.	ត្រូវស្គាល់ពីផលិតផល និងតម្លៃអោយបានច្បាស់លាស់ រួមទាំងចំណេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសផងដែរ9.	សម្របសម្រួលជាមួយអ្នកបើកបរ ដើម្បីដឹកទំនិញជូនអតិថិជនបានទាន់ពេលវេលា10.	ត្រូវខិតខំពង្រឹងសមត្ថភាព ដើម្បីអនុវត្តការងារអោយបានល្អប្រសើរ11.	ត្រូវសហការជាមួយផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីសម្រេចគោលដៅរួម
Job Requirement: - បេក្ខជនទាំងពីរភេទ ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៍ ១ឆ្នាំ ឡើងទៅ- អាចអានភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានខ្លះៗ- មានប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងជាមួយអតិថិជនបានល្អ- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ក្លាហាន និងគោរពពេលវេលា- មានភាពឆ្លាតវៃក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជាមួយអតិថិជន និងផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ- ត្រូវចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (Ms.Word, Excel, Internet and Email)	------------------ដាក់ពាក្យ៖- Email: ustcompanywork@gmail.com- Tel: 010 5966 64 (Telegram)- អាស័យដ្ឋាន៖ ផ្លូវលេខ369 ភូមិព្រែកតាពៅ សង្កាត់ព្រែកប្រា ខ័ណ្ឌច្បារអំពៅ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។

Job Description: •Monthly spot check inventory at store, 3 stores per month.•Ensure all inventory posting are complete before deadline of following month. Follow-up pending POS before month-end. Follow-up pending PO. Ensure all recipe inventory (all outlets) are produced and transfer to store on time.•Calculate cost of goods sold for all stores by deadline of following month. Ensure Physical inventory count by store•Monthly reconcile inventory by outlet's system vs system by deadline. Ensure transfer in/out transfer between warehouse to store is correct.•Review new Item card create by supply chain. Ensure all information is input completely and at least mandatory fill.•Reconcile G/L inventory & listing•Create Recipe card for new POS. Request recipe ingredient from head of department. Verify the recipe before input in system. Ensure the cost is calculated correctly. Ensure all information is input completely and at least mandatory fill.•Review all items unit cost by day deadline to ensure all items has correct unit cost. •Manage accounting payable and account receivable related activities by schedules•Update the monthly selling price report •Monthly confirmation with purchase & Inventory is correct.•Be able to produce COGS report to Head of brand and explain the variance•Monitor and report on outstanding accounts and conduct risk management to find out any issue.•Engage in operational issues and listening to their concerns;•Responsible for all the daily bookkeeping and accounting entries into the accounting system;•Recommends cost-reducing solution.•Cooperate with any audit requirements internal, external and group of business. •Check and review all department purchase Invoice•Help to manage fixed asset listing and tag code•Supervise daily Operations, and coaching staff.•Assist manager in preparing and updating workflow process manuals •Performance other tasks as assigned by superior.•Assist in preparing the monthly forecast, quarterly and annual results
Job Requirement: •Minimum 1-2 years experiences in a supervisor position within a significant finance function•Supervisory/leadership skills•Experience in the Food business an advantage
Company Profile: COLOR CUP, which has been in business for almost 5 years, is one of the leading and biggest local outdoor pubs, founded by Cambodian shareholders with the goal of creating a recognizable local brand in the kingdom. It is currently led by young Cambodians who have committed to providing high-quality services, a fancy atmosphere, a wide selection of mouthwatering cuisine, fresh drinks, and affordable costs.

position: រដ្ឋបាលឃ្លាំង/គណនេយ្យ-ស្តុក
Job Description: 1. រៀបចំបញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យ ស្តុកលក់ចេញ និងទិន្នន័យ ឡត គំរប សំបកដប ល្អឬខូច  ( Soft and Hard )2. ទទួលទំនិញប្តូរមកពីអតិថិជន 3. ចុះឆែកមើលទំនិញ ល្អឬខូច ដែលក្រុមការងារស្តុកបានរើស4. សហការណ៍ជាមូយគណនេយ្យដើម្បីផ្ទៀងរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំខែ5. ទទួល និងអនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលប្រធានប្រគល់ជូន6. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ7. រៀបចំ និងព្រៀងលិខិតផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការស្នើរបស់ប្រធានរដ្ឋបាល
Job Requirement: - មានកម្រិតវប្បធម៌បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រជំនាញរដ្ឋបាល ច្បាប់,គ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅ - មានបទពិសោធន៍ខាងផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលចាប់ពី ១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ- មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ជាមួយការងារ ព្រមទាំងមានស្មារតីធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម- ត្រូវមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ព្រមទាំងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍក្រុមហ៊ុន- ត្រូវមានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាដែលកើតឡើងពាក់ព័ន្ធផលប្រយោជន៍ក្រុមហ៊ុន- មានកាយសម្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ អត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត ស្មោះត្រង់ សុភាពរាបសារ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់- ត្រូវចេះនិយាយ សរសេរ អាន ស្តាប់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រ ដូចជាៈ Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet and E-mailបានយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ ។- ក្រុមហ៊ុននឹងផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលបន្ថែមគណនេយ្យ-ស្តុក-មានបទពិសោធន៍ខាងផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលចាប់ពី ១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ- មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ជាមួយការងារ ព្រមទាំងមានស្មារតីធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម- ត្រូវមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ព្រមទាំងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការអភិវឌ្ឍក្រុមហ៊ុន- ត្រូវមានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាដែលកើតឡើងពាក់ព័ន្ធផលប្រយោជន៍ក្រុមហ៊ុន- មានកាយសម្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ អត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត ស្មោះត្រង់ សុភាពរាបសារ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់- ត្រូវចេះនិយាយ សរសេរ អាន ស្តាប់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រ ដូចជាៈ Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet and E-mailបានយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ ។

Job Description: 1- ធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញពីក្នុងនិងក្រៅប្រទេស2- បញ្ជាទិញទំនិញដែលជាវត្ថុធាតុដើមសម្រាប់ប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃប្រចាំខែ3- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍អំពីការបញ្ជាទិញ4- ពិនិត្យស្តុក និងធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញអោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលា5- ត្រូវសហការជាមួយផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធអោយបានល្អ------------------------------------------- បុគ្គលិកគណនី (Fixed Asset) (២នាក់)១ ពិនិត្យ និងបញ្ជូលទិន្នន័យទ្រព្យសកម្មក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធគណនេយ្យ២ មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច១ឆ្នាំ៣​​ ជានិស្សិតឆ្នាំទី ៣ ឡើងទៅ ជំនាញគណនេយ្យ៤ ចេះប្រើកុំព្យូបាន (Ms. Word & Excel) និង QuickBooks កាន់តែប្រសើរ៥ អត់ធ្មត់ និងខិតខំធ្វើការ និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សមត្ថភាព៦ មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត

Job Description: 1.	ទទួលការបញ្ជាទិញពីអតិថិជន ប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ2.	ត្រូវចេញប៉ុង ឬការបញ្ជាទិញពីអតិថិជន (PO) អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលាជូនអតិថិជន3.	ពិនិត្យ និងទូទាត់លុយពីអតិថិជនអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវនិងច្បាស់លាស់ មុនបញ្ជូនទៅផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ4.	ត្រូវពិនិត្យទំនិញជាមួយផ្នែកឃ្លាំង មុនពេលលក់ទំនិញជូនអតិថិជន5.	ទំនាក់ទំនងនឹងដោះស្រាយជាមួយអតិថិជនអោយមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព6.	រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាព ដើម្បីលក់អោយដល់គោលដៅ7.	ទទួលការរិះគន់ ឬមតិយោបល់ ពីអតិថិជន ដើម្បីកែលម្អ8.	ត្រូវស្គាល់ពីផលិតផល និងតម្លៃអោយបានច្បាស់លាស់ រួមទាំងចំណេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសផងដែរ9.	សម្របសម្រួលជាមួយអ្នកបើកបរ ដើម្បីដឹកទំនិញជូនអតិថិជនបានទាន់ពេលវេលា10.	ត្រូវខិតខំពង្រឹងសមត្ថភាព ដើម្បីអនុវត្តការងារអោយបានល្អប្រសើរ11.	ត្រូវសហការជាមួយផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីសម្រេចគោលដៅរួម
