Job Description:
•	Generally manage and supervise the whole construction department (Including site and design team)
•	Prepare all projects planning including project schedule, material plan, cash-out plan, and others
•	Work on the calculation of project cost, products cost, project annual budget, and related business planning
•	Monitor all contractors to deliver the projects with good quality and within agreed timeline
•	Coordinate with other senior managements and provide input into project development plan, master plan, and products to meet market trends and customers’ preferences
•	Manage the projects to complete on time and handover to customers with satisfaction
•	Monitor and track construction cost to ensure it is within approved budget
•	Ensure work quality of construction is achieved
•	Work along line with other managements to do strategic plan and execute to achieve company’s goals
•	Lead design team and QS team to conduct value engineering on designs and drawings to reduce construction cost
•	Conduct training and workshops for staffs including technical works and products
•	Prepare and submit monthly report to management team
•	Other tasks to be assigned by Managing Director
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor or master degree in Civil Engineering or related fields.
•	Minimum 5 year experience in Construction or Project Management.
•	Good command of reading, writing and speaking English is a plus.
•	Proficiency in Computer Skills (MS Office, Microsoft Project, Auto CAD and other engineering software).
•	Ability to communicate and negotiate with team and sub-contractors.
•	Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.
Working Days and Hours
•	Monday to Friday (8am to 5:30pm) / Saturday (8am to 12pm)
•	Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:30pm
Company Profile:
Chea Ry Co., LTD is a registered company, and real estate developer which has
construction experience in housing for almost 30 years. Our vision is becoming a wellknown, growth and all areas of business operations, by focusing on standard
construction quality, and customer center, and staff development. In the company, We

Job Description:
•	Generally manage and supervise the whole architect team
•	Design and propose product concepts to meet market and customer’s trends
•	Produce 3D renderings and video animations of the projects for design proposal and marketing purposes
•	Have good understanding and knowledge on architectural and finishing material
•	Research and initiate new concepts for products and master plan design
•	Do recommendation on material selection to meet market and customer’s needs

•	Conduct value engineering on architectural design and drawing to minimize construction cost

•	Conduct spot-check and inspection construction work to ensure it’s built as per drawing and design 
•	Provide technical advice to support construction team
•	Review and combine all types of drawings (Including MEP and Structure) to ensure there is no technical error during construction
•	Monitor and coordinate with vendors and contractors to execute the project according to standards of design and technical requirements
•	Other tasks to be assigned by Project Manager
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor or master degree in Architecture or related fields.
•	Minimum 4 year experience in Architectural Design.
•	Good command of reading, writing and speaking English is a plus.
•	Proficiency in Computer Skills (MS Office, Microsoft Project, Computation software as Lumion, Photoshop, Sketch up, Auto CAD and other design software).
•	Ability to communicate and negotiate with team and sub-contractors.
•	Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: - Degree in Marketing Management, Business, Information Systems,or similar- 3-5 years Demonstrable track record of devising sales-enhancingstrategies- Sound knowledge of prevailing procedures and techniques in e-commerce- Ability to tackle the demands of ever-evolving technological implements with ease.
Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh HQ: , #93B, St590, Vllage13, Sangkat Boeng kok, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
Trade Programs
• Plan and prepare trade promotion and communication sales kit 
• Support sales team with marketing activities to drive sales volume and distribution, and set guidelines for displays and merchandizing. 
• Monitor sales performance progress, inventory and competitor’s activities for in-depth market insights. 
• Responsible for the production, allocation and tracking of POSM (e.g. shelf displays, banners, posters, flyers, etc). 
• Prepare Mid-Month Business Report and Post-Program Review 
• Coordinate with Marketing Manager and Finance Team on reimbursement of all promotional and advertising expenses.  

Trade Relations & Communication
• Prepare and conduct monthly briefing to the sales team of marketing promotions and activities. 
• Weekly market visits to the trade with sales team. 
• Develop and maintain positive working relationship with internal (TSNR departments) and external (principal, retailers) stakeholders
• Lead merchandiser and/or PG team to drive in-store visibility and/or sales. 
• Manage brand’s in-field activation and/or sampling events.
Job Requirement:
Education:
• Bachelor degree in Sales and Marketing or relevant field

Experience:
• 1-2 of experience in Trade Marketing in FMCG, in a familiar trade marketing role
• Experience of project management against set deliverables

Technical skills:
• Strong communication skills, both written and verbal and excellent stakeholder management skills
• Ability to prioritize and organize workloads independently when required. 
• Team player and the ability to work across different multi-media platforms and departments. 
• Ability to problem solve and “make things happen” 
• Willingness to learn and develop with the role.

Job Description: • Prepare and ensures an accurate and timely sending of invoice and customer statement to all customers• Reconciles G/L account by verifying with invoice posting from Sale admin.• Prepares daily receipt report, deposit, and offsetting to ensure clean aging report• Verifies validity of account discrepancies by obtaining and investigate information from sales, Discounts, Promotions and perform account reconciliation• Respond promptly and completely to all billing queries• Assists supervisor to set up Billing, Credit Control and Debt Recovery Policies and Procedures to keep the company to the minimum risk• Review and records daily purchases invoice from supplier in to Accounting System• Prepare and ensures the payment to vendors is completed within a timely manner and in accordance with payment terms and applicable internal policy• Performs other tasks assigned by direct reporting line

Job Description:
Job Description:
1. Rules & regulations of relating property services department includes:
- SOP of security, Cleaning, Landscape & Parking
- CCTV
2. Site documentary
- Specifications
- O&M manuals
- Facility management plan
- T&C certification and functional test
3. Awarding & manage of third-party agreements
- Parking equipment, parking management
- Security, cleaning, pest control
- Garbage collection, landscape
4. Deep clean (façade, exterior & interior) alignment with construction team
5. Parking equipment, parking flow, parking management
6. Purchase of toilet consumables, tools & equipment/machines
7. Public announcement systems
8. Team Building (JDs, Recruitment, Training, On-boarding Staff)
9. Daily works:
- Daily check on cleaning, security, landscape & facilities
- Review outstanding issues
- Follow up defect lists
- Communication with 3rd parties’ services on daily issues
- Report to management on the daily performance relate to property service
10. Perform other task as required by business and management
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements:
- Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Management or a related field.
- At least 3 years of experience in similar industry or position (Property Management/ Mall Management) 
- Background with Mall Management is a plus 
- A highly organized, deadline detailed oriented professional with proven track record of insightful analysis to management
- Intermediate to advanced proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook). 
- Intermediate to advanced English proficiency  
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills 
- Multi-tasker and willing to support team 24/7 
- Strong Discipline, planning and well organization 
- Ability to work well individually and as a team 
- Ability to work under pressure
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
LWD Business Partner: 
•	Work closely and support LWD team by providing analysis, financial recommendation for the proposed project & investment. 
•	Challenge assumptions for proposed delivered costs in LWD   
•	Provide support and guidance to the LWD team in areas for improvement in margins and spend optimization. 
•	Assist all LWD capabilities to manage delivered costs.
•	Evaluate the profitability of the investment in LWD function.   
•	To support ad hoc information requests from LWD team, business finance manager.
•	Operating Expense control: provide analysis and highlight opportunity to minimize operation costs.
•	Coordinate LWD RFA circulation
•	Analyst on own Truck Vs 3PL 
•	Freight Cost evaluation
•	Define Risk and opportunity for improvement 
•	Post evaluation on Capex investment
Internal Control & performance management:
•	Ensure delivered cost per UC accordingly to BP/RE 
•	Preparation of various management analytical reports and presentations including: budget vs. actual reports of LWD, gross margin, P&L, monthly LWD headcount reconciliation.
•	Responsible for the business dashboard information integrity and timely reporting
•	Validate LWD dashboard (cost).
Planning & Forecasting:
•	To support the supply chain team in the completion of financial information for capex, operating expenses for SBP, BP & RE and any strategic initiatives
Effectiveness and Efficiency:
•	Prepare accurate, timely and effective site management account, advising and highlighting variances so that LWD management can take effective action to improve operating performance 
•	Seek out and implement best practice internally to improve the accuracy of financial reporting and processes
System and process management:
•	    Ensure business process, system and operating routines are full compliance with governance standard
•	    Standardize data, information management, policy and procedures standards.
•	    Ensure that delivered costs spend is accordance with S.P.P 
•	    Maximize system capabilities and leverage SAP.

Requirements:
•	University/bachelor’s degree in Business Finance 
•	2-3-year experience in Managing business finance which involve in investment analyst 
•	Business process and reporting 
•	Good in reading, speaking & writing English
•	Computerized skill: Microsoft office (Excel advance), internet & email

Job Description:
3. PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES
- Oversee internal and external client audits as it relates to IT security and compliance.
- Assist with third-party IT vulnerability assessments
- To develop training document of Cybersecurity awareness and training to all employees
- Administer document classification audits and coordinate remediation activities
- Help develop guidance, processes, and tools / controls to ensure data is structured and secured appropriately
- Real-time analysis of immediate threats, and triage when something goes wrong.
- Rolling out security hardware and software and making sure IT and network infrastructure are designed with best security practices in mind.
- Identity and access management: Ensuring that only authorized people have access to restricted data and systems.
- Determining what went wrong in a breach, dealing with those responsible if they are internal, and planning to avoid repeats of the same crisis.
- Ensure effective implementations of the information security policies and procedures.
- Communicate governance activities, policies, and decisions with the company management team and keep them informed of IT governance decisions that will affect IT services and projects
- Track configuration items and maintain technical documentation control.
- Maintain up-to-date and accurate records of the incident and problem resolution activities
Job Requirement:
- Working experiences in life insurance industry, financial or bank industry or related industry preferable.
- At least 3+ years of experience with system, network development and Security
- Who hold any certified of CCNA/CCNA Security or higher preferable, or MCSA or higher preferable, or NSE4/5 or higher preferable, or VCA/VCP or higher preferable, or other certified equivalent.   
- Knowledge base with any Windows platform, Linux/Unix platform, and command line languages.
- Experience in system collaboration and online service integration and cyber security.
- Experience in documenting and training material
- Understanding network/system architecture to provide improvements
- Experience in security perspective and auditing process.
- Experience with virtualization and network storage
- Experience with application/operation system/software installation and maintenance
- Solid English speaking and writing

Job Description:
To manage and lead the support of commercial systems and other related Sales Solutions including:
•	Distributor Management System (DMS)
•	Sale Force Automation (SFA)
•	Contract Management System (CMS) 
•	System Integrations
•	Works with relevant stakeholders to rollout new IT projects, IT systems, Integration, enhancement and change requests.
•	Provide leading support to business users on commercial systems and/ or related Sale Solutions
•	Provides leading support on system integrations and ensure their smooth operations   
•	Liaises with vendor for any bug/ error, new requirement and enhancement
•	Perform UAT with stakeholders, identify potential issues and impacts
•	Review user’s activity logs on supported applications, reporting potential risks, data breach and security breach
•	Develops necessary documentation associated system changes, i.e., business requirements, functional design, system configuration documents, user manuals, training materials.
•	Develop and maintain standard operating procedures and operation manual for each supported applications
•	With the rapid pace of change, regularly monitor technological advances and assess their potential application for improved business processes and design.
•	Initiate on system improvement and reduce user workload from system automate
•	Ability to work outside of normal business hours to provide support as and when necessary, to resolve urgent operational issues or to complete project work within expected timeline.
•	Other ad-hoc IT duties assigned by Management from time to time
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor's degree in computer science, management information systems, or related field, or equivalent combination of education and work experience is required.

•	Certification in ITIL Certification and Project Management is an advantage

•	Minimum 3 year working experience in supporting IT business application and IT project implementation in medium to large organizations.
•	Good knowledge and understanding commercial applications or other sales IT solution such as DMS, SFA, BI, CMS…
•	Knowledge of business processes related to Sales/ Commercial 
•	Experience in a variety of data integration technologies with ERP system, including Microsoft Dynamic Navision
•	Knowledge of informational technology disciplines, e.g., software applications and interfaces, production operations, quality assurance and systems management, etc. 
•	Good experience in project management process and systems.
•	Excellent written, oral, instructional, presentation, and interpersonal skills focused on motivation and positive attitude
•	Ability to handle confrontation with appropriate grace, professionalism, cordiality, and firmness, and manage/resolve disputes appropriately 
•	Knowledge of new technologies (in specific field) and maintain and stay abreast of updates and changes 
•	Have ability to manage time, prioritize work, work under pressure and complete multiple tasks effectively
•	Be disciplined, self-starter, creative thinking, flexibility, good personality and

Job Description:
• Control and update company website and all social network channel
• Creating marketing campaigns and working with corporate partners(TVs, Radios, Social Event Organizers) to maximize brand awareness.
• Assess the suitability of contents and articles for publication or broadcasting, ensuring they are within an established style and format, and edit as necessary
• Write articles/contents that comment on or interpret news events, some of which may put forward a point of view on behalf of the company.
• Preparing, planning and managing the distribution of channels online and offline.
• Preparing and managing Advertising Schedule for corporate partner.
• Creating and developing new advertising concepts and drafting art work to deliver marketing massage to the target audience.
• Managing online marketing campaign and response to enquiries on Social Network Site. (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Etc).
• Updating and evaluating the effectiveness of all marketing activity.
• Preparing research and survey to develop and implement company projects and promotions.
• Supporting other tasks as directed by Chief Sales and Marketing /General Manager.
Job Requirement:
*** Job Requirements
• A bachelor's degree in Marketing, business administration or a similar skill.
• At least 1 years of working experience.
• Competent in Ms. Office, and Internet Research.
• Able to use Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign is plus.
• Good Communication, friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under pressure.

** Working Days and Hours:
- Monday to Saturday: 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 11:00am to 1:00pm

* Working place:
- Digital Marketing: is based at Head Office in Khan Chbar Ampov, Phnom Penh.

* Relationship:
- Works under supervision & report directly to GENERAL MANAGER/Chief Sales and Marketing Officer.

• Meal Allowance.

Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
•	Responsible to roll-out projects for marketing functions including running events inside the mall to increase foot traffic and build the shopping mall reputation for the community nearby
•	Promote and build long term business relationships with tenants, associates, and customers by formulating and implementing strategy to grow retailer revenue, profitability, operation and sustainability
•	Engage with tenants on marketing communication, promotional, and advertising plans to have their involvement and support to align with the shopping mall marketing plan
•	Monitor and measure tenant compliance to specified standards to ensure their operation within guidelines of their signed lease agreement, regulations
•	Provide immediate consultation to tenants as well as the point of contact for the retailer relationship management team for the initiation of marketing activities
•	Align with the Group Marketing and Communication to work on the production of marketing materials (press releases, emails, newsletters, photographs, promotional videos, handouts, brochures, direct mail leaflets) 
•	Liaise with tenants in general for their day to day operations
•	Other tasks assigned by manager
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration or other related fields
•	Minimum 5 years working on the same job scope
•	At least 7 years working in retail industries within Marketing and Communication areas or other related field such as Leasing Management or Customer Services Management
•	Experienced and proficient in verbal and written communication and preparing reports. 
•	Understanding of consumer marketing, accounts, and contract laws
•	Knowledge of retail marketing in a shopping mall environment
•	Knowledge of advertising campaigns, press releases and the development of other strategic communications
•	Excellent communications skills, working effectively with media and the public
•	Competent in formal Report Writing and Presentation Skills
•	Demonstrated supervisory and mentoring skills 
•	A team player with the ability to work independently
•	Be self-motivated and performance focused 
•	Good people Skills
•	Proven ability to influence people (internally and externally)
•	Ability to work under pressure
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:

•	Must report and update regularly to his main supervisor, by texting, sending pictures and vocal messages.

*** Responsibilities:

•	Solving small problems by him/herself

1.	Technical knowledge: 
•	Computer literacy (must work independently on Word & Excel)
•	English basic is required
•	Very good abilities in communication (speaking & writing)
•	Able to explain clearly some reports, presentation or any problems we might be faced
•	Ornament trees and plants specific knowledges, will be appreciated. 
2.	Experience and Qualification Require:
•	Experience in agriculture and team management
•	Bachelor degree’s or equivalent experience

Job Description:
** Reporting Line: Supply Intern report to Supply Manager

** Key Responsibilities:
- Overall assistant on Supply’s Clerk & Admin Tasks
- Perform all monthly Goods Receive Note in SAP from internal stakeholder’s expense
- Perform all monthly Goods Receive Note in SAP for Diesel, Gasoline, JET, and Lubricant
- Assist Main Fuel & Lubricant Planner on daily document submission to Ministry and other stakeholders
- Ensure all kind of documents are kept in the proper place for Audit (2 years keep in HQ & the rests are keep at archive room.
- Follow up clearance document from HQ to Clearance Agent
- Ability to prepare routine administrative paperwork.
- Assist on Supply activities assigned in SAP system
- Support stock reconciliation
- Other tasks are assigned by Supply Manager (N+1)
Job Requirement:
** Key Requirements:
- Educational background: A fourth year student or fresh graduate of Business administration
- Skills: Good command of English writing and speaking. Strong interpersonal and communication skills
- Knowledge: Proficient in MS Office especially excel & power point, Internet and Email
- Good personality and willing to learn
- Internship period: 6 months
Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Our 105,000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable, clean, reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries, TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people. 

TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been officially operating in Cambodia since 1993. Throughout the country, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been involved in marketing various energy and lubricants products and services to its customers in both the private and public sectors. We offer a wide range of products through more than 100 service stations with over 52 Bonjour Shops, Industrial fuels, Aviation fuels and lubricants. Through the TotalEnergies Card, customers are offered a convenient way to make and manage fuel purchases. Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

In view of supporting its growth in Cambodia, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.  is looking for a talented and motivated candidate for the position as follow:


Applications should be submitted via email: sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com *Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms Lypy LY   sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St 271, Beoung Tumpun, Meanchey, Phnom Penh – CAMBODIA

Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.

Company Profile:
Westview Cambodian International School is the great extension to secondary education by the passionate leadership team of Learning Jungle International School Cambodia (LJIS) offering educational services only from preschool to elementary program. With the strong support from parents, students, staff, and the Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport, Westview Cambodian International School is created to offer the International Secondary program built from the world-renowned standards of education, American Common Core Standards (ACCS), and the Khmer language, history and culture into one unique curriculum from grades 7 to 12.

Our major achievements include becoming an IELTS test venue, becoming a member of CIS accreditation, conducting an international benchmark test for our students called MAP test, joining one of the big world conferences called Model United Nations, and receiving the HR Asia Award for the best company to work for in 2021.

Job Description:
Gardener
•  Supervise gardener to properly watering and fertilizing plants
•  Support making PR & PO of gardening material and plants
•  Able to provide recommendation of planting 

Housekeeper
•  Prepare working schedule and task assignment to housekeepers
•  Provide training on how to use cleaning tools and machine effectively
•  Monitor on cleaning quality of the staff both daily and weekly work to meet requirement and expectation

Pool & Gym Attendant
•  Tracking the footfall of facilities services user on daily basis
•  Supervise the daily operational services 
•  Provide recommendation on improvement 

Overall Tasks
•  Stock management, PR & PO of related facilities use
•  Assist the residents and provide any needs / manage complaints
•  Assist to set up operations flow and hours of facilities services and facilities usage policies

•  Intermediate to advanced English proficiency 
•  Strong communication and interpersonal skills
•  Ability to work well individually and as a team
•  Ability to work under pressure
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
Handover Work
•  Support inspection of unit before handover to client
•  Support and coordinate with smooth handover of units and be on time
•  Work closely within and across department to deal with customer complaints related to handover and defect modification
•  Support Senior MEP Engineer on handover building system from construction team 
•  Join system training from contractor to understand all system operations

Emergency & Safety Monitoring
•  Manage working safety within the building include teamwork, sub-contractors, or technician
•  Daily monitor of CCTV

Technical and Daily Works
•  Provide fast solution to any failure of system and technical issue in building
•  Conduct preventive maintenance upon schedule set by Senior MEP
•  To monitor the facilities and building system run smoothly and well maintenance including but not limited to;
a.  Water Treatment System, & Plumbing System
b.  CCTV, Access Control, Parking System, and Internet Connection
c.  Firefighting, Fire Alarm, Smoke and Head Detector, Fire Hose Reel & Hydrant, Alarm system, Firefighting & pump, Emergency Light
d.  Elevator, Generator, Swimming Pool, Control Room
•  Support Senior MEP Engineer with other department such design team, MEP team and modification team for any request to change the internal unit from unit owner
•  Record monthly utilities (electricity and water usage)
•  Support other tasks assignment by Senior MEP Engineer or Assistant Property Manager
Job Requirement:
•  At least 2-year experiences in construction of high rise building and building maintenance
•  Knowledge of experience in handover the building from construction to management team
•  Experience in managing condominium building system is a plus
•  Good at Excel, Word, and PowerPoint 
•  Good in written communication, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
•  Strong interpersonal skills
•  Ability to work under pressure
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:

You will be working in Advertising and Event Planning Section, and Marketing and Business Planning Department. You will report your tasks to direct Manager, and General Manager.

•	Have at least a bachelor degree.
•	Be able to use English in Business level.
•	Have good communication with others and be able to work in team and work independently.
•	Be able to use Microsoft office and be familiar to work on various systems as required.

Job Description:
About this job:

This position is working on managing Digital Monitor Screen inside Mall’s area, you must have some
experience of Monitor, LED screen or relate software, basic knowledge about IT and experience
with PC and some of the design task will require. You need to make reports after the video was
broadcast and share your report with customers and your management. You will require working on
holiday depend on working conditions. You will be working in the Advertising and Event Planning
Section and Business Planning Department; you will set the target Plan to achieve at the end of the
year. You will report your task to the direct manager, and General Manager.


Duties and Responsibilities:

- Finding new customers and keep in touch with existing client.
- Response clients by email, physical meeting, and phone call
- Make income report and monthly report share to management
- Manage booking schedule & expiration date
- Check video content and report the problem to management
Job Requirement:
- Have knowledge and experience at least 1Year about Digital function or related software or Basic of IT.
- Have knowledge about Advertising method.
- Have basic of design task more better.
- Have at least a bachelor degree.
- Be able to use English in Business level.
- Have good communication with others and be able to work in team and work independently.

Job Description: •	Prepare, monitor, and report on all property expense schedules/budgets •	Supervision of Admin department in general;•	Manage various activities and contracts (Service / Maintenance)•	Provide reports to management on regular basis on the activities managed and cost cutting initiatives;•	Management (including negotiation) of Annually maintenance contracts with vendors;•	Work with other Departments to prepare branch roll out plans for new Business Offices and execute; •	Monitor, supervise and ensure safety measures are incorporated into all business office development;•	Co-ordination and management of all administrative issues like hygiene, stationeries, & welfare;•	Develop and maintain up-to-date, effective security measures to protect the Bank’s properties and staff;•	Ensure all rents are paid promptly;•	Supervise all maintenance activities and maintain a regular schedule of maintenance for the Bank’s properties;•	Establish the SLAs for all service providers and suppliers and monitor its compliance;•	Ensure the Bank’s insurance policy is adhered to at all premises ;•	Maintain clean surroundings on daily bases throughout the day;•	Ensure adequate records of fleet management/movement, and put in place policies/structures to guard against abuse;•	Maximize the best value for money for bank wide procurement activities and in line with the bank’s policies and procedures;•	Deliver all admin services in the most efficient manner to facilitate the functions of other departments;•	Ensure strict compliance with Outsourcing guidelines and Bank policies;•	Ensure that the Bank has adequate cover for its fixed assets, against fraud and accidents;•	Manage all protocol assignments of the Bank;•	Ensure administration staffs are trained on best practices in their roles;•	Procurement of equipment and other supplies;•	Responsible for the purchasing and organization of supplies for all new branches;•	Responsible for organizing machines to all branches (leasing / outright purchase);•	Management of fuel consumption (generator /office cars / contracts);•	Maintenance and procurement of office cars;•	Maintaining the bank’s alarm system;•	Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in business / Administration;•	At least 5 years’ working experience in administration with proven knowledge on procurement procedures and processes;•	Understanding of floor plan and renovation/maintenance program;•	Knowledge of building standards coupled with sound technical knowledge;•	Ability to work well with local authority including the knowledge of property related legislation;•	Experience in managing contracts with various vendors and ensuring the SLA is adhered to;•	Excellent computer skills;•	Good communication skills (both written and verbal);•	Self-motivated with the ability to meet project deadlines
Company Profile: Bridge Bank PLC is one the companies under WorldBridge Group of Companies, formerly known as Oxley-Worldbridge Specialized Bank Plc which has operated since 18 November 2014. The bank was granted a commercial bank license by National Bank of Cambodia on 28 February 2022.

Company Profile:
MAXIMA MICROFINANCE PLC. was founded in March 2000 with the initial objective and mission of providing loans and financial services to low income clients, individuals, groups, or small and medium businesses (SMEs) which operated 18 branch across Cambodia.

Our Vision
To be the leading Microfinance institution offering micro-financial service with highest quality of customer service.

Our Mission
To provide inclusive financial solution to low income household and SMEs for improving their socio-economic standards in a sustainable way.

job title: មន្រ្តីតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិកា
position: មន្រ្តីតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិកា
Job Description: -ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកភ្នាក់ងារ រៀបចំវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនិងបង្កើតវគ្គហាត់សមទៅអោយបុគ្គលិករបស់ម៉ាក់ស៊ីម៉ាដើម្បីធានាថាពួកគេបានយល់ច្បាស់ពីការងារមុនពេលអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យពួកគេចុះបំពេញការងារ ដោយការទទួលខុសត្រូវ។-ធ្វើការណាត់ជួបជាមួយភ្នាក់ងារដើម្បីចុះហត្ថលេខាលើកិច្ចព្រមព្រៀងការងារ-ចែករំលែកបទពិសោធចំណេះដឹងនិងមេរៀនដែលបានរៀនដល់ភ្នាក់ងារដើម្បីឱ្យពួកគេយល់ដឹងកាន់តែប្រសើរឡើងថែមទៀតដើម្បីកែលម្អដំណើរការការងារ។-រៀបចំឯកសារនិងកិច្ចសន្យាខ្ចីប្រាក់មុនពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនិងធ្វើការ-ត្រូវរៀបចំកាលវិភាគនិងស្នើសុំសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់សម្រាប់គម្រោង។-ពិនិត្យមើលរាល់ឯកសារឥណទាននិងឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ទាំងអស់ស្ថិតក្នុងស្ថានភាពល្អនិងត្រូវបានថែរក្សាដោយភ្នាក់ងារ-ប្រមូលឯកសារឥណទាន និង កិច្ចសន្យាខ្ចីចងការពីតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការដើម្បីរក្សា ទុកនៅ ទីស្នាក់ការកណ្តាល-ផ្សព្វផ្សាយនិងប្រាប់អំពីលក្ខណៈពិសេសនៃផលិតផលដល់អតិថិជនសក្តានុពលនៅក្នុងតំបន់-ចូលរួមក្នុងការវាយតម្លៃការងាររបស់ភ្នាក់ងារជាមួយប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ-ធ្វើការយ៉ាងជិតស្និទ្ធជាមួយមន្ត្រីសម្របសម្រួលតំបន់ និងភ្នាក់ងារដើម្បីកំណត់មូលហេតុនៃការបង់ប្រាក់យឹត ភាពទន់ខ្សោយនៃប្រតិបត្តិការនិងផ្តល់អនុសាសន៍ឱ្យផ្លាស់ប្តូរដើម្បីបង្កើនគុណភាព។-ចរចានិងស្វែងរកដំណោះស្រាយ ជាមួយអតិថិជនបង់យឺត
Job Requirement: - ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ត្រូវតែមានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្តត្រឹមត្រូវនិងប្រកបដោយក្រមសីលធម៌ក្នុងស្ថានភាពលំបាក-មានការលើកទឹកចិត្តខ្លួនឯងខ្ពស់ជាមួយនឹងជំនាញអន្តរបុគ្គលផ្ទាល់-ត្រូវមានសមត្ថភាពជំរុញលើក ទឹកចិត្តនិង សម្របសម្រួលជាមួយអ្នកដទៃ-មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន ប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ។-ត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៏ការងារទាក់ទងនឹងការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងអតិថិជន (ឧទាហរណ៍ ទាក់ទងនិងការលក់និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា)-ផ្តល់អាទិភាពចំពោះបេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែល មានបទពិសោធការងារផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការឬ ក្រុមឥណទានក្នុងវិស័យធនាគារឬហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ

Job Description:
• Organize learning material and resources
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods (songs, stories, various medias, structured games, arts & craft,
outdoor activities etc.) to motivate and stimulate children’s abilities
• Maintain an open line of communication with parents and provide appropriate information
• Regularly assess students’ performance and progress to ensure they reach the curriculum goals
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing
• Cooperate with administration staff
• Follow and comply with teaching standards and safety regulations
• Supervision of children during snack time, outdoor play and swimming
Job Requirement:
• Degree in education courses/certificate in TESOL-TEFL-PGCE
• English native, or fluent with strong teaching experience
• 3 years of experience in teaching preschool in an international school
• Creative and resourceful in preparing child-centered activities
• Dedicated, enthusiastic and cheerful
• Excellent knowledge of child development and latest education theories and practices
• Creative and artistic teaching abilities
• Teaching and organization skills
• Patience and flexibility
• Strong communication skills
• Keep abreast with the latest trends and best practices

** Benefits
• Work in a truly international environment
• Competitive wages and complete bonus policy • Well-equipped classes
• Be part of a dynamic & growing team

• joinus@niraisc.edu.kh or call us at 010 765 980

company_name: Phnom Penh Land Development Co., Ltd
Job Description:
** Position Summary:
Chief Executive Officer (CEO) will be responsible and accountable for the overall operation and management of this development company. Chief Executive Officer (CEO) will be looked upon to set the company’s overall strategic direction and priorities and monitor the performance of the company as well as the performance of each project.

** Duties and Main Responsibilities:
1. Roles:
The CEO will guide, direct and lead the Executive Management Team, which is made up of the following such COO, CFO, CDO, CIO.

2. 2. Duties:
• Provide the required linkage between the Board of Directors and the Executive Management Team and provide them with adequate information to carry out their responsibilities.
• Provide advice, guidance, direction, and authorization to the Executive Management Team to carry out major plans and procedures, consistent with established policies.
• Assist the Board of Directors in setting strategic goals, objectives, budgets, policies, and procedures to enhance its market share, profitability and return on investment.
• Conduct a strategic review of performance on a regular basis to determine whether the company is meeting its short-and long-term objectives (increase in profits, return on investment, etc).
• Develop, in coordination with the Executive Management Team, an integrated business plan that optimizes market share and profitability of existing or new activities.
• Set departments' high-level goals, objectives and plans and work with them on attaining such goals by closely monitoring their operations.
• Review the operating results of the company & compare them to established objectives and goals, and follow-up to ensure appropriate measures are taken to correct unsatisfactory results.
• Establish and maintain an effective system of communications throughout the company to ensure that the responsibilities, authorities, and accountabilities of all executives are clearly defined and understood.
• Periodically review and check the performance of the Executive Management Team and recommend remedial action and improvements.
• Promote the company direction and momentum, its business performance, the positive external impact (image), internal business climate, people and services.
• Act as the principal public relations officer of the company and represent them with major customers, government entities, the financial community, and the public.
• Ensure development of an effective organizational structure and the promotion of a positive internal climate in which management development for succession is nurtured.
• Delegate some responsibilities to appropriate executives in order to ensure smooth running of the company.
• Conduct annual performance appraisal for all executives and recommend for improve.
• Monitor the adherence of employees to guidelines, policies and procedures.
• Recruit, develop, manage and motivate executives and employees reporting to CEO.

3. Functional Structure and Hierarchy:
• Chairwoman, Board of Advisor/(s), Board of Director/(s), and C-level managements and other head of departments.

4. Authorization and Competencies:
• Approve and sign the legal documents, administrative documentation/procedures, incomes, expenses, and budget plan from relevant departments below 10,000 USD.
• Approve all SOPs and JDs as well as administrative documents for further action and implementation.

5. Other:
• The Employee is strongly advised to follow the Company's Internal Rules and Regulations (HR Policy). In case of violation or breaching, the disciplinary measures will be applied as set forth by the levels of misconducts.
• The Employee is strongly advised to be timely and punctual, respect hierarchy, work as a team, support, cooperate and communicate.
• The Employee is strongly advised to give feedback and/or report about the status within appropriate timeframe when asked or assigned jobs.
• The workflow and communication line are duly stated in the detailed Company structure.
• This Job Description is nominated for the Employee to implement effectively for the date of its signatures.
Performing other tasks as assigned by superior
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business Administration (MBA is preferred) or equivalent.
• Experience with a minimum of 20 years of related experience.
• Extensive executive-level management experience (10+ years).
• Extensive Real Estate Industry experience (5+ years).
• Strong visionary with proven leadership qualities and an entrepreneurial mindset.
• Political awareness, professional expertise, financial orientation, self-starting initiative, cross cultural awareness, organization astuteness and team spirit.
• Ability to select, develop and motivate necessary management talent to maintain the company's overall objectives.
• Strong interpersonal skills such as leadership, communication, persuasion, motivation, loyalty, and openness.
• Must be a professional of unquestionable integrity, credibility, and character.
• Can-do attitude.
Company Profile:
Phnom Penh Land Development was established in 2016 but its long history was stemmed from some real estate business since 2012. The Company has engaged with big projects of apartments and condominiums for most of the international clients. We are now the developer of the smart city ready for stock exchange market of billion-dollar listing in New York. Grown well from the small to the big sizes among other local and international project developer in Cambodia, we are handling construction projects, including steel handicrafts, shops, houses, apartment, condominiums, villas, schools and many others. Our employees are now more than hundreds. Our vision is to create a safe environment for Cambodians to work, live and play with a mission to establish deep and meaningful collaborations for the betterment of real estate in Cambodia.

Job Description:

Daily Operations

- Supervise the daily operations of outsourced staffs such as janitor, security guard, gardeners, parking operator and internal team of HKL

Company Profile:
Hongkong Land is a major listed property investment, management and development group. Founded in 1889, Hongkong Land’s business is built on excellence, integrity and
partnership.

The Group owns and manages more than 850,000 sq. m. of prime office and luxury retail property in key Asian cities, principally in Hong Kong, Singapore, Beijing and Jakarta. Its properties attract the world’s foremost companies and luxury brands.

The Group’s Central Hong Kong portfolio represents some 450,000 sq. m. of prime property. It has a further 165,000 sq. m. of prestigious office space in Singapore mainly held through joint ventures, a luxury retail centre at Wangfujing in Beijing, and a 50% interest in a leading office complex in Central Jakarta. The Group also has a number of high quality residential, commercial and mixed-use projects under development in cities across Greater China and Southeast Asia. In Singapore, its subsidiary, MCL Land, is a well-established residential developer.
Hongkong Land Holdings Limited is incorporated in Bermuda and has a standard listing on the London Stock Exchange, with secondary listings in Bermuda and Singapore. The
Group’s assets and investments are managed from Hong Kong by Hongkong Land Limited.
Hongkong Land is a member of the Jardine Matheson Group.

• Make cash withdrawal from bank for petty cash. 
• Do filing

• Update fix asset list every quarterly.

• Prepare contract for big supplier.

• Do bank reconciliation
• Prepare monthly expense report for branch.
• Prepare monthly Tax on Expense report to Branch Account controller.
• Prepare cash count report at end of the month.
• Prepare branch financial report.

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSE & DUTY

1.	Facility Management
•	Property Handover and follow project to handover private unit and house to house owner
•	Work with facility management operations; support life safety and security protocols; maintain facilities to be highly functional, clean, and comfortable.
•	Oversee maintenance, repair, construction and renovation work; coordinate work from start to finish.

2.	Leasing Management 
•	Plan and implement the tenancy mix 
•	Conduct regular inspection of properties (vacant units and tenanted units)
•	Network and gather market information on competition and market trends Report on areas that requires attention, repairs, enhancements, etc
•	Lead in negotiation of tenancy agreements, manage lease renewals and arrears

3.	Operation 
•	Preparing operating reports and budgets
•	Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met Ensuring the efficiency of all building systems
•	Managing facilities planning and space allocation Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met
•	Preparing cost estimates for moves and equipment

4.	Property Controlling
•	Planning building maintenance and operational programs
•	Maintain complete and accurate property files and records, according to CEC systems, with an emphasis on documentation for future reference. Coordinate with Executive Education and Initiatives Director procedures for processing and distributing information. Provide prompt, detailed and accurate general status reports on all properties assigned.
•	Establish and maintain collaborative working relationships with all tenants and CEC Executive Leadership Team. Keep abreast of new technologies, systems and procedures related to property management.
•	Ensure the security of the building by researching and implementing various security measures, such as surveillance cameras or security staff members

5.	Utility Controlling 
•	Performs routine and preventative maintenance and repairs on booster pumps and equipment, lift stations and equipment, and treatment plant system components.
•	Set up plan and arrange technician to installs new and/or replaces motors, transformers, breakers, controllers, control valves, PLC's, and other electrical equipment as well as conduit, junction boxes, pulling cables and wires.
•	Record and Collect the utility fee

6.	Administrative work 
•	Handle certain administrative tasks, such as preparing reports for facility owners
•	Interview and hire certain facility employees and contractors, such as maintenance staff and janitorial services
•	Prepare reports for facility owners and attend regular meetings where the upkeep of the building is on the agenda

Job Description:
1. Good knowledge about Air & Ocean for export and import.
2. Be aware of e-filing requirements for export shipments to USA, CANADA, JAPAN…etc.
3. Mainly responsible for coordinating the daily operation and co-operation between the operation team and the customs clearance team, customer service (including booking, customs declaration, box making, expenses, inspection, compensation, etc.).
4. For customers maintained by customer service, if customer service is not in the company or can't be contacted, the operation manager has the responsibility to contact customers at the first time, solve problems and act as customer service.
5. Check the expenses with suppliers and cooperate with finance department to check the payment content.
6. Supervise the daily operation and standardize the operation process.
7. System input management.
8. Convey the tasks assigned by the company leaders and express the feedback information of subordinates.
9. Staffing, job adjustment, job assignment, weekly meetings for operation team, analysis of recent work.
10. Manage and coordinate the overall operation of the operation Department and be responsible for formulating the service and document process of the operation Department.
11. Daily management of subordinates, work guidance, training, work arrangement, inspection and supervision, follow-up.
12. Other assigned jobs.
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor’s degree or above.
2. At least 5 years of operation and management experience in shipping or international freight forwarding and other related fields, including at least 3 years of freight forwarding operation team management experience.
3. Familiar with ocean import and export process and operation, familiar with customs clearance and inspection process, with import and export trade knowledge of documents, freight forwarding, customs declaration, inspection, port operation, container transportation, etc.
4. Familiar with the operation process of refrigerators and other special containers is preferred.
5. Be able to operate related office software skillfully.
6. Good communication skills and team management skills.
7. Careful work, strong sense of responsibility, strong sense of service and team spirit.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   068 78 00 63 / 081 80 69 91  hr@big-link.group Room 2010, Building C7, Fortune Tower, Olympia City, Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia.  068 78 00 63 / 081 80 69 91

Job Description:
1.	Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs.
2.	Plan, develop and organize the construction effort to formulate the most cost-effective plan to timely completion within budget and to implement the execution of that plan
3.	Coordinating and supervising construction workers, subcontractors and work activities
4.	Preparing the site with other construction professionals such as architects, engineers and surveyors before the construction work starts;
5.	Selecting tools and materials (Make a test of the tools before decided to buy it)
6.	Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
7.	Checking and preparing site reports 
8.	Assessing and minimizing risk
9.	Finding ways to prevent problems and to solve any that crop up
10.	Maintaining quality control procedures
11.	Keeping staff motivated and focused
12.	Another task assigns by project manager or project director.
Job Requirement:
1.	Bachelor Degree’s or Master Degree’s in Civil Engineering or other related fields
2.	At least 5 years’ experiences in related filed
3.	Exceptional ability to monitor construction project budgets and deadlines
4.	Advanced negotiation skills to procure cost-effective subcontractors and suppliers
5.	Experience in relaying detailed instructions to onsite construction teams
6.	Knowledgeable of construction safety regulations
7.	Good knowledge of building methods and regulations
8.	Decision-making ability and team motivation
9.	Good communication in English.

Job Description:
1.1.1 Import
1) Daily communication with Customers, Shipping lines and Freight forwarders etc...
2) Follow up the shipment status (ETA) and update to customers on time.
3) Prepare import document to apply at Customs House.
4) Ensure the container delivery to customer upon shipment arrival.
5) Prepare weekly import report.
6) Have knowledge of import shipment with CDC/Master list.
7) Other tasks assigned by superior

1.1.2 Export
1) Daily communication with Customers, Shipping lines and Freight forwarders etc...
2) Booking container truck for loading.
3) Prepare draft BL to Shipping lines & Freight forwarders.
4) Update shipment status to customers.
5) Prepare weekly export report.
6) Key in all the expense invoices in the system and submit all invoices to accounts within the timeline.
7) Other tasks assigned by superior
Job Requirement:
1) Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Logistics or other related fields.
2) Good command of English
3) At least 2-3 years of experience in Logistics Industry.
4) Good attitude and be able to work under pressure

Job Description:
1.   ការងារប្រតិបត្តិប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
1.1  ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពបេតុង(ល្បាយបេតុង ឬស្លាំ) នៅការដ្ឋាន និង ការថែទាំម៉ាស៊ីនសង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត។
1.2  ពិនិត្យការចាក់ដុំតេស្ត​ (Mold Test Concrete) ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
1.3  ពិនិត្យការធ្វើស្លាំរបស់ក្រុមការងារ នៅការដ្ឋានត្រឹមត្រូវ តាមបច្ចេកទេស។
1.4  ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន ការថែទាំដុំតេស្ត និងការសង្កត់បានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
1.5  ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន ទៅលើវត្ថុធាតុដើមអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។  

2.   ការកត់ត្រា ការរៀបចំ និងការធ្វើរបាយការណ៏   
2.1  តាមដាននិងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្លាំ នៅតាមការដ្ឋានអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងជាប្រចាំ
2.2  រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា

3.   ការងារផ្សេងៗ
3.1  ផ្តល់ដំណឹងរាល់បញ្ហាកើតមាន មកប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័ និងក្នុងGroup ដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងដំណោះស្រាយ។
3.2  មានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយ បញ្ហានានាបានលឿន និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។
3.3  រាយការណ៍មកប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័បន្ទាន់ករណីមិនអាចដោះស្រាយបាន។
Job Requirement:
- បានបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកវិស្វកម្មសំណង់ ឫជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពបេតុង
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនសង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត និង ការថែទាំបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន
- មានភាពបត់បែននិងធ្វើការនៅខេត្តបាន

It combines the rich management experiences and management model of the international market with the local national culture and develop a management service model that meets local needs. The successful model of the country has crossed the international map of the ASEAN. To promote the spirit of service with a high degree of trust in Japan. Base in Japan’s advanced business philosophy, management model and high-quality services, it still maintains its leading position in the industry. Take care of every customer and every owner with professional spirit, innovative thinking, and excellent services. Our vision is to become the recognized, respected and successful property management organization in Cambodia.

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information Keoleakhena Puch  067 974 974 keoleakhena.puch@chipmong.com Phnom Penh #137, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 067 974 974

Job Description:
•            Must possess a true passion for technology and strategize to engage consumers toward Chip Mong Group’s overall goals.

•            Strategize the alignment of Chip Mong business units’ and Chip Mong Digital’s goals and objectives.

•            Assist in the adoption of new technology like low-code platform, RPA and more to achieve strategic goals.

•            Conduct market research and analyze market and industry trends in Digital and Information Technology.

•            Research competition to identify threats and opportunities.

•            Plan the tracking of effectiveness of strategy execution with metrics.

•            Document plans and roadmaps articulating the strategic plan for Chip Mong Digital
Job Requirement:

•            Minimum of 5 years IT experience

•            Must be very well versed in general IT concepts and specifically Digital trends and opportunities internationally.

•            Must be able to analyze various information sets and use this information to create viable strategic plans for an organization.

•            Must be willing to learn new technology and have a continuous learning mindset.

•            Strong collaborator and communicator.

•            Should be highly flexible and adaptable.

•            Analytical mind with problem-solving aptitude.

•            Preferably with technology consulting experience in a full cycle of implementation for a business unit.

Job Description:
- Assists in the development of the audit plan for the audit engagement including scope and objectives of the individual audits
- Conduct audits in performance of IT audits and reviews of system, application, and IT processes.
- Performs various other reviews of IT management policies and procedures such as change management, business continuity, disaster recovery and information security to ensure that controls are adequate.
- Collect audit evidence, supporting documents, any other information as pats of audit works and report
- Evaluate control environment in reflection of immerging trends in the information technology space, including cloud computing, and social media and provides value added feedback, including test compliance with those controls.
- Prepare audit documentations and provide updates on work status, document report and findings.
- Communicate effectively with all levels of management to ensure full understanding of objectives, risks, controls, and observations.
- Follows up on audit findings to ensure that management has taken corrective action(s).
- Provide subject matter expertise on audits or advisory reviews related to the IT function.
- Work closely with Internal Audit, Business Process Improvement, and IT Team
- Carry out other duties and special assignments as assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor or master’s degree in Computer Science, Business related field.
- Recognized auditing/information system certifications (e.g., CISA, CRISC) is preferable but not required 
- Minimum 2 years of experience in IT audit or IT role.
- Comprehensive understanding of multiple technology domains including software, hardware, database management, operating system, networking, and cyber security
- Understanding of information security standards, best practices for securing computer systems, and applicable laws, regulations include IT audit methodologies
- Expert knowledge of internal auditing, internal controls, risk management, and finance and accounting practices and methods.
- Good interpersonal and communications skills; ability to communicate effectively with technical and non-technical audiences
- Ability to produce high quality work products for both the IT groups and Senior Management
- Proactive, hands-on, results-driven orientation required
- Strong interpersonal capabilities and ability to work cross-functionally
- Ability to work under pressure

job title: IT - HEAD OF STRATEGY & BUSINESS PARTNERING
position: IT - HEAD OF STRATEGY & BUSINESS PARTNERING
Job Description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Digital Business Partner to Commercial Stakeholders – work closely with commercial stakeholders (RGM & Analytics, RTM, Win@POS, Modern Trade & General Trade) to align with digital strategy & Roadmap for the implementation. This role will need to be well connected to local business, identify opportunities and be spokesperson for local business opportunities in BIG level forums. 

• Integrated IT Strategy: This role will also liaise between BIG HQ IT (Commercial Solutions, Infrastructure, Cybersecurity, Application Services Delivery) and market IT (CIO, Application Service Delivery Leads, Cybersecurity and Infrastructure) to ensure deployed solutions adhere to security standards, follow standard infrastructure standards and adhere to overall BIG commercial IT strategy.

• Deploy Digital Solutions – Deploy digital solutions to enable transformation of commercial execution in market.
      o	RTM & Commercial Capabilities: Sales Force Automation – for Pre-Seller, Supervisor and Modern Trade Sales Reps; DMS – Rollout of Distributor Management system to ensure full coverage of secondary sales operations; Route Optimization – deploy and leverage BIG route optimization tool to digitise processes to create optimal routes for Sales force; Chatbots – leverage chatbots for digitizing field processes and communications.
      o	Winning @ Point of Sale: Deploy solutions to digitize in store digital solutions – Image Recognition tool for digital store audit; Connected Coolers and Cooler Maintenance platform.
      o	RGM & Analytics: Enable RGM and other Commercial Analytics covering SFE, Market Share & Audit, CDE, Sales, CTS etc. via enabling BIG Data Lake program to support business operations in market.
      o	Digital Commerce – Deploy B2B and other digital commerce solutions in line with BIG Digital Commerce strategy
     o	Paperless Operations – Identify opportunities to reduce use of paper and digitize operational processes leveraging workflow engines, document management solutions, etc

• Communications: Set vision and strategy for the leveraged use of technology in the above areas of technology expertise and drive the executive communication to present and influence partners in line with the defined vision. 

• Program Management: Should be able to create the roadmap and execute as a well-orchestrated and integrated digital program in market ensuring on time, on scope, on quality and on cost delivery. Establish and report KPIs to track solution health, adoption and CSAT. Drive continuous improvement.

• Business Relationship – management with Commercial stakeholders in market. Digital strategy and roadmap cascade and alignment with the Commercial business stakeholders.

• Integrated IT Strategy and Deploy Digital Solutions- Deploy digital commercial solutions in line with BIG IT and BIG Commercial strategy

• Communications & Program Management – Ensure tight program/ project management and keeping all stakeholders informed.
Job Requirement:
• Master or bachelor’s degree (Business Administration, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related computer engineering).
• 8+ years of experience in sales and distribution technology related role (e.g. SFA, DMS, CRM, SAP). 
• Minimum of 2 years of experience managing business stakeholders or customers. 
• Experience in Digital technologies (Mobile, Web), Enterprise Solution Needs and Innovative Solutions.
• Knowledge of Commercial Operations, Business Analytics, CRM and Innovative Solutions. 
• Good understanding of different solutions and platforms available in industry.
• Strong presentation and communication skills 
• Willingness to travel 
• Ability to work with multi-cultural setting
• Ability to understand the business requirements and converting them into solution requirements 
• Ability to collaborate effectively across teams and bottler network
• experience in managing expectations when balancing alternatives against business and financial constraints.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:

Company Profile:
SMID is the interior design collective of Swan & Maclaren.

Sculpted based on the principles of diversity and the ability to capture the relevancy between design philosophy and function. SMID embodies the elements of style and understated elegance. A guiding principle of the firm is to design from both a comfort perspective and a philosophical perspective, where neither is sacrificed to make way for the other. 

Globalization and interconnection have resulted in an increased demand for coordinated and complex design solutions for interior design and fit-out projects. Our goal at SMID and with our associated specialists is to provide comprehensive planning, design, project management, and build services for interiors to our clients in the hospitality, residential, commercial, and healthcare sectors.

About Swan & Maclaren 131-year Singaporean architectural legacy brand of excellence — the firm currently leads as designer, integrator, and solution provider for carbon zero built environments.

Job Description:
•	Instruct the set curriculum and prepare in advance all materials and lessons
•	Create a classroom environment that is conducive to learning by utilizing a variety of appropriate teaching strategies.
•	Prepare a monthly overview document outlining what will be covered in the class (scope and sequence)
•	Complete student report cards in each term/semester for each student
•	Create newsletters and/or other communication materials for the class
•	Maintain facilities, resources, and materials in his/her classroom and the school
•	Provide care and ensure the safety and well-being of every child in the school, ensuring adequate supervision of a safe recreation and play period for the students during class recess or break times.
•	Organize Parent-Teacher conferences at the end of each term/semester
•	Attend all school functions, public seminars and other professional development activities
•	Perform other reasonable tasks requested by the school management
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree in Education or relevant field with a valid teaching license
•	Experienced in teaching the Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) Program.
•	English as a first language or proof of excellent professional English proficiency
•	Passion for teaching and working with children and young people
•	Demonstrated professional and personal integrity
•	Clean criminal record/background check from home country
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

Job Description:
