Job Description:
•	Manage the school’s Primary and Secondary libraries and literacy improvement programmes at all campuses. 
•	Prepare, present and monitor the yearly library budget.
•	Ensure continuous improvement of all library services and maintain a conducive environment for all library users in the libraries at all times.
•	Provide frequent library usage orientation to all students and staff members, in particular in terms of library sections, research tools, digital library platforms and Lexile levels.
•	Develop digital library options and promote the usage of those throughout the community
•	Plan and deliver library classes, e.g. research workshops, literacy circles and reading sessions
•	Assist in the selection and lead the implementation of a school-wide library management system
•	Provide training in the usage of the library management system
•	Serve as the contact person for any matter related to the library management system and work closely with the provider.
•	Ensure continuous improvement of the libraries by adding books, subscriptions, research tools, etc. using the analysis of student MAP test and library usage data.
•	Coordinate the book purchase process and ensure that students and teachers are systematically requested to provide their book requests.
•	Propose changes to the facilities and design of the libraries and the libraries of future campuses as the school community expands.
•	Provide the community engagement team with materials than can be used to promote literacy and the library via social and other media
•	Liaise with national and international book sellers, public and private national and international libraries, literacy NGOs and other institutions that the school can partner with to improve and promote literacy among the school community.
•	Develop and implement specific literacy and library campaigns targeted to the literary improvement needs of the students
•	Engage in community events to promote love for reading
•	Collect, analyze and present all relevant data related to the activities of the usage of the libraries.
•	Engage in the continuous improvement cycle of the WASC accreditation processes and take ownership of the library related activities as stated in the school-wide action plan
•	Support the National Programme leadership in supporting literacy initiatives for Khmer language.
Job Requirement:
•	Cambodian only
•	Bachelor Degree in Education, Library Studies, Communication, Language Art or relevant fields. 
•	High level of English proficiency  
•	Experience or trained in data management and/or library management systems
•	Compassionate, organized, flexible and a team player
•	Excellent record of professional and personal integrity
•	Experience/certified to teach English is a plus
•	Experience working in an international school setting is a plus
•	Ability to work under different priority lines and in multicultural and diverse working environments

Job Description:
1. To control material quantity is paralleled with purchase requisition (PR) & BoM
2. Prepare report on potential materials to ensure the actual requirement of material is prepared
3. Implement Warehouse Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) is efficiency
4. Monitor slow moving items are highly control efficiency
5. Adhere all materials are allocated based on items category and proper spaces
6. Prepare re-order level to fulfill the quantity of goods as required
7. Aware of non-usage items ensuring that those are used
8. Monitor or do spot check over physical material
9. Provide feedback and coaching purposes regarding operator error to warehouse team
10. Oversee all inventory transactions are performed and updated properly in the system
11. Control inventory report on time

Job Description:
** This role is to:
- Assist the Sales Department by calling the Customers on the Sales Orders, Billings and Returns.
- Support and to ensure daily sales orders and billings are operating in an Effective and Efficient manners.

** Main Duties 
- Contact potential or existing customers to inform them about the products and promotions using scripts.
- Listen to the customers' needs to generate repeat sales
- Ask questions to understand customer requirements and close sales
- Direct prospects to the field sales team when needed
- Gather and document customer information, payment methods, purchases, and reactions to products
- Take and process orders in an accurate manner
- Handle grievances to preserve the company’s reputation
- Go the “extra mile” to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales
- Keep records of calls and sales and note useful information
Job Requirement: - Preferably a minimum of 2 years in a FMCG environment with at least 1-year experience in Tele sales field- Proven experience as telesales representative or other sales/customer service role- Proven track record of successfully meeting sales quota preferably over the phone- Good knowledge of relevant computer programs and telephone systems- Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects- Excellent knowledge of Khmer and English- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills- Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection and ability to engage customers in conversation.- Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints- Action-oriented, persistent and result oriented.
Company Profile: Hanuman Beverages is the Cambodian beverage master who commits to creating best-in-class beverages that innovate new tastes for the Cambodian people. With an investment of over 160 million US dollars, creating direct and indirect employments for over 1,000 people whilst supporting thousands more external stakeholders, Hanuman Beverages is committed to contributing to the economic growth of Cambodia. With our passion, we will be sure to make a positive mark on the beverage industry in Cambodia.

Job Description:
•	Generally manage and supervise the whole construction department (Including site and design team)
•	Prepare all projects planning including project schedule, material plan, cash-out plan, and others
•	Work on the calculation of project cost, products cost, project annual budget, and related business planning
•	Monitor all contractors to deliver the projects with good quality and within agreed timeline
•	Coordinate with other senior managements and provide input into project development plan, master plan, and products to meet market trends and customers’ preferences
•	Manage the projects to complete on time and handover to customers with satisfaction
•	Monitor and track construction cost to ensure it is within approved budget
•	Ensure work quality of construction is achieved
•	Work along line with other managements to do strategic plan and execute to achieve company’s goals
•	Lead design team and QS team to conduct value engineering on designs and drawings to reduce construction cost
•	Conduct training and workshops for staffs including technical works and products
•	Prepare and submit monthly report to management team
•	Other tasks to be assigned by Managing Director
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor or master degree in Civil Engineering or related fields.
•	Minimum 5 year experience in Construction or Project Management.
•	Good command of reading, writing and speaking English is a plus.
•	Proficiency in Computer Skills (MS Office, Microsoft Project, Auto CAD and other engineering software).
•	Ability to communicate and negotiate with team and sub-contractors.
•	Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.
Working Days and Hours
•	Monday to Friday (8am to 5:30pm) / Saturday (8am to 12pm)
•	Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:30pm

Job Description:
- Supervising, managing, and leading to operate procurement process as professional input method.
- Developing and initiating procurement policy, procedures, guidelines, rules and regulations in order to implementing professional procurement efficiency and transparent practices.
- Designing strategies to response the company strategy plan and budgeting.
- Regularly check various vendors/suppliers to obtain quotations of goods for best values.
- Frequently dealing with suppliers to do price negotiation and discount.
- Review supplier evaluation form and issue purchase order.
- Regularly seeking for new appropriate suppliers and update to suppliers list.
- Networking with wholesale and reputed suppliers to company.
- Strong communication skills and daily working closely with procurement team, finance team, and requesters.
- Must be high responsible for deadline requisition bases.
- Review all expense report for subordinates.
- Ability to persuade vendor for creditable and cheque payment.
- Other tasks will be assigned by Line Manager"
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: Adventure Operations Coordinator based in Siem Reap.
position: Adventure Operations Coordinator based in Siem Reap.
Job Description:
The Adventure Operations Coordinator is responsible for all adventure operations tasks including guide liaison, adventure
itinerary, storage and stock control.

** Responsibilities:
- Work as directed by Adventure Department Manager
- Train new guides in accordance with company procedures
- Ensure all guides are well trained in bike maintenance and are all first aid qualified
- Follow up of confirmed Adventure activities including trekking and biking groups
- Coordinate inspection trips and reports
- Assist with new itinerary development
- Assist with any complaints as required
- Coordinate the storage, maintenance and allocation of bikes to cycling trips
- Ensure the storage area is clean and secure at all times
- Carry out stock takes of all assets on a regular basis
- Report monthly/trip on spares usage
- Other duties allocated to this role
Job Requirement:
** Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Tourism or related field
- At least 3 years’ experience in tourism industry is required, Adventure Travel background would be highly appreciated
- Excellent knowledge of tourism in destination
- Preferably good network connections within other travel services suppliers in destination (Hotels, restaurants, Airlines, etc.)
- Attention to details, responsibility and self-motivation

** Skills:
- Excellent communication skills in English (both written and spoken)
- High level of personal presentation
- Team spirit, good organizational skills and ability to work under pressure
- Good computer literacy (word, excel, outlook)

** Interested applicant, please send a CV and detailed cover letter with the expected salary by email to: imhork@exotravel.com

** Only shortlisted applicants will be notified for an interview.  Thank you.

Company Profile:
Established since 2006 Bodia has started its activities by opening sheltering cocoon Spas in Siem Reap and Phnom Penh offering an authentic vision of relaxation in a modern designed Spa (www.bodia-spa.com). In order to guaranty the quality of its treatment, Bodia has created its own line of natural products made in Cambodia under the brand Bodia Cambodian Apothecary that promotes the traditional know-hows and uses local resources (www.bodia.com).
Nowadays, Bodia is a network of 7 Spas in Cambodia (4 locations in Phnom Penh & 3 locations in Siem Reap) dispensing quality treatments and offering therapist training to other spas, hotels and extending its services to franchise opening. Bodia products are made in our factory located in Phnom Penh and distributed in all official Bodia Spas and Stores, through a network of 50 local distributors and 1 online shop.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Leakhena   012 452 004 admin.pp@bodia.com Phnom Penh #26, corner Sothearos Blvd and Street 178, above U-Care Pharmacy, Phnom Penh. 012 452 004

- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.

Job Description:
POSITION: 		LEGAL COUNSEL (2 POSITIONS)
REPORT TO: 		COUNTRY LEGAL DIRECTOR
DEPARTMENT: 		LEGAL
LOCATION: 		PHNOM PENH

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
A. Legal Risk Consultation and Management 
•	Providing legal support and advice accurately and timely to management & stakeholders on relevant legal issues 
•	Applying effective risk management techniques and offer proactive advice on possible legal issues
•	Promoting legal, compliance and risk management best practice throughout the company.
•	Cooperating with relevant departments to ensure that where legal risks have been identified, appropriate course of action have been taken.

B. Legal update and Regulatory Compliance
•	Ensuring compliance with all laws/regulations, internal controls and other formalities that apply to the business.
•	Formulating and Developing compliance checklists to ensure the legally and timely processing operation.
•	Communicating and working with external parties (regulators, external counsel, public authority etc.) to drive the effective result and to create relations of trust.

C. Contracts Management & Development
•	Drafting, reviewing, revising all agreements/contracts, internal policies and other legal documents to ensure the company’s full legal rights and compliance
•	Formulating, initiating and developing the guidelines, processes and templates to ensure the effective control over the contract’s life circle and speedy contracts processing. 

D. Company Policies management, training, and development
•	Reviewing or modifying company policies/guidelines to comply with group policies and local laws/regulations. 
•	Designing and delivering legal training and advice to all associates as needed. 
•	Taking action and Collaborating with relevant department to ensure the implementation of consistent disciplinary action strategies in cases of compliance standard violations. 

D. Litigation and investigation management
•	Reviewing the progress of outstanding and new litigations and liaise with and manage external lawyers.
•	Investigating and working with relevant department to collect the facts and recommend the solution to Management.

E. other tasks
•	Other tasks which are requested by management.
Job Requirement:
• Holding Law Bachelor’s Degree or master’s degree (More preferable) 
• Having legal professional experience at least 2 years in law firm or company (FMCG industry is more advantage)
• Ability to create legal defensive or proactive strategies
• Ability to analyses situations/information and solve problems
• Good organizational, prioritization and time-management skills
• Flexibility, innovative and productivity management.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
** This role is to:
- Assist the Sales Department by calling the Customers on the Sales Orders, Billings and Returns.
- Support and to ensure daily sales orders and billings are operating in an Effective and Efficient manners.

** Main Duties 
- Contact potential or existing customers to inform them about the products and promotions using scripts.
- Listen to the customers' needs to generate repeat sales
- Ask questions to understand customer requirements and close sales
- Direct prospects to the field sales team when needed
- Gather and document customer information, payment methods, purchases, and reactions to products
- Take and process orders in an accurate manner
- Handle grievances to preserve the company’s reputation
- Go the “extra mile” to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales
- Keep records of calls and sales and note useful information
Job Requirement: - Preferably a minimum of 2 years in a FMCG environment with at least 1-year experience in Tele sales field- Proven experience as telesales representative or other sales/customer service role- Proven track record of successfully meeting sales quota preferably over the phone- Good knowledge of relevant computer programs and telephone systems- Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects- Excellent knowledge of Khmer and English- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills- Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection and ability to engage customers in conversation.- Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints- Action-oriented, persistent and result oriented.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

- Direct Supervisor: Procurement Manager

Job Responsibilities

- Assist to Procurement Manager in reporting, daily task, developing processes to standardize and maximize our process efficiency and control of our internal operations.
- Support Procurement Manager in developing criteria and checklists to meet Company's requirements and policies in terms of product specification, quality, service and reliability standards help the purchasing team/procurement team evaluate suppliers' proposals as well as measure the suppliers' performance.
- Implement procurement and supply chain policies/procedures and plans. Coordinate the supplier tender process, purchasing activities and reporting
- Support Procurement Manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources
- Implement procurement policies/procedures and plans to ensure cost savings/greater economies of scale. Drive compliant behaviors within and outside the organization
- Work closely with team members and provide guidance, training and support direct reporting staff to optimize their contributions.
- Monitor and review inventory forecast to insure adequate inventory is available to meet consumption demand base on sale and market trend while
- minimizing excess and obsolete inventories. Check and review with procurement team on Master order file base on daily, weekly consumption, and marketing plan to process ordering.
- Identify cost savings to meet goals; develop cost modelling and automate costing process. Analyze and evaluate the product pricing trends on the existing as well as new products to identify opportunities to purchase. Quotation management (cost down and cost up analysis, new quotation cost analysis).
- Reviewing existing contracts with suppliers and vendors to ensure on-going feasibility. Performing risk assessments on potential contracts and agreements, Supplier monitor and evaluation review.
- Evaluate and coordinate all inputs to master in purchase planning for both local and oversea purchase: lead time, safety stock, demand forecasts,
consumption, risk of item to expire vs cost and maintaining the minimize of products re-orders.
- Review historic sales trends and growth rates, summarize data, and look over forecast results. Stay current and up to date on any changes that may
affect the supply and demand of needed products and materials and advise others of any impact.
- Check and verify all Daily, Weekly, and Monthly report of all Purchasing, payment, shipment track, Suppliers Performance Track, and other report as required by manager.
- Coordinate and check with team to control all purchase order to be sure all equipment’s/items are delivered to Warehouse/Store with right QTY, UOM, good quality and condition.
- Coordinate with Operation team, Project team, IT team, Logistic team, and Account team to be sure all process: PO, Receiving the items,
and payment are smoothly completed and verify.
- Take & solve all inventory's issue/concern, and report to procurement manager for further take action
- Lead and monitor warehouse team on Inventory control at warehouse by checking temperature of each items, right location of putting all items and CBM calculation, accurate dimension, minimize the expired inventory, transportation cost and storage charge.
- Check and verify all Invoice and related document to Accounting team for payment process.
- To determine the ways to optimize service levels, maintain procurement efficiency, and minimize cost.
- Adhoc tasks that is assigned by managers.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree or comparable experience.
- Preferred: Experiences with food industry related to Purchasing, Logistics, Inventory Controlling and Supply Chain management in supervisor level or equivalent at least 2-3 years.
- Commercially, financially, and ERP System aware
- Highly skilled at building and maintaining effective and productive relationships with key stakeholders and supplier

-Travel Requirement: Yes

- Go to meet supplier's shop/factory
- Go to check item (price and spec) at available market place
- Go to check on receiving items at warehouse or store

Due to a large number of applicants, we will only be able to follow up with candidates who are shortlisted for an interview, and this will happen within 10 working days from the date of your application.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
The key responsibilities of Housekeeping Supervisor include but are not limited to:
• Assigning housekeeping tasks to staff and inspecting work to ensure that the prescribed standards of cleanliness are met.
• Scheduling staff shifts and organizing replacements as required.
• Investigating and addressing complaints regarding poor housekeeping service.
• Providing training to the housekeeping staff.
• Regularly taking inventory of cleaning supplies and ordering stock as needed.
• Issuing cleaning supplies and equipment to housekeeping staff as needed.
• Screening housekeeping applicants and recommending promotions, transfers, and dismissals.
• Performing various cleaning duties in instances of staff shortages.
Job Requirement:
• Minimums two years’ housekeeping Supervisor experience in hotel or service apartments.
• Good sense of personal appearance and hygiene.
• English or Mandarin speaking is an asset.

SECONDARY RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Assist in fire drills, pest control and handyman maintenance when require. 

How to Apply
For interested candidates, please forward your detailed CV, including a recent photo with a cover letter describing your suitability for the role and salary expectation to HR Department.

Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge
o Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Employee Handling
o To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
o take action in their individual development and welfare 
o To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs
o To be able to train them up to the standards required.
o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company 
o To assist in the training of the employees ensuring that they have the necessary skills to perform their duties with efficiency.
o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures. 
o To carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least three years of progressive accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
o Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor, or Finance Manager
o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description:
1.	Daily Financial Operation Supporting:
o	Daily posting invoice in system
o	Daily cut stock from NAV
o	Maintain all unit payment from customer
o	Support document has been filling for Audit
o	To update customer and AR information
o	Filling document for purpose audit
o	Support AR daily operation of the accounting function smoothly


2.	Support Financial Monthly Report:
o	Accuracy data entry and timely basic

3.	Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o	Support Agency for Stock and Customer status
o	Support Property Mtg team for Property handover
o	Support Legal team for title handover
o	Support Customer Service team for Unit change
o	Support AP team for Commission
o	Support Treasury team for Bank Reconcile
o	Support Credit Collection Team for late customers

4.	NAV System knowledge
o	Accounting system knowledge

5.	Soft skill
o	Honest and responsive
o	Team player
o	Fast learner and willing to learn
o	Well communicate with external and internal
o	Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
o	University Degree (BA in Accounting and finance or other related field is preferred). 

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
•	Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
•	Proven supervisory experience
•	Proven working internal and external customer
•	Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).


3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o	Good at documentation skills,
o	Good at time management skills,
o	Good in English Language.
o	English language proficiency.
o	NAV System is priority.

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

o	Good in communication and interpersonal skills,
o	Strong in problem solving and negotiation skills,
o	Strong working commitment, follow up skills,
o	Honesty, friendly and flexible personal manner,
o	Good at stress management and multi working ability.

Job Description: Key Responsibilities:(Compliance and Risk)•	Ensuring all the essential guidelines are put in proper place accurately adhering to industry rules and regulations.•	Supports to Top Management on risk and compliance of actions in specific projects.•	Assess product, compliance, or operational risks and develop risk management strategies•	Takes overall responsibility for the advice, management, and development of HB's risk and compliance policies and procedures.•	Keeps up to date with any regulatory or statutory changes and policies that might affect the company and ensuring that policies are approved•	Contribute to meeting discussions, and when required advise members of the Senior Management team of the implications of proposed policies•	Implement processes or job description:

Company Profile:
ZKTeco Co., Ltd is a globally renowned enterprise with biometric verifications as its core techniques, which dedicates itself in the three industries including Biometric
Verification Core Technique Empowerment, Smart Entrance & Exit “Person + Car + Object” Software Platform Empowerment, and ZKTeco+ Smart Office Cloud Platform Empowerment, and providing total services to the users of global public services, enterprise-level users and personal users.

ZKTeco has approximately 3,600 employees globally, among them there are over 1,000 R&D staffs and 450 foreign staffs. The enterprise owns 14 subsidiaries and 29 branches in China, and 38 subsidiaries in Hong Kong, Macau, Taiwan and overseas (As of June 2020).

ZKTeco Cambodia Office belongs to ZKTeco Asian Business Group ,which is on behalf of the headquarters to guide local distributor to carry out various businesses, and provide local technical and market support.Since the office was stationed in Phnom Penh in 2019, the sales growth rate and local market retention rate have increased year by year. national time attendance system design of Canadia Bank, etc.

Job Description:
About The Job: 
Lead marketing team to develop and implement marketing plans for Chip Mong Retail, contribute to the division’s growth and profitability through delivery of effective marketing initiatives and activities that drive sales turnover. 

What You Will Do: 
•	Prepare annual marketing plan, lead and manage the marketing team on daily operations to ensure marketing objectives are achieved.
•	Manage relationships with media and the public when conflict occurs and/or when commercial expectations are not met. 
•	Resolve misunderstandings and demonstrate willingness to achieve “win-win” solutions – with tenants and customers.
•	Develop promotional materials like brochures, press releases, emails, newsletters and other media outreach programs and communicate them to involved stakeholders.
•	Conduct market research to identify key issues, assess the effectiveness of marketing initiatives/ programs and diversify market strategy to various actions.
•	Provide regular update on the status of activities to the Director of Shopping Mall - public feedback, complaints, suggestions, etc.
•	Provide direction to ensure communication strategy and delivery actions are consistent with the overall direction of CMRT.
•	Establish work parameters (plans, budgets, targets and resource allocations) for the team and manage their skill set to ensure that the objectives are met.
•	Develop team by providing training, counseling, evaluating performance, and promoting teamwork.
•	Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have: 
•	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration or other related fields
•	At least 5 years proven work experience in the areas of strategic communication, Advertising, Marketing, Operations or related areas.
•	At least 3 years of retail experience as a Marketing Manager
•	Experienced and proficient in verbal and written communication and preparing reports. 
•	Understanding of consumer marketing, accounts, and contract laws
•	Knowledge of retail marketing in a shopping mall environment
•	Knowledge of advertising campaigns, press releases and the development of other strategic communications
•	Excellent communications skills, working effectively with media and the public
•	Competent in formal Report Writing and Presentation Skills
•	Demonstrated supervisory and mentoring skills 
•	A team player with the ability to work independently
•	Be self-motivated and performance focused 
•	Good people Skills
•	Proven ability to influence people (internally and externally)
•	Ability to work under pressure.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information Enny MUN HR Manager 090873111 enny.mun@chipmong.com #137, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 090873111

Job Description:
- Collaborates with the board to define company’s strategic direction and formulate company business plans and strategies.
- Oversees development and implementation of annual business plan and budget that support the strategic direction set by the Board; submits annual plans and budget to the Board for approval.
- Provides prompt, accurate and thorough information and presents quarterly and annual reports to the Board of\ Directors to keep them informed of the company’s performance.
- Develop micro-insurance products by conducting actuary study to determine premium charged to clients and benefits covered.
- Exercises overall supervision over the underwriting insurance policies and ensures that all underwriting transactions are in accordance with the policies of the Company, sound insurance practices and in accordance with the Government Insurance Regulations.
- Monitors, controls, and evaluates the collections and remittance of premiums and other fees and the maintenance of accurate records of all underwriting transactions in the prescribed forms.
- Ensure proper setting up of MIS and accounting system for the company.
- Ensure that organization structure and manpower are adequate to operate the business.
- Ensure a strong set up of internal control and other support system for the company.
- Develop and revise adequate systems, controls, and strategies for effective operation management including Operations policies, procedures, guideline and forms and other reporting and monitoring tools that are required for operation management purposes.
- Monitor and evaluate the implementation of all aspects of the company including the administration of budget, human resources, and financial operation of the company towards financial viability.
- Ensure adequate monitoring of the levels of risk related to micro-insurance and ensure effectiveness and efficiency of operational risk management.
- Ensure accurate recording of financial transactions, operation of management information system.
- Manages compliance with legal and regulatory requirements and directs the preparation of reports required by the law, regulators, and related parties.
- Provide leadership, direction and develop talent for the company.
- Ensure effective collaboration with key business partners for the best deployment of sales and distribution strategies.
- Serves as the Company Representative in professional, business, and community organizations to promote micro-insurance products and services, goodwill, and new business.
- Performs any other duties as required by the board of directors.
Job Requirement:
- BA/MBA in Accounting, Banking/Finance, Business Management, or related disciplines.
- At least five-year experiences holding management position in insurance industry.
- Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills.
- Proven track record of motivating and developing capable management teams.
- Good working knowledge of computer software.
- Strong written and oral communication skills in both English and Khmer.
- Excellent financial, analytical, organizational, and problem-solving skills; and
- People but result oriented.
Company Profile: Serendib Microinsurance Plc., one of the subsidiary company of LOLC Holdings Plc, received license from the Ministry of Economic and Finance in December 2020.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   096 9881 881 / 081 600 616 job@serendib.com.kh #101A, St. 289, Phum 1, Boeng Kak Ti Muoy, Tuol Kork, Phnom Penh  096 9881 881 / 081 600 616

Job Description:
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងដឹកនាំអភិវឌ្ឍន៍កែសម្រួលគោលនយោបាយ និងបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដូចជា នីតិវិធី ប្រើប្រាស់ ទម្រង់ឯកសារគោលនយោបាយធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាល។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងដឹកនាំរៀបចំផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តគ្រប់គ្រងធនធានមនុស្ស និងរដ្ឋបាល ដើម្បីគាំទ្រដល់បេសក កម្មរបស់ ក្រុមហ៊ុនអោយសម្រេចគោលដៅអាជីវកម្មប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់។
- គ្រប់គ្រងគោលនយោបាយ ដំណើរការ និងយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តក្នុងការជ្រើសរើសធនធានមនុស្ស បណ្តុះបណ្តាល ថែទាំ លើក ទឹកចិត្ត អប់រំក្រមសីលធម៌ វិជ្ជាជីវៈការងារ ដើម្បីឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងតម្រូវការធនធានមនុស្ស របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យលើការវាយតម្លៃសាកល្បងការងារ ការបញ្ចប់កិច្ចសន្យាការងារ វាយតម្លៃប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងការប្រែ ប្រួលលក្ខខ័ណ្ឌ ប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍របស់បុគ្គលិក កម្មករ និយោជិត។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងដឹកនាំអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ផែនការយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រទូទាត់សំណង និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍បុគ្គលិកអោយបានទូលំ ទូលាយ ប្រកបដោយការប្រកួតប្រជែង និងមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពចំពោះការចំណាយសម្រាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- គ្រប់គ្រង និងត្រួតពិនិត្យទៅលើលក្ខន្តិកការងារផ្លាស់ប្ដូរតួនាទី ទីតាំង ការតម្លើងតួនាទី និងទំលាក់តួនាទី របស់បុគ្គលិក កម្មករនិយោជិត។
- គ្រប់គ្រង ចាត់ចែង សម្ភារៈបរិក្ខា និងឧបករណ៍ដែលបម្រើអោយការងាររដ្ឋបាល បុគ្គលិក កម្មករ សន្តិសុខ អនាម័យ និងសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- ដឹកនាំធ្វើបទបង្ហាញអំពីគោលការណ៍បទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងផ្សេងៗ និងសុវត្ថិភាពការងារ របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដល់គ្រប់ និយោជិត កម្មករទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីអនុវត្តន៍។
- ទំនាក់ទំនង និងសម្របសម្រួលការងារជាមួយក្រសួងស្ថាប័ននានា ដើម្បីសម្រួលដល់កិច្ច ប្រតិបត្តិការរបស់ ក្រុមហ៊ុនមាន ជាអាទិ៍: មន្ទីរការងារ ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះ បណ្តាល វិជ្ជាជីវ: ជាដើម។
- អនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងទៀត ដែលចាត់ចែងដោយថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
- ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬ អនុបណ្ឌិតផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងរដ្ឋបាល គ្រប់គ្រង គ្រប់គ្រងធនធានមនុស្ស ឬជំនាញដែលទាក់ទង
- មានបទពិសោធន៏ទាក់ទងការងារគ្រប់គ្រងធនធានមនុស្ស និង រដ្ឋបាលយ៉ាងតិច ​៥ ឆ្នាំឡើងក្នុងវិស័យអចលទ្រព្យ
- មានភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ និង វៃឆ្លាតក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ
- មានចំនេះដឹងលើការប្រើប្រាស់កំព្យូទ័រ(MS. Word)

Job Description: •	To administer Company's policy and ensure a high level of customer satisfaction and profitability;•	To step in to answer customer questions and issues when required; •	To lead, direct and motivate the sales team in order to achieve the overall sales objectives and target either indoor or outdoor team;•	To new member orientation either vehicle specification or working environment explanation;•	To maximize departmental profitability through the sales of vehicles, finance schemes and associated products;•	To forecast sales for upcoming months and quarters and compile the necessary reports for management to review; •	To ensure all cars in showroom are good in term of cleaning;•	To prepare daily report (Customer negotiation progress) and send to GM every day;•	To prepare weekly and monthly report with ongoing deal potential customer report and send to GM every week and month;•	To update your customer profile (customer-by-customer) and submit to GM every week;•	To report market situation and competitor’s activities to the manager once a week.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Namheang  010203922 jobs@smart.com.kh Phnom Penh No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh  010203922

Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY:

We are currently looking for a highly skilled Senior Android Developer to join our engineering team. As a Senior Android Developer, you will work within our engineering team to deliver functional & user-friendly Android applications in a timely manner.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

-Design and build applications for the android platform.
-Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
-Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features.
-Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
-Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
-Identify potential problems and resolving application bottlenecks.
-Fix application bugs before the final release.
-Publish application on Play Store.
-Maintain the code and atomization of the application.
-Design and implementing application updates.
-Perform other tasks assigned by the line manager.
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT & SKILLS:

-Minimum bachelor’s degree preferably in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
-At least 3 years of working experience preferred in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
-Experience with JAVA for android, Kotlin, Android SDK, JSON concepts and REST APIs.
-Experience working with product management and UI/UX designers.
-Experience with communication and messaging applications.
-Experience with security software and solutions.
-Ability to work in a dynamic, fast-moving, and growing environment.
-Confidence, pro-active, and ability to work under pressure.

You will contribute your experiences and skills to apply on projects and ensure these are completed on time within budget and scope. You work with various members of teams and the clients to develop a timeline, create schedules, and oversee progress to make sure goals are met on time.- Requirements gathering and conducting feasibility studies.Monitors production and quality to customer/stakeholder/sponsor standards.- Utilize project management system such Redmine and some other standard tools to handle daily tasks and other record of activities, issues, requirements, tickets, and requests.- Performing risk management to minimize project risks.- Responsible for coordinating and attending meetings and developing project strategies.- A lot of problem-solving and multitasking. You are coordinating multiple aspects of a project in a fast-paced and challenging work environment and communicating all the issues and risks of the project.- To ensure that all stakeholder is on the same page and speaking the same language. Because you are responsible for making sure your part of the project stays on target and always be followed up.- Manage and prepare documentation for user requirement, functional/technical specification, UAT script and user training.- Provide leadership in vendor management, including contract negotiation, service improvement, consultation and effective solutions.- Measuring project performance using appropriate systems, tools, and techniques.- Reporting to CEO & management stakeholders on a regular agreed-upon basis.

Job Description:
•	Communicate with the students, parents, teachers and offices and supervise the students to ensure that they check in and check out properly for their classes.  
•	Work with classroom teachers to deliver lessons based on the set curriculum, including lesson planning and preparation, conducting learning and reading group activities, behavioral management, classroom organization and management as well as the use of materials.
•	Assist the assigned teacher in supervising an individual or a group of students during break time, play time, field trips other and recreational activities.    
•	Work with all stakeholders including teachers, parents, learning support team and the school management to assist students with special needs in their individual learning and inclusion programs. 
•	Take turns to carry out supporting duties such as nap time duty, meal time duty and playground duty as requested and scheduled by the management.
•	Attend meetings, training sessions, professional development activities and school events per schedule.  
•	Assist in the organization of the Parent-Teacher Conferences at the end of each term. 
•	Help to effectively maintain and manage the classroom facilities, resources, and materials. 
•	Strictly follow the school’s child protection policy.
Job Requirement:
•	Cambodian national
•	University-level education, continuing or graduated, preferably in the field of education, law, international relation, science, social science and psychology.  
•	Demonstrated communication, teamwork and independent thinking skills.   
•	High-level of English proficiency   
•	Aspired to work in the field of education, particularly with young children.
•	Adaptable to changes and diverse working environments.
•	Willingness to continue learning and develop a professional career in an educational setting. 
•	Proof of reputable personal and professional integrity and records.
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

Job Description:
The Hospital Marketing Senior Executive will promote and market Raffles Hospital in Singapore and all its services to the Cambodian market, using knowledge and experience of the Cambodian healthcare market channels to provide an excellent and seamless service to patients, organizations and Raffles
Medical Group.
The successful applicant will be outgoing with a big personality whilst at the same time providing a confidential and personalized service to Cambodians wishing to engage with first class healthcare provided by Raffles Hospital Singapore.
The right person for the role will be required to assess the needs of the person, organize the appropriate services that are required as well as potentially assisting with a full concierge type service that may include escorting patients to the Hospital and back again.
This is an exciting role. You will have training and support from the existing Hospital Referral Team based in Vietnam as well as support and guidance from staff on the ground in the Phnom Penh Clinic where you will be based.
Job Requirement:
- Languages: Good command of Khmer and English
- Education: Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline
- Year of experience: 3 years
- Skills: Able to communicate well and have good organizational and execution skills.
- Some travel will be required (Vietnam and Singapore)

** We look forward to having you onboard with us.
For further information about the role, please feel free to contact us via telephone number 012 497 761 or email: saly_man@rafflesmedical.com
Company Profile:
Raffles Medical Cambodia was opened in 1992 and is renowned for the delivery of comprehensive international standards of medical services. The staff consists of well qualified doctors and nurses who are familiar with the health dynamics in Cambodia, and are able to provide full support for expatriates, residents and tourists for day to day health management, vaccinations, medical stabilization and treatment in the event of a medical emergency.

Patients will receive the same high level of service and renowned quality of care, with continued access to our panel of international and local doctors. Patients and onshore panel of doctors can also expect to benefit from access to the clinical expertise and support from the Raffles specialists in Singapore.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  023 216 911 / 012 497 761 saly_man@rafflesmedical.com No 161, Street 51 Beoung Raing, Duan Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 023 216 911 / 012 497 761

Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.

job title: ប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋាន សេវាកម្មក្រោយពេលលក់ / After Sales Services Manager (Tractor & Machinery) ប្រាក់ខែពី ៨០០ - ១៥០០ ដុល្លារ។
company_name: Angkor Green Investment and Development Co.,Ltd.
position: ប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋាន សេវាកម្មក្រោយពេលលក់ / After Sales Services Manager (Tractor & Machinery) ប្រាក់ខែពី ៨០០ - ១៥០០ ដុល្លារ។
Job Description:
•	ចាត់ចែងគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេស និងគ្រឿងបន្លាស់អោយបានល្អប្រសើរ។
•	គ្រប់គ្រងរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ជួសជុល ។
•	ធ្វើការយ៉ាងជិតស្និតជាមួយដៃគូ និងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដើម្បីធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សេវាកម្ម របាយណ៍ជួសជុល ថែទាំ ការធានា និងអភិវឌ្ឍចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកផលិតផល ដើម្បីបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់ក្រុមការងារខាងក្នុង។
•	គ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកគ្រឿងបន្លាស់ ព្យាករណ៍ការលក់ កំណត់កំរិតទាប(Buffer stock) រៀបចំការបញ្ជាទិញ និងជំរុញការលក់ ផ្គត់ផ្គង់គ្រឿងបន្លាស់អោយបានទូលំទូលាយជាមួយដៃគូរអាជីវកម្មនិងលើទីផ្សារ។
•	ផ្តល់ការសហការល្អ ដំណោះស្រាយល្អៗតាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេសដល់អតិថិជននិងដៃគូរអាជីវកម្ម            ( ដេប៉ូ អ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ និងដៃគូក្នុងស្រុកផ្សេងៗ) អោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលានិងមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់បំផុត។
•	រៀបចំស្តង់ដារបច្ចេកទេសសម្រាប់ក្រុមការងារបច្ចេកទេស សម្រាប់ដៃគូរអាជីវកម្ម សម្រាប់ការវាយតំលៃ ផ្តល់ជាកំរិតស្តង់ដារតាមលំដាប់ថ្នាក់និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍។
•	គាំទ្រក្រុមការងារផ្នែកលក់ ក្នុងការរៀបចំសកម្មភាពទីផ្សារ រៀបចំគ្រប់គ្រងបែកចែកកំលាំងបច្ចេកទេសចូលរួមសកម្មភាពជាមួយផ្នែកលក់ នូវព្រឹត្តិការណ៍តាំងបង្ហាញ និងសកម្មភាពដូចជា ការដឹកជញ្ជួន ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ការតាំងបង្ហាញ ការធ្វើតេស្តសលើផលិតផល និងការចុះជួបជាមួយអតិថិជនសក្តានុពល
•	រៀបចំរបាយការ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ប្រចាំខែ នឹងប្រចាំឆមាស ជាប្រចាំ។
•	សហការជាមួយរាល់អ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ ដៃគូ និងក្រុមហ៊ុនផលិត ក្នុងការរៀបចំការTraining ពង្រឹងសមត្ថភាពដល់ក្រុមការងារ។
•	បង្កើនប្រសិទ្ធិភាពការងារលើសេវាកម្មបច្ចេកទេសដល់អតិថិជននិងដៃគូរអាជីវកម្មអោយបានរលូន។
•	រៀបចំផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលកសាងសមត្ថភាពអ្នកបន្តវេននិងអ្នកទទួលខុសត្រូវអោយបានល្អ។
Job Requirement:
•	ផែ្នកវិស្វករមេកានិក, គ្រឿងយន្តកសិកម្ម, គ្រប់គ្រង, សហគ្រិនភាព និងជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច៤ឆ្នាំ ផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិកក្នុងការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មជួសជុល និងសេវាកម្មក្រោយពេលលក់ត្រាក់ទ័រ ឬគ្រឿងយន្តកសិកម្ម។
•	មានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការចុះទៅធ្វើការតាមខេត្ត និងអាចចុះតាមខេត្តក្នុងរយៈពេលយូរថ្ងៃបាន។
•	មានសមត្ថភាពខាងបច្ចេកទេសក្នុងការវិភាគ និងរកដំណោះស្រាយរបស់កំហូចគ្រឿងយន្តច្បាស់លាស់
•	បើកចិត្តទូលាយសំរាប់ទទួលយកគំនិតថ្មីៗ អ្វីដែលត្រឹមត្រូវ ប្រសើរឡើងដែលនាំអោយមានការរីកចំរើនដល់ក្រុមការងារ ចេះទទួលយកការផ្លាស់ប្តូរនិងបទបែនតាមកាលៈទេសៈ។
•	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេស បានល្អសំរាប់ទំនាក់ទំនងការងារជាមួយដៃគូរពាណិជ្ជកម្ម(Advance English 
	language level)
•	មានប័ណ្ណបើកបររថយន្ត និងចេះបើកបរស្ទាត់ជំនាញ គោរពច្បាប់ និងដោយទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។
•	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារជាក្រុមល្អ មានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្ត មានគំនិតឆ្នៃប្រឌិត និងសហគ្រិនភាព។ 

បេក្ខជនដែលចាប់អារម្មណ៍អាចផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបតាមរយៈ៖

Company Profile: អង្គរហ្គ្រីន អ៊ិនវេសមេន អេន ឌីវេឡុបមេន លីមីតធីត បានបង្កើតឡើងនៅខែសីហា ឆ្នាំ២០១១។ យើងបាន និងកំពុងពង្រីកសកម្មភាពក្នុងការផ្តល់ដំណោះស្រាយកសិកម្មជាកញ្ចប់ តាមរយៈការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងចុះគាំទ្រកសិករដល់ចំការ រួមទាំងការលក់ចែកចាយជី-ថ្នាំកសិកម្ម, ភ្នាក់ងារជីវៈសាស្ត្រ, ប្រព័ន្ធស្រោចស្រពទំនើប, ចំណីសត្វ, ត្រាក់ទ័រទំនើប និងគ្រឿងយន្តកសិកម្ម, គ្រាប់ពូជ គម្រោងទិញលក់កសិផល និងការនាំចេញកសិផលផងដែរ។ អង្គរហ្គ្រីន បាន និងកំពុងធ្វើការយ៉ាងសកម្មជាមួយកសិកររាប់ពាន់នាក់ក្នុង១ឆ្នាំៗ នៅក្នុងខេត្តចំនួន២៥/២៥ខេត្ត-រាជធានីនៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។

job title: ប្រធានផ្នែកលក់ និងទីផ្សារ / Sales and Marketing Manager (ចំនួន ០២នាក់)
company_name: Angkor Green Investment and Development Co.,Ltd.
position: ប្រធានផ្នែកលក់ និងទីផ្សារ / Sales and Marketing Manager (ចំនួន ០២នាក់)
Job Description:
(សម្រាប់គម្រោង សាច់សុវត្តិភាព Ag Foodsនិងគម្រោងប្រព័ន្ធស្រោចស្រព Gain) សម្រាប់ទីតាំងការងារ នៅភ្នំពេញ និងតាមបណ្តាលខេត្ត, (ប្រាក់ខែ ចចារ)

•	រៀបចំផែនការលក់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និង ដឹកនាំក្រុមលក់អោយបានគ្រប់ផែនការគោលដៅប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
•	មានភាពសកម្មក្នុងការទៅជួបអតិថិជន ជាពិសេសដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារផ្នែកលក់ក្នុងការទៅជួបជាមួយអតិថិជននិងធ្វើការបិទការលក់អោយបានជោគជ័យ។
•	ប្រជុំបែងចែកការងារ និង ត្រួតពិនិត្យសកម្មភាពប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់ក្រុមការងារផ្នែកលក់ ។
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យលើការគ្រប់គ្រងនិងសេវាកម្មដល់អតិថិជនរក្សានៅទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជនដើម្បីទទួលបានមតិកែលម្អ និងលើកទឹកចិត្តឱ្យបន្តការគាំទ្របន្ថែមពីអតិថិជន។
•	ធ្វើការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់ក្រុមការងារផ្នែកលក់
•	ធ្វើសកម្មភាពផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីផលិតផល និងយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រលក់តាមរយះបណ្តាញ សង្គម Social Media
Job Requirement:
•	បានបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ និងផ្តល់អាទិភាពចំពោះអ្នក ដែលបានបញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ ផែ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងអាជីវកម្ម, និងជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ជាប្រធានផ្នែកលក់និងទីផ្សារចាប់ពី 5ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
•	មានចំណេះដឹងស៊ីជម្រៅនិងយល់ដឹងពីជំនាញផ្នែកលក់ និង ទីផ្សារ។
•	អាចរៀបចំផែនការលក់ ទីផ្សារ និងផែនការសកម្មភាពការងារ និងដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារអនុវត្តឈានសម្រេចបានតាមផែនការដែលដាក់ជូនដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
•	មានសមត្ថភាព ក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងភាសាបរទេស ពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេស ឬភាសាចិន។
•	មានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការចុះទៅធ្វើការតាមខេត្ត និងអាចចុះតាមខេត្តក្នុងរយៈពេលយូរថ្ងៃបាន។
•	មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរ និងចេះបើកបរស្ទាត់ជំនាញ គោរពច្បាប់ និងដោយទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។
Company Profile: អង្គរហ្គ្រីន អ៊ិនវេសមេន អេន ឌីវេឡុបមេន លីមីតធីត បានបង្កើតឡើងនៅខែសីហា ឆ្នាំ២០១១។ យើងបាន និងកំពុងពង្រីកសកម្មភាពក្នុងការផ្តល់ដំណោះស្រាយកសិកម្មជាកញ្ចប់ តាមរយៈការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងចុះគាំទ្រកសិករដល់ចំការ រួមទាំងការលក់ចែកចាយជី-ថ្នាំកសិកម្ម, ភ្នាក់ងារជីវៈសាស្ត្រ, ប្រព័ន្ធស្រោចស្រពទំនើប, ចំណីសត្វ, ត្រាក់ទ័រទំនើប និងគ្រឿងយន្តកសិកម្ម, គ្រាប់ពូជ គម្រោងទិញលក់កសិផល និងការនាំចេញកសិផលផងដែរ។ អង្គរហ្គ្រីន បាន និងកំពុងធ្វើការយ៉ាងសកម្មជាមួយកសិកររាប់ពាន់នាក់ក្នុង១ឆ្នាំៗ នៅក្នុងខេត្តចំនួន២៥/២៥ខេត្ត-រាជធានីនៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។

•	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារជាក្រុមល្អ មានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្ត មានគំនិតឆ្នៃប្រឌិត និងសហគ្រិនភាព។
Company Profile: អង្គរហ្គ្រីន អ៊ិនវេសមេន អេន ឌីវេឡុបមេន លីមីតធីត បានបង្កើតឡើងនៅខែសីហា ឆ្នាំ២០១១។ យើងបាន និងកំពុងពង្រីកសកម្មភាពក្នុងការផ្តល់ដំណោះស្រាយកសិកម្មជាកញ្ចប់ តាមរយៈការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងចុះគាំទ្រកសិករដល់ចំការ រួមទាំងការលក់ចែកចាយជី-ថ្នាំកសិកម្ម, ភ្នាក់ងារជីវៈសាស្ត្រ, ប្រព័ន្ធស្រោចស្រពទំនើប, ចំណីសត្វ, ត្រាក់ទ័រទំនើប និងគ្រឿងយន្តកសិកម្ម, គ្រាប់ពូជ គម្រោងទិញលក់កសិផល និងការនាំចេញកសិផលផងដែរ។ អង្គរហ្គ្រីន បាន និងកំពុងធ្វើការយ៉ាងសកម្មជាមួយកសិកររាប់ពាន់នាក់ក្នុង១ឆ្នាំៗ នៅក្នុងខេត្តចំនួន២៥/២៥ខេត្ត-រាជធានីនៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។

•	ត្រូវចុះជួបអតិថិជន ជាប្រចាំ ដើម្បីផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និង ជំរុញការលក់

•	ចូលរួមកម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ទៅអតិថិជនគោលដៅ

•	មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន អាចធ្វើដំណើរតាមខេត្តបាន និងចុះទៅតាមដេប៉ូ ឬកសិដ្ឋានផ្ទាល់។
•	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារជាក្រុមល្អ មានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្ត មានគំនិតឆ្នៃប្រឌិត និងសហគ្រិនភាព។

- ធ្វើ Demo និងតាមដាន Demo ជាមួយម្ចាស់ស្រែ ចំការ។
- ចូលរួមរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រក្នុងការលក់ ជាមួយថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងតំបន់។ 
- ប្រមូលប្រាក់ និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់បំណុលជាមួយដេប៉ូ។
- ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផលតាមបណ្តាញសង្គម។
- ត្រូវរាយការណ៏សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយរូបភាពដែលខ្លួនបានធ្វើ។ 
- ត្រូវផ្ញើរបាយការណ៏លក់ និង របាយការណ៏ប្រមូលប្រាក់ រាល់ចុងខែមកកាន់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ ឬកំពុងសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផែ្នកកសិកម្ម គ្រប់គ្រងពាណិជ្ជកម្ម, ទីផ្សារ ឬជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់យ៉ាងតិច១ឆ្នាំ និងផ្តល់អាទិភាពដល់បេក្ខជនដែលមានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកជីថ្នាំកសិកម្ម។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការប្រើបណ្តាញទំនាក់ទំនងសង្គម និងអាចធ្វើសកម្មភាពជម្រុញការលក់តាមបណ្តាញ ទំនាក់ទំនងនានាបានល្អ និងទីផ្សាឌីជីថល រួមទាំងចេះកំព្យូទ័រ Microsoft Office។
- ជាមនុស្សស្មោះត្រង់, ទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់, មានគំនិតជាសហគ្រិន ជាមនុស្សដែលមានវិន័យ និងការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ គំនិតផ្តោតលើលទ្ធផល សុទិដ្ឋិនិយម និងមានការផ្តួចផ្តើមថ្មីៗ។
- ពូកែទំនាក់ទំនង និងមានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការចុះទៅធ្វើការ ជាមួយដេប៉ូ និងកសិករ។
- អាចធ្វើដំណើរទៅតាមចំការ ឬស្រែរបស់កសិករផ្ទាល់។
Company Profile: អង្គរហ្គ្រីន អ៊ិនវេសមេន អេន ឌីវេឡុបមេន លីមីតធីត បានបង្កើតឡើងនៅខែសីហា ឆ្នាំ២០១១។ យើងបាន និងកំពុងពង្រីកសកម្មភាពក្នុងការផ្តល់ដំណោះស្រាយកសិកម្មជាកញ្ចប់ តាមរយៈការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងចុះគាំទ្រកសិករដល់ចំការ រួមទាំងការលក់ចែកចាយជី-ថ្នាំកសិកម្ម, ភ្នាក់ងារជីវៈសាស្ត្រ, ប្រព័ន្ធស្រោចស្រពទំនើប, ចំណីសត្វ, ត្រាក់ទ័រទំនើប និងគ្រឿងយន្តកសិកម្ម, គ្រាប់ពូជ គម្រោងទិញលក់កសិផល និងការនាំចេញកសិផលផងដែរ។ អង្គរហ្គ្រីន បាន និងកំពុងធ្វើការយ៉ាងសកម្មជាមួយកសិកររាប់ពាន់នាក់ក្នុង១ឆ្នាំៗ នៅក្នុងខេត្តចំនួន២៥/២៥ខេត្ត-រាជធានីនៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។

job title: មន្ត្រីត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុងជាន់ខ្ពស់ / Senior Internal Audit
company_name: Angkor Green Investment and Development Co.,Ltd.
position: មន្ត្រីត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុងជាន់ខ្ពស់ / Senior Internal Audit
Job Description:
•	រៀបចំផែនការត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង ផែនការសកម្មភាពការងារ ការប្រមូលទិន្នន័យ ជាមួយនឹងការកំណត់ ហានិភ័យសំខាន់ៗមុនពេលចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យ។
•	ដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង និងគាំទ្របច្ចេកទេសដល់ក្រុមការងារ។
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យសកម្មភាពក្រុមការងារ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យលទ្ធផលដែលបានអនុវត្ត។
•	ចូលរួមពិភាក្សាអំពីលទ្ធផលនៃការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងការរកឃើញ ដើម្បីផ្តល់មតិយោបល់កែលម្អក្រោយ ពេលត្រួតពិនិត្យ។
•	ពិនិត្យលទ្ធផលរបាយការណ៍ដែលរៀបចំដោយសមាជិកក្រុម និងរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍រួម។
•	ផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់សមាជិកក្រុមនៅពេលមានការចាំបាច់ ដើម្បីធានាឱ្យបាននូវការផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ចំណេះដឹងប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
•	ចូលរួមយ៉ាងសកម្មជាមួយប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋានត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង ដើម្បីអនុវត្តការងារទាក់ទងនឹងការ ត្រួតពិនិត្យបំណុល និងការប្រមូលប្រាក់ ការគ្រប់គ្រងការចំណាយប្រតិបត្តិការ ការគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ និងការគ្រប់គ្រងហានិភ័យផ្សេងៗ។
•	តាមដានលទ្ធផលត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង និងការអនុវត្តកែលម្អរបស់ផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
•	ជួយរៀបចំគោលការណ៍ នីតិវិធី និងគោលការណ៍ណែនាំផ្សេងៗសម្រាប់នាយកដ្ឋានត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង សម្រាប់ក្រុមការងារអនុវត្តន៍ប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
•	គោរពតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។
•	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍រៀងរាល់ ០២សប្ដាហ៍ម្ដង និង០៣ខែម្ដង ដាក់ជួនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
•	បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកធនាគារ/ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ/គណនេយ្យ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច ០២ឆ្នាំ នៃជំនាញត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង ឬសវនកម្មផ្ទៃក្នុង។
•	មានការយល់ដឹងល្អអំពីនីតិវិធី និងលំហូរការងារត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទៃក្នុង ឬសវនកម្មផ្ទៃក្នុង។
•	មានអត្តចរិកល្អ មានគំនិតវិជ្ជមាន មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងអាចធ្វើការប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈ។
•	ការប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របានស្ទាត់ជំនាញ ដើម្បីសរសេររបាយការណ៍បានទាន់ពេល។
•	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ការងារជាក្រុមល្អ មានការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្ត មានគំនិតឆ្នៃប្រឌិត និងសហគ្រិនភាព។
Company Profile: អង្គរហ្គ្រីន អ៊ិនវេសមេន អេន ឌីវេឡុបមេន លីមីតធីត បានបង្កើតឡើងនៅខែសីហា ឆ្នាំ២០១១។ យើងបាន និងកំពុងពង្រីកសកម្មភាពក្នុងការផ្តល់ដំណោះស្រាយកសិកម្មជាកញ្ចប់ តាមរយៈការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងចុះគាំទ្រកសិករដល់ចំការ រួមទាំងការលក់ចែកចាយជី-ថ្នាំកសិកម្ម, ភ្នាក់ងារជីវៈសាស្ត្រ, ប្រព័ន្ធស្រោចស្រពទំនើប, ចំណីសត្វ, ត្រាក់ទ័រទំនើប និងគ្រឿងយន្តកសិកម្ម, គ្រាប់ពូជ គម្រោងទិញលក់កសិផល និងការនាំចេញកសិផលផងដែរ។ អង្គរហ្គ្រីន បាន និងកំពុងធ្វើការយ៉ាងសកម្មជាមួយកសិកររាប់ពាន់នាក់ក្នុង១ឆ្នាំៗ នៅក្នុងខេត្តចំនួន២៥/២៥ខេត្ត-រាជធានីនៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា។

Job Description: •	Assists and work closely with the design manager, team leaders, and team members.•	Develops design through all stages from conception to completion. •	Works on interior design assignments that include conceptual and schematic design through project completion and report directly to the design head department. •	Assists in preparing schematic, design development drawings, tender drawings and construction drawings in form of 2dand 3d drawings•	Assists in sourcing out materials, supplier and sub-con relevant to the project on hand.•	Assists in project site survey and measurement. •	Prepares meeting minutes, communicate design ideas and direction quickly to the team as•	Per client's, sub-con, vendors and project team requirement. Performs other tasks assigned by Team Leaders and Design Manager.
Job Requirement: •	Degree in Architecture, Interior Design or related studies.•	At least 2-3 year working experience as a Junior Designer/Technical Drawing Designer.•	Able to read architecture drawing.•	Proficient in English both written and oral to liaise with associates •	Able to handle sub-con, vendors, supplier and sometimes client coordination meeting incase design manger and team leader are not available. •	Able to work with team and less supervision •	Able to work in a fast phase environment•	Good listener and detail oriented. •	Good sense of time management. •	Proficient in Microsoft power point, Ms. Word, Excel, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator,AutoCAD, 2D, 3D Max, Sketch Up and V-ray is a must.

Job Description:
The lnstitut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is recruiting one full time laboratory technician based in the Medical Biology Laboratory for CircUs project. The contract is offering for 10 months.

* Main activities:

- Manage specimen received in the framework of the project
- Perform bacteriological analysis, result interpretation and reporting
- Perform DNA extraction and molecular analysis
- Prepare reagents/solution for the analysis
- Data entry and archive
- Bio-banking and stock management
- Perform other tasks assigned by the project investigators or head of laboratory.
Job Requirement: * Recruitment conditions:- Cambodian nationality- Technical diploma or certificate from Institute or University- Fresh graduated is accepted- Language required: English or French* Qualifications:- Good knowledge in microbiology- Knowledge in molecular biology and food safety is a plus- Familiar with good laboratory practices- Good team work, communication, rigorous and autonomous- Dynamic character and eager to learn- Computer literacy: Word, Excel, Power PointThe complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas ifany, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certifieddocuments to the originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur- kh.org, phone number: 092 777 665.* Deadline: September 20th, 2022.
Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

Job Description:
• Hazard identification and risk assessment within the scope of the project, make an improvement plan.

• Work in line with HSE policy, and ensure awareness and compliance of HSE rules and regulations by subordinates.

• Ensures project HSE Deliverables are provided in accordance with the requirements
• Assess and implement available technologies and services to improve HSE performance.

• At least 3-4 years of experience in safety work.
• Experience in safety with construction sites.
• Coordinate with the construction team on all activities undertaken by the Contractor with respect to safety requirements, especially for traffic management, deep excavation, movement of equipment, etc.
• Strong presentation, written communications, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer.
• Good planning and time management.

Job Description:

- សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រង បសស NSSF (Work related injury and health care)
- ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តពីរដងក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ / Bonus Twice per year
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសាំង / Gasoline Allowance
- ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ / Annual Salary Increment
- ប្រាក់ថែមម៉ោង / Overtime
- ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ / Seniority Payment
- ប្រាក់បំណាច់បញ្ចប់កិច្ចសន្យា / Severance Payment
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចូលរួមរំលែកទុក្ខពេលមានមរណភាព /Mourning Allowance
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភពេលសម្រាលកូន/ Maternity Allowance

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗក្រៅពីហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Non- Financial benefits:
- ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំខែ ៨-៩ថ្ងៃក្នុង១ខែ / 8-9 days Off per month
- អាហារមួយពេលក្នុង០១ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ / 01 meal per working day
- ច្បាប់សម្រាកពិសេស / Special Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ១៨ថ្ងៃក្នុង ១ឆ្នាំ / Annual Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកមាតុភាព / Maternity Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកបុរសពេលភរិយាសម្រាលបុត្រ / Paternity Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកពេលរៀបអាពាពិពាហ៏/ Marriage Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកឈឺពេលខ្លី និងឈឺពេលវែង / Short term and long term Sick leave
- ការលើកទឹកចិត្តសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកដែលមានអតីតភាពការងារវែង ៥ឆ្នាំ ១០ឆ្នាំ .... / Long Year Service Award (5 years, 10 years,…)

ផ្សេងៗ / Others:
- ដំណើរកំសាន្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក / Annual Staff Trip
- ការជប់លៀងចុងឆ្នាំ / Year End Party
- ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ / Career Development Opportunity
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលក្នុង និងក្រៅប្រទេស / Local and Oversea Training

Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile: Our vision as a school is to prepare and equip our young people with the knowledge, skills, understanding, and attitude to thrive and then take on the world.Our mission is to provide exceptional care and education to children while fostering each child’s intellectual, social, physical, emotional, and moral development in an academic-rich environment.The curriculum at BISPP has derived from Vision and Mission statements, along with our definition of teaching and learning adapted from the International Early Year Curriculum (IEYC) and Cambridge Curriculum. These curriculums are to ensure great learning, great teaching, and great fun and to prepare our young children to take on the world. Teaching and learning: BISPP is seeking to develop self-esteem and pleasure in learning through a stimulating, supportive and happy environment that provides all students and staff with opportunities to achieve their full potential in knowledge, skills, understanding, and behavior to be globally competitive. Personal development: BISPP values punctuation, honesty, creativity, kindness, independence, and interdependence, communication, exploring, healthy living, trust, and tolerance. Respect: BISPP is requiring our staff and students to show respect for ourselves, other people, our environment, school property, and individual property.
