Job Description:
•	Record fixed asset by creating and supervising a system procedure, forms and controls. 
•	Recommend any updates to accounting policies affecting fixed assets to management. 
•	Allocate tag numbers to fixed assets to effectively track them from time to time. 
•	Record in the accounting system newly acquired fixed assets and those disposed. 
•	Perform depreciation calculation for all fixed assets. 
•	Find out fixed assets 'obsolescence potential. 
•	Carry out inventory counts of fixed assets physically. 
•	Recommend fixed assets that should be disposed off to management. 
•	Create fixed asset related audit schedules, and collaborate with auditors on their assignments. 
•	Perform property tax returns report. 
•	Serve as company representative at any audits relating to fixed asset.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Accounting or other relevant fields; 
•	At least 1-2 years’ experience in fixed assets 
•	Strong knowledge and experience of fixed assets and General Ledger. 
•	Possess strong proficiency in Excel. 
•	Strong communication and analytical skills. 
•	Strong ability to work individually or in a team setting. 
•	Excellent interpersonal and time management skills to meet time-sensitive deadlines. 
•	Good oral and written English Language. 
•	Be honest and trustworthy. 
•	Hard work and be able to work under pressure. 
•	Be patient, self-motivated and team building capabilities. 
•	Team work, interpersonal, customer service skill and strong communication skill. 
•	Be able to work with shift schedule (including weekend and public holiday).

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Raffles Medical Cambodia are looking for a full-time Customer Service Representative and several part-
time/locum Customer Service Representatives to effectively maintain the highest level of client service
standards through support of the clinic staff and by providing efficient and consistent delivery of non-medical
support services to clients.

Key Responsibilities
- Greets the patient in a warm and friendly manner–speaking English.
- Assist the patient in completing information forms, Insurance forms, making appointments. Also, answer any questions the patient might have.
- Admits new patients to the system (manually and on computer)
- Maintains the reception areas in relation to tidiness, stationary & supplies.
- Maintains the paper or electronic file that constitutes the Medical Records and obtains that record from the files for the patient and/or doctor.
- Logs appointments & notifies doctor, staff & patient of the time & date.
- Logs all files that are taken out of the clinic
- Reviews the treatment form and processes an invoice for patient. Reminds the doctor if all the treatment forms have not been complete
- Makes credit card transactions and receives authorization for credit card payment.
- Answers all questions the patient may have concerning the invoice payment
- Assists accounting in reconciliation of daily cash with the accounting department.
- Keeping up-to-date lists of credit agreements, Raffles Medical membership and procedures.
- Administrates cashless medical service (CMS) & direct billing claims to insurance companies
- Working with the accounting department concerning lost receipts, receipts for insurance purposes, refunds, daily deposits of cash, credit card receipts, checks, and credit problems & accounts receivables.
- Process closing day and back up report through the computer system in the morning and evening time.
- Maintains confidentiality of all clients and Raffles Medical business.
- Is familiar with the SOPP’s for the Immigration Visa Health Check Clinic & follows the Raffles Medical & embassy SOPP’s implicitly.
- Notifies supervisor or Senior Management staff when an issue, incident or accident arises with a client or staff.
- Ensures that any accounts receivable are followed up daily and activity recorded.
- Assist in the administration of all insurance Claims (Life/Accident/Prepaid programs)– Insurance Claims.
- Be available to work any shift according to Roster requirements.
- Is familiar with the infection control SOPP’s & hazardous exposure SOPP.
- Complete other tasks / projects assigned by the Manager.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Knowledge and skill of customer services
- Interpersonal, presentation and communication skills
- Good organizational skills
- Computer literacy (MS Office, internet, email, etc)
- Customer focused with good customer-handling skills.
- Ability to interact with various cultures and all levels in a multinational environment.
- Ability to analyze / solve problems in a fast paced environment.
- Multi tasking capabilities to accommodate a multi-unit organization.
- Able to demonstrate friendly, tactful attitude and empathy to patients.
- Will demonstrate good team work with other staff.

Required Competencies
- Supervisory and leadership skills
- Excellent organizational skills
- Conflict and complaint handling skills
- Change management skills

Required Work Experience
- At least 1 years of experience in customer service, however fresh graduates with no relevant experience is invited to apply.

Required Qualifications
-  University degree or 4th-year university student in English, management or related field

Required Languages
- English and Khmer
Company Profile:
Raffles Medical Cambodia was opened in 1992 and is renowned for the delivery of comprehensive international standards of medical services. The staff consists of well qualified doctors and nurses who are familiar with the health dynamics in Cambodia, and are able to provide full support for expatriates, residents and tourists for day to day health management, vaccinations, medical stabilization and treatment in the event of a medical emergency.

Patients will receive the same high level of service and renowned quality of care, with continued access to our panel of international and local doctors. Patients and onshore panel of doctors can also expect to benefit from access to the clinical expertise and support from the Raffles specialists in Singapore.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  023 216 911 / 012 497 761 saly_man@rafflesmedical.com No 161, Street 51 Beoung Raing, Duan Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 023 216 911 / 012 497 761

Company Profile:
Raffles Medical Cambodia was opened in 1992 and is renowned for the delivery of comprehensive international standards of medical services. The staff consists of well qualified doctors and nurses who are familiar with the health dynamics in Cambodia, and are able to provide full support for expatriates, residents and tourists for day to day health management, vaccinations, medical stabilization and treatment in the event of a medical emergency.

Patients will receive the same high level of service and renowned quality of care, with continued access to our panel of international and local doctors. Patients and onshore panel of doctors can also expect to benefit from access to the clinical expertise and support from the Raffles specialists in Singapore.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  023 216 911 / 012 497 761 saly_man@rafflesmedical.com No 161, Street 51 Beoung Raing, Duan Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 023 216 911 / 012 497 761

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
The Locum X-Ray Technician is responsible for the accurate and timely results of X-ray done at Raffles Medical.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Routine X-Ray 
 1.1 Perform all X-Ray as per requested by CMO, MO, CM or health Check.
 1.2 Burn into a CD for all visa health check applicants 
 1.3 Burn into a CD for routine health check upon request only
 1.4 Burn into a CD for patient upon request only
 1.5 Burn into a CD for back up every month 
 1.6 Drop an X-ray into a V drive for doctors to view soon after it was taken 

2. Results and Reporting 
 2.1 Follow up report done by radiologist and copy, file and distribute to the requesting doctors and Health check File (Front Desk) 
 2.2 Make sure that duplicate report be filed in a folder
 2.3 Burn into a CD for VISA applicant and patient as needed (requested).

3. Infection Control
 3.1 Comply with a high degree of infection control principles in the X-Ray 
 3.2 Follow the hygiene, safe procedure when working and report to Management any job accidents
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- X-ray skill
- Computer proficiency

Required Competencies
- Integrity and trust
- Hard working with a positive attitude
- Peer relationships

Required Work Experience
- At least 1 years plus

Required Qualifications
- Diploma in Radiographer

Required Languages
- English and Khmer

•	Map out annual training plans for management, HR, customer support and more

•	រៀបចំ និងឲ្យជាមតិយោបល់ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកដើម្បីធ្វើការស្នើសុំការអនុម័តយល់ព្រមពីក្រុមប្រឹក្សា និងនីតិវិធី គ្រប់គ្រងនៃការបញ្ជាទិញគ្រឿងផ្គត់ផ្គង់សេវាកម្ម និងសម្ភារៈសំរាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងការធ្វើវិសោធនកម្ម ទៅលើក្បួនច្បាប់ដែលមានស្រាប់ 
•	រក្សារផ្តល់ពត៌មាននៃការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ថ្មីៗក្នុងផ្នែកបញ្ជាទិញ ដូចជា ការប្រែប្រួលនៃតម្លៃ លក្ខ័ខណ្ឌ័ទីផ្សារ និងផលិតផលថ្មី។ 
•	បញ្ញត្តិ និងរក្សាទំរង់ទាំងនោះជាការចំាបាច់សមរម្យមួយដើម្បីបដិបត្តិទៅតាមតម្រូវការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។ 
•	ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការត្រួតពិនិត្យនៃគ្រឿងសម្ភារៈផ្គត់ផ្គង់ទាំងអស់ សេវាកម្ម និងសម្ភារៈដែលបានបញ្ជាទិញ ត្រូវប្រាកដថាអនុលោមតាមបែបបទភាពជាក់លាក់ និងច្បាស់លាស់។ 
•	រក្សាតារាងដេញថ្លៃ ឯកសារអាជីវកម្ម និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការសំរាប់ប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍ដែលមាន ប្រសិទ្ធិភាព នៃការងារបញ្ជាទិញ។ 
•	ដកស្រង់តម្លៃទំនិញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធទៅនិងការបញ្ជាទិញប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំត្រីមាស 
•	អនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗដ៏ទៃទៀតដែលប្រធានផ្នែកបានដាក់ឲ្យ។ 
•	គ្រប់គ្រងដំណើរការបញ្ជាទិញទាំងអស់នៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	អនុវត្តតាមគោលការណ៏បញ្ជារទិញរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	គាំទ្រ និងធានានូវការទិញទំនិញទៅគ្រប់ផ្នែកទាន់ពេលវេលា
•	ស្នើរសុំបញ្ជីរតំលៃ និងព័ត៌មានលម្អិតអំពីផលិតផល ព្រមទាំងចរចាកិច្ចសន្យា ឬកិច្ចព្រមព្រៀងផ្សេងៗ

•	ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយផ្នែកស្តុក ក្នុងការងារផ្សេងៗ
•	អាចធ្វើដំណើរទៅទិញ ឬដោះស្រាយភ្លាមៗនូវបញ្ហាកង្វះខាតទំនិញណាមួយចាំបាច់។
•	សហការជាមួយផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ដើម្បីទូទាត់ទៅអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់។
•	អនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗដែលស្នើរដោយថ្នាក់លើ...។

•	អ្នកសិក្សាលឿននិងការងារដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពអាចធ្វើការក្រោមសម្ពាធនិងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់។

Job Description: 𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎 𝐂𝐨., 𝐋𝐭𝐝., the biggest fashion conglomerate, operating more than 20 clothing stores, including 𝐓𝐄𝐍𝟏𝟏, 𝐆𝐀𝐓𝐎𝐍𝐈, 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝟑𝟔𝟏° planning to extend across the country, is currently looking for potential and talented candidates in the position of 𝐂# 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫.Job DescriptionWe are looking for a quality C# developer to join our team! As a C# Developer, you will be required to design, write, and maintain C# coding for our current and ongoing projects. You will also be required to contribute to design and planning sessions as well as formulate approaches for current coding tasks.To ensure success as a C# developer you must have an excellent grasp of C# and the .NET framework, prolific coding abilities, and be able to problem-solve on a daily basis. A top-quality C# developer will be able to perform full-stack development as well as handle the creation, maintenance, and further development of .NET applications and programs.Job Responsibilities:•	Developing C# .NET solutions for the organization•	Creating in-house applications using the .NET framework•	Debugging and maintaining written code•	Defining and organizing projects on ongoing projects•	Reporting and resolving issues related to .NET projects•	Identifying and handling technical risks and issues•	Working in a project team alongside other developers•	Providing technical support to stakeholders in the organization•	Reporting on project statuses and developments to senior team members•	Participating in project meetings with management and other team members
Job Requirement: 1. For Experienced Candidates •	At least 2-years experiences•	A bachelor's degree in computer programming, computer science, or information technology.•	Microsoft Visual Studio, C#.net, C++, VB.net, PHP, HTML, MySQL, MS SQL Server •	Familiarity with Relational Databases, MS SQL Server, and MySQL.•	Ability to write clean, easy-to-understand code.•	Outstanding analytical and problem-solving capabilities.•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.•	Ability to work independently and complete projects with minimal supervision.•	Sound understanding of coding and development processes.•	Experience with project versioning.2.  For Inexperienced Candidates •	Fresh graduate or at least a fourth-year college student in Computer Science•	Understanding of Microsoft Visual Studio, C#.net, C++, VB.net, PHP, HTML, MySQL, MS SQL Server •	Understanding with Relational Databases, MS SQL Server, and MySQL.•	Ability to write clean, easy-to-understand code.•	Be able to analyze and problem-solving capabilities.•	Good written and verbal communication skills.•	Ability to work independently and complete projects with minimal supervision.•	Sound understanding of coding and development processes.NOTE:•	Applications which are not meeting the requirement will be rejected.•	Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for an interview.•	Attach transcript or any certificates with the application.*Benefits:• Annual bonus• Employee discount• Other benefits...Interested candidates should submit their updated CV & cover letter to our email: hr@zandokh.comAddress: ZANDO Toul Tompong: #175 Str, 155 Sangkat Toul Tompong 1, Khan Chomkamorn, Phnom Penh. or 𝐓𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦: 𝟎𝟖𝟏 𝟐𝟕 𝟓𝟑 𝟓𝟑 Or you can apply directly through ZANDO Toul Tum Poung, Or you can contact us at 𝟎𝟖𝟏 𝟐𝟕 𝟓𝟑 𝟓𝟑 / 𝟎𝟕𝟕 𝟔𝟐𝟐 𝟔𝟔𝟎 every working hour (08:00 AM to 05:00 PM) for more information.Join us on Telegram for more job opportunities: https://t.me/zandocareer
Company Profile: Founded in early 2015, ZANDO is a Cambodian fashion retail company inspiring your passion of styles and making you experience the world of iconic fashion brands at the value of every buck.

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

•	Design, build and maintain high performance and reliable API platform
•	Work with internal and external team to support on API integration
•	Develop backend app, microservice and others API as required

Job Description:

•	Perform data updates, indexing, and maintenance in application Data warehouse and ETL tools. 
•	Work with Business Owners/Data Analyst to develop key business questions and to build datasets that answer those questions.
•	Help to implement new data management projects and re-structure of the current data architecture.
•	Assist team in data management projects when needed.
•	Process and load third party data sources.
•	Work with Business Customers in understanding the business requirements and implementing solutions.
•	Identify and solve issues concerning data management to improve data quality.
•	Develop best practices for data management, maintenance, reporting and security.
•	Improve data foundational procedures, guidelines and standards.
•	Review dataset implementations performed by other data engineers.
•	Perform additional data and database related tasks.
•	Learn new technology if require
•	Resolve tickets on Web Helpdesk
Job Requirement:
•	(The minimum education, experience, knowledge, skills & attitude required to perform the position)
•	Education: Bachelor Degree in Information Technology
•	Experience: at least 2 year experiences in Data warehouse, ETL tools, Data processing, Hive, Spark, Kafka, …. 
•	Skills: Data structure, coding, Machine learning, Data warehouse, ETL, Data integration
•	Knowledge: data structure, programming, big data, database (Oracle, Postgres), business concept
•	Attitude: active, hard-working, honest, responsibility, friendly
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description: * Strategy and Planning- Initiate, define, plan, communicate and follow up company's   business strategy regarding Private Banking business in order   to ensure company’s long-term viability and market share.- Develop an appropriate marketing plan with marketing team to   efficiently and effectively achieve goals and objectives   through design and implement workable and innovative   solutions for client’s needs.- Keep abreast of latest market trend, analyze customers'   behavior, key financial drivers and competitors'' strategy to   sustain a continuous service growth.* Customer Acquisition & Revenue Target- Present and provide highly professional consultations to   target corporate clients and HNWI to address their demands   and match with the Bank’s products and services.- Discuss credit-related issues and loan packaging to provide   sound financial advice and tailored solutions for the clients   as well as to take the opportunity to cross-sell other   banking products.- Prepare and execute loan contracts and arrange loan   disbursement timely and accurately to fulfill clients’ needs   and satisfactions.- Closely monitor on recommended/processed loan for timely   repayment and to ensure Portfolio at Risk remains within   acceptable level.- Solicit, build and maintain new and existing local   corporate/HNW individual clients in accordance with the   guidelines stated in the Commercial Banking policies and   procedures to ensure sustainable and secure deposit and loan   portfolios and expending scope to investment and other   products/services as cross-selling.* Customer Relationship Management- Make regular site visits to existing clients to determine the   actual conditions of the business and loan collateral whether   it should remain the same or be downgraded as well as to   develop relationship with clients as part of retention   strategies.- Act as liaison between clients and internal operations team   to timely and effectively understand and provide all types of   banking products including but not limited to deposits,   loans, trade finances and remittance for the clients.- Handle complex clients’ issues or complaints to find an   amicable solution for all and process to higher authority if   needed.* Project Management & Process Improvement- Lead projects on developing and launching new   initiatives/services and creating new service features and   process regarding Private Banking as needed to improve/gain   market penetration/share- Coordinate with different departments, including Operations,   Finance & IT in streamlining processes, Marketing to drive   business growth and Risk and Compliance in ensuring adherence   of relevant policies and guidelines.* Staff Management- Supervise staff in daily tasks, operations and quality   control.- Coordinate available resources for maximum outcomes.- Act as a role model within the team to question, listen and   give actionable feedback carefully in order to create a   productive work atmosphere towards “speak up culture”.- Oversee Deposit Initiatives such as new product development,   feature enhancements, client experience improvement, pricing   management, campaign/promotion to support deposit raising   etc. in their entire lifecycle from client value proposition   conception, tech budgetary negotiation & planning, product   approval/approval, project management and risk/control   governance etc- Oversee day-to-day deposits product management across all   markets including review/approval of deposit campaigns   (tactical, bundles, solus, thematic, digital focused, etc.),   monthly deposit reviews with markets, weekly deposit balance   monitoring and flash process, month-end revenue analysis, and   annual Plan and mid-year forecast exercise.
Job Requirement: - BA in Business, Economics, Accounting, Banking or Finance- Minimum 3 years' experience in Sales & Customers or Partners   Relationship Management / Business Analysis / Project   Management / Transformation / Digital , preferably gained in   Banking or Financial Services industry or consultancy and in   particular in Corporate, Retail Banking, Banking and Cash   Management, Lending / Investment is a plus- Good in spoken / written English and in another foreign   language is a plus- Strong customer/partner relationship, customer services and   deal/project structuring/implementation- Good analytical, communication and interpersonal skills- Having high level of confidentiality, integrity and business   ethic

position: ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្យ
Job Description:
-	មានភារកិច្ចរៀបចំឯកសារបៀវត្សប្រចាំខែរបស់បុគ្គលិក (កាត់កង-ថែមម៉ោង-កាតទូរស័ព្ទ-ប្រាក់បុរេប្រទានជាប្រចាំខែ) ទៅតាមឋានៈតួនាទី។
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យរបាយការណ៍វត្តមានស្គេនម៉ោងចេញ-ចូលបុគ្គលិក / បុគ្គលិកសុំច្បាប់ និងថ្ងៃសម្រាកប្រចាំខែ ឆ្នាំ។ល។
-	មានភារកិច្ចរៀបចំពង្រាងទម្រង់ (Form) រដ្ឋបាល
-	មានភារកិច្ចទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការផ្សព្វផ្សាយបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុង គោលការណ៍ និតិវិធីការងារ និងសេចក្តីជូនដំណឹងផ្សេងៗជូនដល់បុគ្គលិកដែលទើបនឹងចូលថ្មី ដើម្បីឲ្យបានយល់ច្បាស់ ងាយស្រួលក្នុងការអនុវត្តនូវតួនាទី និងភារកិច្ចរបស់ខ្លួន។  
-	មានភារកិច្ចទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ដើម្បីបំពេញតម្រូវការចាំបាច់ ឬទៅតាមផែនការប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
-	មានភារកិច្ចរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យាការងារ (ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ) / តួនាទីភារកិច្ចបុគ្គលិក / លិខិតធានា / កិច្ចសន្យារក្សាការសម្ងាត់ក្រុមហ៊ុនរាល់បុគ្គលិកចូលថ្មី។ 
-	មានភារកិច្ចគ្រប់គ្រង និងទុកដាក់ឯកសារបុគ្គលិក និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗឲ្យមានរបៀបរៀបរយ និងសុវត្ថិភាព។
-	មានភារកិច្ចគ្រប់គ្រងបដិសណ្ឋារកិច្ច សុវត្ថិភាព សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ វិន័យការងារ សន្តិសុខ អនាម័យ សុខុមាលភាព របស់បុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន។
-	មានភារកិច្ចក្នុងការដោះស្រាយវិវាទ ឬវិបតិ្តផ្ទៃក្នុងបុគ្គលិក ឬបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗដែលកើតមានឡើងនៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន។
-	ត្រូវចូលរួមសហការជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ បំពេញការងារជាក្រុម ដើម្បីវឌ្ឍនភាពក្រុមហ៊ុន
-	ត្រូវបំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចង្អុលបង្ហាញរបស់នាយកចាត់ការទូទៅ ទៅតាមតម្រូវការចាំបាច់ឬការងារ
បន្ទាន់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
-	មានភារកិច្ចរៀបចំរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធអង្គការលេខ (Organization Chart) របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនតាមការណែនាំពីប្រធានក្រុមប្រឹក្សាភិបាលក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
Job Requirement:
- បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងអាជីវកម្ម ឬជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ 
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច 1 ឆ្នាំក្នុងផ្នែក HR និង Admin នៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុនមុន។
- ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស និងខ្មែរបានល្អ។ 
- Ms. Office (World, Excel, Power Point និង E-mail...)។ - ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកថ្មី ប្រកាសការងារ បើកប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ រៀបចំគោលការណ៍.....
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Ron Sary  096 416 45 81 / 012 63 11 04 saryron58@gmail.com # 548, Boeung Toeng Tngay Street, Sangkat Chroy Changva, Khan Chroy Changva, Phnom Penh. 096 416 45 81 / 012 63 11 04

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: - BBA in Human Resources Management (talent management is a   plus),- At least 2-year experiences working in talent acquisition   using multiple sources and methodologies- Good command of English, being outgoing,- Advance skill in Ms. Office- Proven ability to articulate concepts and intention clearly,- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills and be able   to build relationships- Knowledge in Interview Methodologies and fully aware of   different type of psychological bias- Knowledge in Cambodia Labour Law
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

position: ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យកាន់តាមសាខា
Job Description:
- កាន់ស្តុក
- ទទួលអីវ៉ាន់ចេញនិងចូល
- បញ្ជាទិញទំនិញ
- យកលុយដាក់ធានាគា
- ធ្វើចំណូលនិងចំណាយប្រចាំថ្ងៃនិងប្រចាំខែ
- ប្រកាសពន្ធប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ 
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់

មានបទពិសោធចាប់ពីមួយឆ្នាំឡើង
អាស័យដ្ឋានទំនាក់ទំនង់ផ្ទះ 548 ផ្លូវទទឺងថ្ងៃ ខណ្ឌ ជ្រោយចង្វា រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ (Tel:096 416 45 81 ,012 63 1104)
Job Requirement:
1. បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ/គណនេយ្យ 
2. តម្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងហោចណាស់ 2 ឆ្នាំនៃបទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
3. តម្រូវការភាសា៖ ជំនាញស្តាប់ភាសាអង់គ្លេស អាន និងសរសេរ។ 
4. តម្រូវការចំណេះដឹង៖ ជំនាញ Ms. Office រួមមាន Excel, Word, PowerPoint, QB and E-mail។ 
5- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម - ជាមនុស្សបត់បែន។

Job Description:
Responsibilities 
- Manage and Lead a growing sales team to achieved daily sales performance targets
- Ensure digital and  telesales data is accurate and kept up to date in CRM system (HubSpot)
- Manager and Country Director to achieve organizational goals
- Develop sales strategies and plans to continue to grow sales and revenue
- Work closely with Marketing team to ensure high quality leads are generated for Call Center 
- Use quantitative data to make recommendations and decisions
- Lead regular 1-2-1 coachings with sales team to continuously improve skills, motivate and performance manage
- Support Call Center team when escalating customer problems and interact with customers directly if required
- Recruit, train and develop new and existing telesales staff
What we are looking for
- You are a very customer-driven thinker and enjoy coaching your team to reach company sales targets
- You are a team player and a have a hands-on approach to solving problems
- You are open to learning new things and are goal-oriented
- You are a detailed-focused, data and process-driven person
- You can analyze large amounts of data to identify trends and patterns
- You can work to targets and motivate your team to perform at their highest level
- You can plan out and help the team prioritize calls to ensure all leads are being contacted according to service level agreements (SLAs)
Job Requirement:
Skill requirements: 
- Bachelor degree in Marketing or Business Communication
- 2+ years call center or sales supervisor work experience
- Experience managing a call center or sales team preferably through tele- or online channel 
- Experience working to and exceeding targets
- Proven track record of increasing revenue through lead conversion
- Able to speak and write in English
Benefits
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- 15-day seniority payment per year, paid 6 monthly
- ATEC follows Cambodian Labour Law, including public holidays determined by Prakas
- 18 day annual leave as required by MOLVT
- Maternity,  Paternity and compassionate leave
- Health and Accident insurance, NSSF and Private insurance company.
Company Profile:
ATEC exists to solve clean cooking and climate change. We are an award-winning social enterprise that produces, sells and services pre-fabricated biodigesters for rural farming families and provides magnetic induction stoves to on-grid customers. To date over 2300 units bio and 3500 eCook have been installed. Our eCook induction stoves provide customers with access to the electricity grid with a modern, clean cooking option.

ATEC is leading 1 billion emerging market households to transition to modern, decarbonised cooking through disruptive IoT cooking products - delivering cost efficiency to households, data-validated carbon credits to net-zero partners, and aggregated usage data for grid providers. 

At 24 staff, ATEC is now entering the next exciting phase of expanding these technologies across Cambodia and is growing the team to support the expansion. 
Please see www.atecbio.com and www.ecookstove.com  as well as our international website www.atecglobal.io for more information.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr.Suon Sinuon HR Manager (+855) 96 92 81 366 / 017 88 99 39 ssuon@atecglobal.io  #1159 National Road 02, Phumi Prektanu Sangkat Chakangrelue, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia (+855) 96 92 81 366 / 017 88 99 39

Job Description:
- Follow SCG Life Saving Rule
- To analyze 4P+1P: Product, Price, Promotion, Place/Channel, and Packaging of each product portfolio
- To set marketing monthly activities & promotions to drive sales growth and brand awareness both online/offline channel
- To analyze market information, competitor movement, and new product opportunity for gaining more market share
- Event preparing (Exhibition, Expo, Seminar…)
- Others upon assignments
Job Requirement:
- Degree/Certificate in Marketing or any business degree
- Expertise in marketing knowledge 4Ps and online marketing
- Good in MS-Office (Excel and PowerPoint)
- English languages speaking, writing, and listening skill is mandatory requirement.
- Organized, service-minded, and work well under deadlines

**Personal Characteristics
- High level of interpersonal skills and integrity, and a solid team player.
- Strong ethics and a high level of personal and professional integrity.
- Strategic planning, complex problem resolution and general management expertise.

*** We provide the following benefits:
1- Public holiday base on labor law
2- Pension
3- Seniority payment
4- Annual salary increment
5- Annual leave
6- Sick leave
7- Special leave
8- Insurance
9- Annual bonus
10- Annual party
11- Training allowance

Job Description:

Job Description:
You will be responsible for all aspects of digital marketing. Your central goal is to help grow our brand’s influence locally while also increasing brand loyalty and awareness.

Your duties will include planning, implementing, and monitoring our digital marketing campaigns across all digital networks. Our ideal candidate is someone with experience in marketing, art direction, and social media management. In addition to being an outstanding communicator, you will also demonstrate excellent interpersonal and analytical skills. 

** Main Duties: 
• Design digital media campaigns aligned with business goals
• Coordinate the creation of digital content (e.g. Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok, YouTube, and press releases)
• Manage end-to-end digital projects
• Maintain our social accounts (Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok, YouTube) to boost brand awareness
• Liaise with Marketing and Sales teams to ensure brand consistency
• Suggest and implement direct marketing methods to increase profitability
• Monitor ROI and KPIs
• Stay up-to-date with digital media developments
Job Requirement:
•	Proven work experience in Digital media or Digital marketing
•	Optimize content for social media platforms
•	Good analytical and project management skills
•	Provide internal reports on a regular basis 
•	An ability to multitask and perform under tight deadlines
•	Problem solving skills
•	Strong verbal and written communication skills
•	Degree in Marketing, Digital media or relevant field

Company Profile:
Indochina Tour has been providing luxury travel consulting since 2012, with the commitment and expertise to offer our clients unforgettable travel experiences and private service in Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, Thailand and Myanmar.
We offer custom travel planning for individuals, families, and special interest and business groups. We limit our client base so we can dedicate our time to our clients. 
What sets us apart is our experience, and the relationships we have established across the tourism industry. We work with a select but varied number of cruise lines, resorts, tour operators and local vendors to provide top-notch service, and find the best values and funs to meet our guests.
From adventure to relaxation and everything in between, we are here to help bring their travel dreams come true.
We do not attract lazy people with high salaries, but high commission and broad development platform to help you achieve your dream! we are only looking for the guys who have the strong desire for money. 
Join our team, you will have the chance as a company training and inspection to visit all above countries.
Your income will be basic salary plus generous commission, as well as all national public holiday.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   lincoln@indochinatour.com Siem Reap

Company Profile:
Royal De Heus Group is an international organization with a leading position in the animal feed industry. De Heus was founded in 1911 and has its roots in the Netherlands. After more than a 100 years the company is still owned and managed by the De Heus family.

Since its founding Royal De Heus has expanded from a regional feed company to a feed conglomerate with activities in more than 50 countries in Europe, Asia, Middle East, Africa and Latin America. Due to the rapid growth outside the Netherlands the De Heus Group is a global top-15 feed supplier.

De Heus is establishing their production facility in Cambodia and jointing venture together with TMH Company Limited of Cambodia.

assigned by manager

payment/settlement details.

the management.

evidence.

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

• Meet and exceed the assigned sales and revenue targets through acquiring new customers for deposits, Retail SMEs and other lending products.
Understand customers’ lending needs and provide suitable solutions through consultation.
Collecting supporting documents, and preparing credit memorandum with the provision of strong analysis, recommendation and business justification.
Manage and grow existing customer portfolio for FUM, loan, revenue and profitability.
Leverage and expand the customer relationships to maximize referral, cross-selling and new business opportunities.
Contribute to the business’s success by initiating and participating in various cold-calling and marketing activities.
Provide a high standard of service to all customers at all times and address all customer’s
complaints/issues in a professional manner.
Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the bank’s policies and compliance procedures.
Be vigilant on any early credit warning signs and make an immediate report on potential financial or operational losses.
Stay updated with the bank’s products suite, marketing campaigns and competitor activities to ensure superior product knowledge.

- Minimum Bachelor Degree.
- OR lower degree accepted if at least 3 years experience in a similar position.
- Computer literacy and English language proficiency (the French language is a plus).
- Proven sales and service record in banking or related industries.
- Financial background and credit background.


** Required Competencies

- Discretion, integrity and rigour
- Customer focus and strong communication skills.
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to articulate complex issues.
- Confidence, pro-active and ability to work under pressure.
- Good planning, negotiation, problem-solving & organizing skills.
- Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities.
- Be a team player and like to deal with challenges.

Job Description:
• Perform financial, operational, and credit second-level controls.
• Conduct the regular finance control and the AML ratios
• Review bank practices and records for compliance with established internal policies and procedures
• Develop recommendations for improving internal controls, operating efficiency, and the adequacy of bank
records and record keeping.
• Conduct Branch Operational Control, unannounced ash count, daily transaction review & till and vault limit
monitoring
• Manage the incident collection and the external fraud prevention & reporting
• Report control findings and recommendations to appropriate management based on the results of
regularly scheduled controls, non-scheduled controls, and at any time when issues need to be raised to
the management
• Follow up the closing of the internal and external recommendations in timely manager by collecting the
evidence.
Job Requirement:
** Required education & experience
• Minimum Degree in accounting and/or finance
• At least 1 years’ experience in similar position.
• Good computer skills
• Fluency in English (written and spoken)

** Required competencies
• Discretion, integrity and rigor
• Technical Capacity.
• Financial Management.
• Effective communication.
• Autonomous and pro-active.
• Quick learner.

** How to apply
Please send your up-to-date resumé, a copy of your Cambodian ID card and a recent passport size (4x6)
photograph to: BRED Bank (Cambodia) Plc. No. 30, Preah Norodom Boulevard Sangkat Phsar Thmey 3, Khan
Daun Penh, Phnom Penh. Or email hr@bredcambodia.com
Company Profile: About BRED Bank Cambodia:Since first opening our doors in 2017, BRED Bank Cambodia has offered our clients the highest international standards while delivering a uniquely Cambodian banking experience.We provide our growing customer base with a smarter way to bank – tailoring the broad range of our products and services to each business or individual’s unique needs.BRED Bank, the first and only EU bank in Cambodia, is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the French banking group, BRED Banque Populaire, which has operations across Europe and an expanding global network. BRED Banque Populaire is part of BCPE, one of France’s largest banking groups with 36 million customers worldwide. Together, they bring customers more than 100 years of banking experience.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
Job Description:
KEY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES	
Please note that this is not an exhaustive list of everything that needs to be done.  Sinh Hak Hout Team Member always find new ways to look after the business, their guests, and their team members.   Within this, the key responsibilities for this position are:
- Lead and Coordinate with all Operation team to regular fulfill in SHH document implement process 
- Control adequate stock of stationary, Tools and Equipment and PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) for all process of operation section
- Control and Monitor SHH document are properly filed.
- Apply stationary, tools, and equipment request form to relevant department at SHH Headquarter for stock replenishment 
- Support continuous improvement programs for both staff and equipment.
- Maintain all equipment/vehicle’s, ensuring equipment is serviced when needed and are clean and tidy at all times.
- Facilitate and pushing up with supplier speed up vehicles repair to improve dispatching/delivery on time to customer  
- Be understanding of SHH’s mission and vision policy then train or share to operation team be aware also
- Monitor security guard record truck in/out and into log book properly.
- Assist monitor all operation team wears PPE all the time during operation activities in and out warehouse.
- Guide to warehouse and operation team to know safety purpose in SHH
- Control and monitor around warehouse area always clean and tidy all the times to avoid messy warehouse.
- Check all goods and item of tools, equipment is identified correctly.
- Be sure all goods, tools, equipment and SHH properties put in order by correct location.
- Inspect workplace of office, warehouse and workshop clean and tidy before and after work.
- Record all everything in the list keeps as standard document. 
- Be able to communicate and explain SHH Mission, Vision and Policy to the team. so, they are aware of it and thrive to achieve the goals together  
- Work toward team and individual KPIs
- Other task as assigned by Management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree Business Administration or Other relevant fields is advantage
- 2-year experience as administrative and 5S specialist
- Be able to understanding administration and 5S system
- Fully understand warehouse operational systems
- Knowledge of inventory and supply chain management 
- Proficiency in computer systems, including Microsoft Suite and data entry systems
- Ability to input, retrieve and analyze data
- Good time management and planning, Organizing and analytical skills
- Be able to use initiative and work independently
- Highly effective, dynamic, and result-oriented with strong sense of responsibility 
- Working time: 7:30am-5:30pm( 6 days per week)
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

Are you a dynamic professional with a passion for success who is looking for an opportunity that will take your career to a whole new level? If yes, we wish to invite you to apply for the follow positions:

company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
Job Description:
- To lead the communication & Interior Design team in securing the overall visual and inspirational level inside and outside the store.
- Develop SHH store as a source of inspiration, tips and ideas as well as a qualified Tile, Bath and Kitchen specialist.
- Work with all Store Supervisor to make sure that product range presentation and visual merchandising in the store is optimized an that there is a common thread throughout each store.
- Ensure that all SHH stores are well presented, and follow all of the pre-set planogram and store design guideline.
- Plan and lead major changes in the store including building up new store.
- Brief with client after project completion to ensure that goals are met and the project are done according to the customer’s expectations.
- Work closely with technician team on kitchen and furniture installation to ensure that it follows the design plan.
- Other tasks as assigned by Management.
Job Requirement:
- BA in Interior Design or any relate field.
- At least 2 years working experiences in Interior or graphic Design position.
- Highly personable, with the ability to quickly build relationships.
- Be able to travel to the site when needed.
- Be able to work under pressure.
- Communication skills in speaking/Writing English.
- Knowledge of computer literacy (MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint)
- Good interpersonal and Communication skills.
- Strong skill in organization.
- Very patience, flexible, honest and friendly.

Working Hours and Compensation
- work time: 8:00am - 5:00pm (Mon-Sat)
- Holiday
- Annual Trip
- Annual Leave

Job Description:
• Assist in preparation NBC reports (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, and yearly) to meet deadlines
and compliance with NBC regulations and Prakas.
• Assist in finance operation process with NBC (NBC cheque, fund transfer, buy currencies)
• Assist in accounting processes (cash management, recording, reports, reconciliations…)
• Daily checking of financial reports in Flexcube system
• Documentation including scanning and filing

• Minimum bachelor’s degree preferably in finance and banking or other field related to the position.
• OR lower degree accepted if at least in year 4.
• Fluent English (writing and speaking).
• French language is a plus.
• Good computer skills in Excel

** Required competencies:
• Discretion, integrity, and rigor
• Good organizational skills with the ability to work efficiently under pressure and to handle multiple
tasks
• Good mathematical and accounting aptitude
• Effective communication.
• Autonomous and proactive.
• Quick learner.

Daun Penh, Phnom Penh. Or email hr@bredcambodia.com

Job Description:
Positon Summary:
Takes the lead on researching, assessing, and coordinating a new product’s build. It’s also their responsibility to manage the development and improvement of existing products to better meet customer / project needs.

Job Responsibilities: 
• Determines customers’ needs and desires by specifying the research needed to obtain market information. 
• Recommends the nature and scope of present and future product lines by reviewing product specifications and requirements; appraising new product ideas and/or product or packaging changes. 
• Assesses market competition by comparing the company’s product to competitors’ products. 
• Provides source data for product line communications by defining product marketing communication objectives. 
• Obtains product market share by working with marketing manager to develop product sales strategies. 
• Provides information for management by preparing short-term and long-term product sales forecasts and special reports and analyses; answering questions and requests. 
• Brings new products to market by analyzing proposed product requirements and product development programs; preparing return-on-investment analyses; establishing time schedules with engineering and manufacturing. 
• Introduces and markets new products by developing time-integrated plans with sales, advertising, and production. 
• Determines product pricing by utilizing market research data; reviewing production and sales costs; anticipating volume; costing special and customized orders. 
• Completes operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results.
• Identify opportunities for campaigns, services, and market that will lead to an increase in sales. 
• Identify dealer’s challenges and problem, initiate ideas for solutions, gather customer feedbacks, proposing proposal, manage to close the deal with dealer and coordinating with multi-parties to a successful project and maintain relationship with dealer to ensure the good partnership. 
• Reviewing the existing product performance and initiate the improvement plan when needed 
• Attend industry functions, such as association events and conferences, then provide feedback and information on market and creative trends. 
• Present and consult with management team on business trends with a view to developing new products and market. 
• Manage partnerships, mergers and acquisitions that build market share and product development 
• Ensure effective business information and customer insights are managed, reported on and used to analyses and manage 
• Maintain effective internal and external communications 
• Others as assigned by management
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree in Engineer / Sales / Marketing or related fields
• At least 5 years of work experience in corporate & Project sale
• Able to use MS Office, PowerPoint, Internet & Email
• Good command in English
• Sales Skills, Marketing Skills, and/or Management Skills.
• High confidential person
• High commitment
• Working under pressure
• Hardworking
• Able to work in team
• Responsible Work

There are two Showrooms that can show our product and the material and was managed by the expert manager who has many experiences. Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

job title: ​Senior Accountant at a Growing Outsourcing Service Company in Phnom Penh
position: ​Senior Accountant at a Growing Outsourcing Service Company in Phnom Penh
Job Description: - Managing and overseeing the daily operations of internal and external (client) companies.- Communicate regularly with internal and external (client) companies for transaction information and supporting documentation.- Always ensure accurate, allocation, posting and reconciliation of accounts payable and receivables.- Produce error-free accounting reports and present the results monthly to the management.- Liaise with the Group CFO to improve financial procedures.- Regularly review financial information and be ready to provide a summary of the financial status.- Identify problems and suggest ways to improve efficiency and business expenses.- Understand the business nature by meeting the client company and their internal finance team.- Prepare the suitable Chart of Accounts (CoA) for the client's business.- Record and enter into the cloud accounting system and manage the online account.- Reconcile the Accounts Payable and Receivable.- Prepare the Statement of Cash Flow (Daily, Weekly, Monthly).- Prepare the Final Report (SOPL & SOFP) and Analysis report of Financial Statement.- Discuss regularly with the internal and external (client) companies for the Final Report via online meeting or face to face.- Liaise with the internal and external (client) companies to plan annual audit requirements for the account.- Responsible for managing tax matters in relation to the internal and external (client) companies' business, including Income Tax, Corporate Tax & Service Tax, Withholding Tax, Etc.- Strong understanding of payroll for clients, including Tax on Salary (TOS) and NSSF.- Regularly liaising with the Group CFO after finalizing the above matter.- Update the weekly report for all work completed and pending, Etc.- Ad-hoc duties as requested from time to time.
Job Requirement: - At least 4 years+ of relevant working experience in finance and accounting- Only open for Local Khmer Nationality- ACCA Part II or CPA Part II preferred- Must have a bachelor's degree preferable in finance/accounting or professional qualification- Good command of English is a must- Self-motivated, able to work independently- Good interpersonal communication skills and a dynamic team player- Strong analytical, communication and problem-solving skills- Effective communication and time management skillsBenefitsSalary + Quarterly Team Bonus + Yearly Bonus + Company Phone + Health InsuranceHighlightsFast growing and international working environment with lots of new things to learn. Intensive training for all new staffCareer Growth OpportunitiesAble to lead a team in a growing industry that gives you lots of exposure to handle international clients

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: - Proven business development, marketing, sales, or marketing experience.- Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.- Exceptional leadership and management skills.- Effective communication and negotiation skills.- Proficient in all Microsoft Office applications.- Detail-oriented and persuasive.HOW TO APPLY Email: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: (855) 12 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: គ្រូភាសាអង់គ្លេស
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: គ្រូភាសាអង់គ្លេស
Job Description:
• Be punctual and dress professionally
• Swipe in and swipe out for working hour and inform the Head/Deputy Head of ESL Program for any error
• Be in class at least 5 minutes before the bell rings
• Be ready and well-prepared for the class with the lesson plan and materials
• Work together with the TA, Head/Deputy head of subject
• Regularly mark the students’ work and carefully record it
• Return back the students’ work with proper comment or feedback
• Be fair, firm but friendly
• Maintain complete and accurate records of student progress and evidence of growth and progress
• Employ a variety of teaching techniques and strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students
• Provide a nurturing and supportive learning environment that encourages student responsibility and incorporates challenging learning strategies
• Contact students’ parent/guardian related to the students ‘performances and misbehavior
• Carefully record students’ attendances
• Be open, sharing and creative
• Meet the deadline
• Maintain the good relationship with other teachers and staff
• Attend every important meeting
• No phone during teaching hour
• Submit the termly report on time
• Keep updated and searching for teaching techniques and materials for teaching
• Patrol the students during breaking time
• Write request form for any equipment (LCD, DVD Player, Laptop, etc.) in advance
• Encourage the students to participate in any school events
• Request certificates for the students
• Be a good school representative and ambassador
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree or at least a senior in education in language teaching or related fields
• At least 2 years of teaching experience
• Positive working attitude and able to work in team
• Willing to take on new challenges and to develop one’s self
• Some teaching experience of teaching children is a good plus
• Good English proficiency
• Good classroom management
• Outstanding personal and interpersonal communication skills
• Excellent organizational skills
• The ability to keep concise records
• The ability to incorporate current technology into the classroom environment
• The ability to facilitate group discussion, analyze situations, and draw conclusions
• The ability to work with a diversity of individuals and groups
• Excellent problem solving skills to analyze issues and create action plans
• The ability to adapt to changing work priorities and maintain flexible working hours
• The ability to establish and maintain constructive relationships

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖

•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

- សរសេរកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន និងផែនការបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
- រៀបចំតុបតែងថ្នាក់រៀន កម្មវិធីសិក្សា និងកម្មវិធីបំនិនផ្សេងៗ
-​​ រកវិធីសាស្ត្រជួយបង្រៀនសិស្សខ្សោយឲអស់លទ្ធភាព

- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍អោយទាន់ពេលវេលាកំណត់
- ធ្វើLabel សិស្សឆ្នើមប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស
- ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ដល់ចាងហ្វាង ឫក្រុមការងារពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា
- បង្រៀនសិស្សតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលសាលាដាក់ជូន
- បង្រៀនអោយទាន់កម្មវិធិសិក្សាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព 
- គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនអោយបាន១០០%"
Job Requirement:
- មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកាសល្យ
- មានបទពិសោធបង្រៀនច្រើនឆ្នាំ
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
- ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយកុមារ
- ស្រលាញ់កុមារ និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់

Job Description:
• ពិនិត្យអវត្តមាន និងសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ថ្នាក់រៀន

• ធ្វើរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់ឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់

• រៀបចំកិច្ចការផ្ទះ វិញ្ញាសាប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ប្រឡងពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស និងឆមាស និងកែឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិសាលា
• សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវរកវិធីសាស្រ្តបង្រៀនល្អៗ និងថ្មីៗ
• អប់រំសិស្សអោយក្លាយជាកូនល្អ សិស្សល្អ មិត្តល្អ ពលរដ្ឋល្អ
• ត្រូវបង្កើតបទបញ្ញត្តិថ្នាក់រៀននីមួយៗ
• ផ្តល់ចំណេះដឹងពិតប្រាកដមួយដល់សិស្ស
• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%
• បង្រៀនសិស្សតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលសាលាដាក់ជូន
• បង្រៀនអោយទាន់កម្មវិធីសិក្សាសាលាប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាព
• ប្រគល់កិច្ចការឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលសាលាបានកំណត់ជូន
• សហការគ្នាឱ្យបានល្អរវាងក្រុមការងារ
• ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់សាលាដូចជាទិវាវប្បធម៌ កម្មវិធីតាំងពិព៌រណ៍…

• ដឹងច្បាស់នូវរចនាសម្ព័ន្ធសាលា

• ផ្តល់របាយការណ៍ដល់ចាងហ្វាង ឬក្រុមការងារពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា

Job Requirement:
• មានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញវិជ្ជាជីវៈ

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
1. Daily costing operation supporting
-Daily operation supporting with document attached and follow up and record subcontractor
-Update posting report BOM & BOQ
-Review receipts and compare with actual charges to detect inaccuracies
-Cost pricing / invoicing of inventory to related parties
-Regularly follow up with all project to obtain any revised BOM & BOQ before project started
-Inventory costing, including construction material and tool
2. Closed monthly cost report
-Posting cost report in system timely basic
-Spot check document attached and record to make sure it corrected
-Posting subcontractor and reconcile data posted both manual and system
-Coordinated in monthly physical stock count, input and reconcile with warehouse.
-Ensure monthly cost of goods sold by project accurate
-Weekly spot check stock movement at all project.
-Report discrepancy and coach warehouse supervisor/manager to do the stock count
-Coordinate to get month-end stock balance from all project by 3rd of the month. 
-Verify and input into system for month-end cost calculation.
-Labor cost control by project and allocate cost with job card.
-Closed tool movement report by timely.
-Provide variance report for subcontractor and worker by monthly.
3. Other cost report supporting
-Support management for other reporting
-Regularly follow up with all project to obtain any revised BOM & BOQ before project
-Report to ACM the inventory/subcontractor reconciles sub ledger with G/L
-Other tasks assigned by Cost Account Manager
Job Requirement:
-Bachelor Degree in Accounting or other related fields.
-At least 3 years of experience in managing inventory and costing in the system and fixed assets
-Be proficient in excel skill
-Good communication and analytical skill
-Be patient, self-motivated and team building
-Willing to stay to complete all the work assigned during tough deadline.

Benefits:
- Seniority
- KPI Bonus
- Phone Allowance
- Annual leave
- Sick Leave
- Special Leave
- Public holidays (Labor Law)
- Insurance (NSSF)
